Here you will not meet Dragons and Dwarves. But get ready to face Kurupiras and Boetatas.

name: Tricky Castle
summary:
Escape from the castle, full of tricks and mysterious puzzles. This escape room game will challenge your ability to solve puzzles!

The Terrible Villain grabbed the Princess and set traps on the way to her rescue. A brave knight can save the princess hidden in the tower of the castle! Forward to adventure! Wander the mysterious corridors of the castle, solve puzzles and avoid traps to find the faraway tower. There'll be hundreds and hundreds doors, spikes, platforms to jump on and all this in order to find the treasured key. Take a close look at the room and read the clues (or riddles?) to figure out how to escape the room.

name: Tribal Hunter
summary:
An action platformer with size-changing mechanics. Be quick and nimble or large and in-charge!

Tribal Hunter is an action platformer. You play as a village guardian who can modify his body shape, allowing him to grow huge and devour enemies. As you grow, you can use this 'growth' as energy to fire projectiles at enemies!

name: Troupe
summary: Find your way in Troupe! A platform adventure inside a castle filled with demons. Explore the depths and top of the castle in search of your troupe.

name: Tree House Survivors
summary: Through an "accident" seafarers arrive on an island where they have to fight for their survival. Help them by building and managing a tree house for them.

name: Tracks: Toybox Edition
summary:
Tracks is a toy train set builder which gives you the tools to play without limits. Jump into an extensive sandbox and lay down tracks, create bridges and build worlds, then hop into the driver's seat of your train in first person view. Play with boosters, create firework displays, compose tunes and so much more.
Jump into the Ultimate Toy Sandbox Start with a pre-made environment, be it a modern lounge or a night time Winter wonderland, or jump into an entirely blank world canvas.

name: Train Sim World 2: Collector's Edition
summary: Master iconic locomotives on high-speed services, long freight hauls, or precise commuter traffic, and get creative with customization tools in this advanced sequel. Climb into the cab in Train Sim World 2.

name: Tree Trunk Brook
summary: Tree Trunk Brook is a tiny adventure game about hiking during the pandemic. Follow trail blazes, take photos, make friends, and find lost items. The visitor center is closed, but the trail is open. Social distancing is in effect, and masks are required.

name: Transit King Tycoon
summary: In Transit King Tycoon, your success depends on your strategy and willingness to deliver goods on time that will help to build your cities faster. Everything is up to you! Challenge your managing skills in daily contracts. Participate in weekly events and complete tasks on a deadline to get special rewards. If weekly events are not for you, focus on daily contracts for faster results.

name: Treasure Tech
summary:
Treasure Tech is a Doom Gameplay Mod inspired by the Wario Land franchise, featuring a slew of other elements from arcade games and retro classics.

Play as Chesterfield, more known as Treasure Guy, as he shakes down the forces of hell for their pocket change! Tackle your foes, and throw them into each other!
Collect tons of coins, jewels, strange artifacts, and spend your earnings to power yourself up! Use an array of exotic weapons as you hunt down every last penny on the map!

name: TramSim Vienna
summary:
A Tramway Simulator that plays on line 1 in Austria.

Steer the streetcar through Austria and transport your passengers.

Original route
Vehicle can be operated completely
Most modern tramway called: Flexity

name: Tree of Life: Oddria!
summary: The journey begins once again. You wake up on a strange island. Now it all depends on your choices. Will you be a kind friend? Or will you be the enemy? All the stories unfold now in the world of Oddria.

name: Transcender
summary: Transcender is a brief interactive experience that takes place in a surreal sci-fi setting. Figuring out how to play and what to do is the main attraction of the experience.

name: Treasure Quest
summary: Treasure Quest was a puzzle game in which the player moves from room to room in the mansion of Professor Jonathon William Faulkner, who has bequeathed 1 million dollars to any student who can solve the puzzles he has laid out. To move from one room to the next, players must find a famous quote from visual clues, words and anagrams, and then derive an ultimate solution to the game.

name: Trivia Tricks
summary: Trivia Tricks is a trivia party game played online and locally with up to 8 players!

name: Tricks N Treats
summary: Tricks N Treats is a short game made using RPG Maker MV. The game is about a little girl spending Halloween night going trick-or-treating with her friends, but also looking for trouble somewhere else.

name: Trump vs Biden: Infinity war
summary: An addicting arcade about the confrontation between two US presidential candidates in the 2020 elections!

name: Trackmaster
summary: Challenge your friends to a chaotic race on procedurally generated levels. Never play the same track twice! Master tricky obstacles, find shortcuts and use an arsenal of different powerups. Experience a dynamic environment with moving blocks, water physics and changing weather.

name: Train Song
summary:
Train Song is a journey.

It hums a familiar tune you've never heard.

Every passenger has their own verse to sing.

Keep listening, again and again, and you might just hear the secret notes.

name: Triple Pack: Trials HD, Limbo, Splosion Man
summary: A game bundle that includes Trials HD, Limbo and 'Splosion Man.

name: Transformers: Dark of the Moon - Autobots
Transformers: Dark of the Moon - Decepticons
Trash Factory
summary:
A mobile game where you sort trash into their correct bins. The trash flows via conveyor belts, and the player needs to direct the trash to the current bins by switching the direction in which the trash flows. Coins are used to purchase power-ups that can be used in-game to assist the player. 
 
The game progressively gets more difficult as time goes on. 
 
Players compete for high scores and in-game achievements.

name: Treasure Galaxy!
summary: Treasure Galaxy! is an educational computer game published by The Learning Company in 1994 for both Windows and Macintosh PCs. It is aimed at children ages 5 to 9 and is intended to teach children reading, basic math, and logic skills.

name: Trine Bundle
summary: The Trine Bundle includes Trine Enchanted Edition and Trine 2: Complete Story.

name: Traption Bakery
summary:
A curio for some or a right old puzzle for others, make no mistake. 
 
Some say: some folk actually managed to bake a loaf of bread using this confounded contraption... 
but that's rumoured to be just a rumour. 
 
There's no pressure... relax, ponder, prod, clank, crank, pull, push, watch... ponder more....sleep on it... come back to it... ponder.

name: Traps in Space
summary:
Traps in Space is a relaxing puzzle game in which you help a little astronaut save the world! 
Swipe your finger to move the astronaut and help him reach the teleporter, but beware of the traps! 
Suitable for both children and adults!

name: Trikaya
summary: Trikaya is an atmospheric first-person puzzle game where the player explores a long-forgotten temple and pieces together a mighty and mysterious artifact to master Wind, Earth, and Fire magic to solve puzzles and uncover the intriguing history of the extraordinary artifact.

name: Tractor Racing Simulation
summary: Experience the life of tractor driver with this awesome new tractor Simulator. Drive your tractor in an exciting journey to the lands of pure nature and vividness through lush Meadows and Green fields, carrying goods from the outskirts areas to your farm. The tractor will be derailed if not handled carefully on turning. Race against time in this tractor driving Simulator, collect Gold from the outskirts farmers and then drive back to your own farm in limited time.Have fun while driving tractor in this tractor Simulator and become a pro tractor driver.

name: Tritris
summary: Tritris is a Tetris variant played with isosceles right triangles on a rectangular grid.

name: Tripgate
summary: A bright and colorful exploration game.

name: TrackDayR
summary: The most complete motorcycle simulator that allows you to ride every type of motorbikes including ATVs, 3 Wheelers prototype and Sidecars. Challenge your online friends on TrackDayR and climb the leaderboards of players all over the world. TrackDayR, Trackday Everyday!

name: Trophy
summary: Trophy is a action platformer for the original NES! Take control of the robot Trophy in this exciting new homebrew game. Save the peaceful planet of Gearus 9 from the evil machinations of Lord Q as you run, jump, and blast your way to victory. Collect power-ups along the way and defeat some of the largest bosses ever seen on the NES!

name: Trap Quest
summary: Trap Quest is a free-to-play erotic text-heavy turn-based clickable-text-input roguelike game. Its premise is that you're playing a very difficult virtual reality game and your body and mind are transformed in response to the events that happen in the game while you search for the exit.

name: Trashed
summary: Take over a disfunctional Waste Management Facility on a distant planet. Build incinerators, recyclers, robots, turrets, and more. Battle vicious creatures on the planet's surface with powerful weapons!

name: Triversal
summary:
Unwind with Triversal: a casual spatial puzzle experience to reward & relax the mind.

Suspend a light orb over a black hole by connecting to nearby supports with stretchy tethers to complete challenges.

Play at your own pace, and stimulate your brain with a gentle learning curve and multiple gameplay modes to satisfy your mood. Select from various music tracks and visual pairings to enhance your vibe & get in the zone.

Toggle on "Streamer Assist" while you stream, so your viewers can collaborate with you in chat. Easy as 1-2-3!

name: Triangle Strategy
summary: Three nations battle for control of the dwindling resources of salt and iron in this HD-2D adventure tactical RPG. Featuring deep gameplay full of choices and consequences, strategically survey the battlefield to gain the upper hand.
developers: Square Enix Creative Business Unit II

name: Trader Life Simulator
summary: Live your life as you like in Trader Life Simulator , have fun building your own success story.

name: Transfinite Dungeon
summary: TFD is a unique hybrid of tactical RPG and roguelike. Manage a party of adventurers and use the environment to your advantage to conquer the dungeon.

name: Transpire
summary: Transpire is a short relaxing first-person 3D-platformer where you can play and progress through the levels at your own pace. See the world slowly take shape while walking, jumping, flying and unlocking abilities on your way.

name: Troubleshooter: Abandoned Children - White Lion and Black Witch
summary: First extra scenario for Troubleshooter: Abandoned Children, a turn-based strategy SRPG, which adds two new characters with their story and new missions.

name: Troll Face Horror Quest 2: Halloween Special
summary:
Scary, funny, and bizarre adventures are what Troll Face Quest: Horror 2 has in store for you in this second installment of the mind-blowing TFQ horror series!
These terrifying but hilarious puzzles are filled with scary references to many of your favorite horror movies and TV shows. Point and click your way through the game to find out! Will you make it all the way to the final level and escape with your sanity?

name: Trigon: Space Story
summary: Space roguelike adventure. Take a chance to become a spaceship captain and lead your own crew, make pivotal decisions, and inevitably win tactical battles. Uncover the mysteries of the galaxy, among which is the star of Trigon, the most sinister and enigmatic one.

name: Trash the Planet
summary: Trash the Planet is a resource-management game that subverts clicker mechanics to serve its narrative rather than manipulate the player.

name: Treasure Islands
summary: Help Nick and Pippa find a selection of new artefacts and exhibits for the Grand Museum in an exciting adventure across a number of islands, each with their own quirks, characters and strange events!

name: Tripp
summary:
Tripp uses the power of VR, beautiful imagery, sound frequencies, and mindfulness elements to help you feel calm and focused.
Tripp encourages daily use to support a regular mindfulness practice, which can help you reduce stress and build the resilience you need to stay healthy inside and out.

name: Train Simulator 2021
summary: Train Simulator 2021 is the ultimate railway hobby! Take control of authentic licensed locomotives, drive real-world routes.

name: Tricky Keys
summary: Tricky Keys is a puzzle platformer made in 48 hours for GMTK Jam 2020, with the theme "Out of Control".

name: Tropical Fish
summary: Tropical Fish is a rare New Wide Screen Game & Watch video game released in 1985. The game was never released in Japan. The model number for Tropical Fish is TF-104. In the game, you'll merge fish from an aquarium into another aquarium via a fishbowl. Overall, the gameplay is very similar to Fire, though perhaps slightly improved. Tropical Fish has also appeared as an unlockable museum game in Game & Watch Gallery 4, albeit in Classic only.

name: Trucks
summary:
Trucks is an action, racing and arcade game developed by Microfolie's. It is set on the planet Cooroocoocoo, where you are an aspiring businessman/driver who has to buy one of 8 trucks available and takes on various missions. 
 
Once you finish buying your truck, fitting it with parts and crew, and accepting your first mission, you will leave from a service station driving your truck from a first-person view.

name: Trash Quest
summary: Trash Quest is a compact metroidvania with a single spawn point, run and gun action and tight platforming. Navigate an interwoven maze of rooms through this space station, destroying robots, collecting power ups and unlocking shortcuts.

name: Troll Quest
summary: Troll Quest is a really hard game made in 2013 that takes inspiration from games like I "Wanna Be the Guy" filled with memes and jokes from that age.

name: Transformers: Battlegrounds - Deluxe Edition
summary:
Transformers: Battlegrounds is a tactical warfare adventure. As evil Megatron closes in on the all spark, Bumblebee and the Autobacs need a new commander to help save Earth. Assemble your squad and roll out for a battle that will Rage from central city to cybertron... And even to the local multiplayer arcade.

Transformers: Battlegrounds - Deluxe Edition contains:
• Gold Autobot Skin Pack
• Energon Autobot Skin Pack
• Battle Autobot Skin Pack
• Neon Autobot Skin Pack
• CUBE Game - Arcade Add-on

name: Trend Ballz
summary: Trend Ballz is a game where you play as a spherical shaped characters that represents current trends or memes - such as a Walter the Dog, and more.

name: Trails and Traces: The Tomb of Thomas Tew
summary: Use your sleuthing skill and any means necessary to uncover information. Point-and-click adventure inspired by the classics. Megaphone tap unsuspecting people for clues. Original soundtrack and jukebox mode.

name: Trade Mania
summary: Purchase real estate in different cities, and make your company a fantastic success story in Trade Mania! Corner the real estate market as you master unique economic gameplay. Play through maps of actual megalopolises and feel like a real millionaire. Dominate the market and become a mogul in the world of Trade Mania!

name: Traveler
summary: Traveler is a thrilling, winner-takes-all PvPvE first person shooter. Compete against fellow players to reach high-tier loot spots and be wary of invasions by "The Management" as they attempt to find and take down Travelers.

name: TrailBlazer
summary:
Welcome to the world of Trailblazer, a steampunk Wild West RPG that is currently and will always be free to play!

Follow the story of Jean Smith, a drifter who roams the frontier in search of revenge for the death of his mentor: Wild Bill Hickok. While wandering the wastes, he happens upon South Pass, a town harassed by the Bushwhackers - a murderous gang of former Confederates seeking to bring the South to rise again.

Wild Bill always taught him to stand up for the little man and use his guns to protect others, but Bill's dead now. How will this vagabond respond to innocents in need? Will he draw iron again to defend the helpless? Could this one choice seal his fate? Or will it lead him to discover a plot by a single man to conquer the west, and learn why no flora grows on these dusty plains?

name: Treasures of the Aegean
summary:
What happened to the Minoan civilization? Join parkour master Marie Taylor and treasure hunter James Andrew in a historical action thriller, as they unveil the secrets of a forgotten kingdom which has been tragically trapped in and endless time loop.

Explore a beautifully hand-drawn non-lineal open world, recover valuable relics, chart a lost island, and gather new clues in every loop to complete an ancient prophecy. Solve the riddles and mysteries that angered the old Gods, on your quest to prevent history from repeating itself forever.

name: Trail Boss BMX
summary: Ride your bike through increasingly tricky levels while pulling off daring stunts, huge combos, tests of accuracy and skill!

name: Tribes of Tis'te
summary: A Storm is Coming.... The Empty Throne lies vacant, and the Ancient Towers of Fyre begin to fail in their protection. Who will unite the tribes against the threat of the Flood? Who has the power to protect the people? Do you have what it takes to wear the Crown? Tribes of Tis'te is a kingdom building rogue-like, a blend of styles that will let you live the life of a Chief, one of the Twelve Rulers of the Tis'te Territories. As you protect, populate, and grow your territory in order to survive the harsh landscape your Tribe calls home, you will face many different dangers. Tis'te is a land full of many threats to your Tribe, both monstrous and human alike.

name: Travel Mosaics 5: Waltzing Vienna
summary: This time, join the Walker family on their sight-seeing tour to the most outstanding and famous attractions in Vienna. Explore the legendary cultural legacy of Austrian capital: learn interesting facts about the city and its inhabitants, answer tricky trivia questions and as always - solve gorgeous nonograms! Travel Mosaics is a nonogram-picross puzzle series that takes you all around the world! Each puzzle is handcrafted and features a recognizable picture that is revealed as you play. Sit back, relax and have fun: players of all ages are welcome!

name: Travel Mosaics 4: Adventures In Rio
summary: Get ready! The Walkers are taking you on an exciting adventure to sunny Rio. Join the carnival: complete colorful puzzles, answer fun trivia questions and collect souvenirs! Travel Mosaics is a nonogram-picross puzzle series that takes you all around the world!

name: Travel Mosaics 7: Fantastic Berlin
summary: Travel Mosaics - an absolutely beautiful and brilliant edutainment game for all ages is back with a new chapter! The adventurous Walker animal family are traveling to the great city of Berlin! Travel Mosaics 7 brings you 140 new and unique nonogram puzzles. Сompared to classic nonograms, Travel Mosaics puzzles are color-coded, and each puzzle contains a hidden image that is revealed as you play! It's amazing brain-jogging fun for everybody interested in the history of Berlin.

name: Travel Mosaics 8: Breathtaking Seoul
summary:
Travel Mosaics is back with a new family adventure in beautiful Seoul!
Join the Walkers - a curious family of travelers who love exploring new destinations. Solve colorful mosaic puzzles and learn curious facts while answering tricky quiz questions. On your journey, collect gold coins and souvenirs to commemorate the trip. The stunning capital of South Korea has tons of fun to offer - hop along! Each level contains a hidden picture that you can reveal by solving it! Travel Mosaics is edutainment for all ages: pick the difficulty level corresponding to your skill and enjoy beautiful hand-crafted puzzles.

name: Travel Mosaics 9: Mysterious Prague
summary: Mysterious Prague is calling for the bravest puzzle solvers! Accompany the Walkers - an animal family of adventurers on their sightseeing tour to the Czech capital. The newest installment in the nonogram series offers brand new 140 puzzles for players of all ages to enjoy. Same as before, not only you can solve themed recognizable nonograms, but also try your luck in trivia - learn fun facts about the City of a Hundred Spires. Pick any of the 3 difficulty settings to enjoy just the right amount of challenge, customize the playing field and choose your favorite tile designs, collect souvenirs to decorate Walkers' living room and more!

name: Trenga Unlimited
summary: Choose the right pieces, place them into the tower and solve the puzzle! This is Trenga, a relaxing 3D puzzle game with a unique yet familiar mechanic. Help Kate Nemo and the cute sea creatures, challenging your friends and family or even your own brain, to complete tricky missions in the 3 beautiful worlds of this captivating underwater adventure.

name: TrickShot
summary: "TrickShot" is a fast-paced, skate trick multiplayer shooter where players dodge bullets and take out opponents as they skate ramps, grind, parkour, complete tricks and kills for the most points to win. Pick between Hoverskates or Hoverboards.

name: Train Sim World 2: Hauptstrecke Hamburg - Lübeck Route Add-On
summary: Experience regional passenger and heavy freight duties in Northern Germany, linking the country's 2nd largest city to the commuter towns of Schleswig-Holstein with Train Sim World 2: Hauptstrecke Hamburg - Lübeck.

name: Travel Mosaics 2: Roman Holiday
summary: Travel Mosaics 2 brings a unique take on a classic nonogram puzzle, offering varying difficulty settings, recognizable and fun images, trivia questions and much more. The Walkers are going on a sightseeing tour to the most famous attractions Rome has to offer! Tag along and explore charming historic locations of the Eternal City as you solve colorful nonograms - it's a journey of a lifetime!

name: Truck Simulator
summary: Drive carefully, connect to trailers and complete delivery jobs for clients at the Shipping Docks. Earn your seat in bigger and better trucks to access more advanced jobs, with longer loads, bigger trailers and more valuable cargo!

name: Tricky Spider
summary: Move the spider Adanson up and down to avoid the approaching obstacles! The simple but deep operability, such as pressing the button, releasing it, and pressing it finely, becomes addictive. And this game can be played cooperatively by two people! Through the meadows, through the forest ... What's ahead? See it with your own eyes! A game that is easy to play and addictive! That is "Tricky Spider!"

name: Truck Mechanic Simulator
summary: Repair trucks, upgrade skills, improve your workshop. Very popular mechanic game with truck vehicles. Now you can see how the work of truck mechanic looks like!

name: Triglav
summary:
The tower of Triglav consisting of 50+ floors. Go for the top floor where the princess is captured, by searching for keys that open the doors to the next floor, by solving puzzles, and by monster hunting.
In this unique world created by richly detailed retro pixel art, create your own unique character by combining items of over 2,500 types.

This is a smartphone version of the hack and slash type RPG released as an indie web game in 2002 and has been played by over 500,000 players.
Many audio and visual effects, such as sound effects and music, have been added which were not included in the original version.

name: Trench Foot
summary: Trench Foot is a brutal Warhammer 40k inspired grimdark trench warfare DOOM 2 Total conversion mod where a Templar rallies behind his troops as a rebellion threatens to return the land to its ancient aberrant rulers.

name: Traction Control
summary: Traction Control is a prototype downhill exploration racer where only some of the laws of physics apply. Pick your vehicle and drift, jump, flip, spin, roll, and boost through a series of time and point-based challenges to get to the top of the leaderboard. The game evokes early kart-racing games and will keep you thinking of the best way to get down the mountain to the finish line!

name: Trickster M
summary: Trickster M is a mobile MMORPG based on Nteev Soft’s 'Trickster' IP. Users can enjoy popular content from the original title on mobile, including 'drill action' and 2D dot graphics.

name: Trap Tag
summary: Trap tag is a hectic local multiplayer party game with a multitude of crazy characters, treacherous traps and a soundtrack that will get your blood pumping faster!

name: True Game
summary: "True Game" is a work of suspense reasoning. The work tells the story that people in trouble are taken to a closed space and ask to get chips from others through different competitions. This work has a high degree of brain burning, exquisite picture and strong sense of substitution.

name: Trilogy King Man
summary: Three classics from the past are celebrating a glorious return, bringing you all new features, modern tweaks and the soul of the late 80s and early 90s in one funny package!

name: Train Chase
summary:
You're being chased by the enemy and have to escape.
Fight their drones, turrets and vehicles on a train through several levels and several waves.
Use different types of weapons to deal as much as damage with the least amount of bullets. Dodge their attacks during the bullet time.

name: Traversing Traveler
summary: Play as an alchemist named Taylor using various potions find your way around and unlock new areas to talk to various townsfolk who wish to see the path between villages restored.

name: Trenchlore
summary: Enter Daqul, a vast oceanic trench teeming with alien lifeforms. Dive your way through various biomes, meeting strange creatures and dangerous enemies... all the way to the very bottom.

name: Tribal Wars
summary: Compete in hardcore PvP strategy in persistent game worlds where real time resource and troop management in coordination with other players is required to expand your kingdom from one village to hundreds as you conquer the map in this winner takes all medieval contest.

name: Truck Crash
summary: Truck Crash - an arcade racig game with a view from above, racing on a huge truck, you dodge oncoming cars, holes, washed up sharks, rolling stones from the mountain. Collect gasoline to rush to your destination!

name: Trapped
summary: Broken enough that you can barely hold objects. Can you escape the dungeon with some vague clues and a time limit?

name: Traceur's Dreamlab VR
summary: Traceur's Dreamlab is a place to be for every parkour runner! You can build your own levels, including not only challenging obstacles but also tricky puzzles and share them with the community. Within our leaderboard system you can run against the time of your friends and other online players.

name: Train Your Minibot
summary: Time to test your new robotics club project! Use household objects to build obstacle courses and then take control of a miniature robot to platform your way to the finishline!

name: Trickery&Strategy
summary:
In the game players play the role of a vassal king who just succeeded to the throne in the spring and Autumn period.
Fully open the world, you can experience the life of princes and kings in it!

name: Treasure Hunting
summary: Treasure Hunting is a single player game that have 30 stages. You have to open the treasure box to clear the stage, and the game will be clear after beat all the stages. Rather than just moving the character player have to solve puzzle and cleverly using the gimmicks and traps to clear the stage.

name: True Hate
summary: Die again and again, to start all over again, the taste of victory is sweeter if the path to it is through pain and suffering...

name: TrainClicker Idle Evolution
summary: Relaxing idle train game. Enjoy a journey from steam to modern locomotives in clicker style!

name: Trolley Simulator
summary: Let's craft a new car! And make a hole-in-one in the black hole! Here is a new 2D car crafting game!

name: Traveler of Artcaster
summary: Traveler of Artcaster is an indie adventure Rpg taking place in the mystic world named "Artcaster". Your character explores a huge open world to find his/her father who was fighting for the king of Artcaster. But with this search a big journey with many friends and enemies begins.

name: Trapped Guys
summary: Many rooms, many traps, as well as many rooms with traps... Friends, or rivals? Trapped Guys is a multiplayer platformer, where four "friends" unfortunately have to go through a difficult test, which will show which of them is the fastest, dexterous or perhaps the most insidious?

name: Train Ride Simulator
summary: Discover the best train simulator!

name: Trombone Champ
summary: Honk, blow, & toot your way through over 20 songs, collect all 50 unique Tromboner Cards, and uncover the mysteries of the Trombiverse. Do you have what it takes to become the true Trombone Champ?

name: Traffic V
summary: Traffic V - Take command of the traffic in the streets, redirecting cars, and telling them when it is okay to stop, and when it is okay to go. One big game of Red light green light keeps you on your feet in this addicting traffic driving game.

name: Tritorn
summary: Tritorn is an early progenitor of the Action RPG genre and the first game in XAIN Soft's Tritorn trilogy.

name: Treasure Drifter: Nian
summary: "Treasure Drifter: Nian" is a game combining defensive action and walking exploration. Bring your partner to learn different character stories, defeat difficult enemies, and unlock different puzzles on the long road. Grow and explore the world in the cycle of departure and return.

name: Try to Remember
summary: You have 50 seconds to look around a certain room. The detective will ask you questions about that room. Choose the correct anwer. If you fail 3 times, it's Game Over. If you don't remember something, you can REWIND and go to the same room, being able to look around again for a few seconds.

name: Tripill
summary: Puzzle game with planning elements, 300 levels, many hours of fun. The game is to collect pills. You are controlling three viruses , each of them can only move in one way. You can combine them together to move in different directions.

name: Traffic Command
summary: Traffic Command - Take command of the traffic in the streets, redirecting cars, and telling them when it is okay to stop, and when it is okay to go.One big game of Red light green light keeps you on your feet in this addicting traffic driving game.

name: Troll Hunter VR
summary: In Troll Hunter VR action-adventure, you explore harsh nature, study trolls, set traps, and hunt them down to protect civilians. Hunt for ghastly trolls in the alternative '80s Scandinavia, using your wit, trusty shotgun, and DIY devices.

name: Trapmania
summary: Run, Trap, Defend. Fearsome monsters have invaded! Your job? Cleanse the land of these horrible beasts using only your mind, and the traps in your backpack...

name: Tree Strike
summary: The incremental tree striking platformer, strike trees, collect them, die and make the numbers go up.

name: Trine 4: Melody of Mystery
summary:
In Trine 4: Melody of Mystery, there's trouble brewing at the Astral Academy once again. All the students are cursed, trapped in enchanted slumber and unable to wake up. With a mysterious spirit on the loose, released accidentally by the kind and guileless Cornelius Crownsteed, it's best to call the Heroes of Trine to see what they can do to bring back Cornelius and his fellow students from their enticing dreamlands.

Trine 4: Melody of Mystery is a 6-level story campaign that continues the travels of Amadeus, Pontius, and Zoya. The new adventure features more upgrades for the heroes' skills, and fresh puzzles with clever gameplay elements for our heroes to take on.

name: Triple
summary: Triple is one of the few games released for the Game Boy Advance add-on Play-Yan. It was distributed online by Nintendo in 2005.

name: Trek to Yomi
summary: As a vow to his dying Master, the young swordsman Hiroki is sworn to protect his town and the people he loves against all threats. Faced with tragedy and bound to duty, the lone samurai must voyage beyond life and death to confront himself and decide his path forward.

name: Tree Simulator 2022
summary: It's exactly what it sounds like, but now with 100% more multiplayer. You are the tree and so is everyone else! You are equaled by no other, except maybe the forest... Relax and be the best tree you can be.

name: Track: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade
summary: In the Breakthrough Gaming Arcade series, play arcade games that express a Biblical truth!

name: Train Travel Simulator
summary: Simulator of travel in the carriage of a passenger train across Russia.

name: Trial of Two
summary: Trial of Two is a local co-op beat 'em up game with powerful, physics-based martial-arts combat. Do you dare to enter The Dojo and fight alongside your friend?

name: Training Leah
summary: "Training Leah" is a SRPG with adult content, where you play as an unwilling hero/mercenary that fights to protect a village at the request of a woman named Leah. Fight monsters, train Leah, and save the village from monsters in this turn-based tactics SRPG.

name: Train Tycoon
summary: Manage your own train company! Be a businessman in the train industry, with control over everything in your business. Work, earn, invest and expand!

name: Trap Adventure
summary: "Trap Dungeon" is an old-schoold 2.5 roguelite game about an escape from dangerous dungeon. Avoid numerous deadly traps, hide from bloodthirsty enemies and press the buttons that will open the way for you!

name: Tribes of Midgard: Deluxe Edition
summary: Mythical creatures, deadly spirits, and gigantic brutes threaten to bring on Ragnarök - the end of the world! It's up to you, a mighty Einherjar, to cut short your glorious feast in Valhalla and return to Midgard. There, you'll need to become the ultimate Viking and survive - even thrive to save your village, and the world, from total destruction. Luckily, you don't have to brave it alone: your (mostly) fearless tribe of co-op companions will help you build up village defenses and find treasures through a vast, beautiful real mall while doomsday ticks closer and closer. But don't let that stop your tribe from having the best apocalypse of your lives. "Surthrive" is the Viking way in Tribes of Midgard, a multiplayer, action-survival RPG of gigantic proportions.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Cilie Oldphartz Railroad
summary: The Cilie Oldphartz Railroad Company is a TRS19 model railroad style route that comes in three variants - a narrow gauge logging railroad, a narrow gauge mining railroad and a standard gauge railroad. Each has the same track layout, with variations to suit the gauge and theme.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Chicago Museum of Science and Industry Model Railroad
summary: One of the most amazing model railroads in the world, this prototypical representation will spark your imagination, with plenty of action with lots of trains and industries.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Tnfrhs Refrigerator Wagon
summary: The Tnfrhs 32-Refrigerated wagon takes us once again "down memory lane". This "cool" fellow was built from 1936 and was in service for many decades.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: TE3-2068
summary: The legendary TE3 locomotive is made in compliance with the highest standards for quality and precision. This is a replica of a locomotive TE3 series.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Tidewater Point Railroad 2.0
summary: Tidewater Railroad is a shortline railroad running from a crude oil terminal located south by the river to an intermodal terminal in the North.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Chesapeake & Ohio K2 2-8-2
summary: The Class K2 had 63 diameter drivers, 28 x 30 cylinders, had a 200 psi boiler pressure and exerted 63,467 pounds. The Class K-2 firebox was 287 square feet. The evaporative heating surface was 4,160 square feet and with the superheater the combined heating surface was 5,333 square feet.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: EMD SD40-2 - NS
summary: Experience the power of the Norfolk Southern SD40-2 with custom cab!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: C&O 2-6-6-6 H8 - New River Mining Coal Run
summary: In this session you will experience the power of the C&O 2-6-6-6 H8 Allegheny. They are giving you control over this big boy and you will be making a large coal run. The journey is not a short one so get ready to take the challenge of hauling your freight from New River Mining all the way up to Hinton!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: RZD-UZ-RIC Wagons
summary: The RIC and UZ passenger wagons are made in compliance with the highest quality standards and precision. Photo realistic textures and geometry has been recreated as accurately as possible to deliver the characteristics and details of the original wagons.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: NS SD60E First Responders
summary: Experience the power of the NS SD60E First Responders as you shunt the yard and make your freight run!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Pro Trainz TEE Rheingold
summary: The introduction of the Trans Europe Express (TEE) set completely new benchmarks for travels within the European Economic Area. This new train type was distinguished by numerous exclusive special features, such as First Class, a galley, customs areas and more.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: LMS Duchess
summary: The feature packed Duchess set is a must have for anyone with a taste for the romance of rail.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: CO17-3373 Russian Loco and Tender
summary: A series of freight locomotives CO (Sergo Ordzhonikidze, axle load 17 tonnes) designed for medium loads and working on lines with light rail. Built from 1934 to 1951 at the Kharkov, Bryansk, Voroshilovgrad, Krasnoyarsk and Ulan-Ude Locomotive Works. Total production of locomotives - 3049.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Healesville 1910's
summary: This layout covers the last 19 miles of the Healesville line from Mooroolbark to Healesville, set in approximately 1913-1920, prior to the line to Lilydale being electrified, and during the period when the locomotives were painted Canadian Red.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Victorian Railways Type 2 DD Class Pack
summary: 5 locomotives, in 5 liveries, in broad gauge and standard gauge (10 locomotives total)

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Bea-Dawe Model Railway
summary: This British Diesel-era layout includes several stations, goods yards and engine facilities and was inspired by memories of growing up in the Midlands spending many hours standing on the side of the Lickey Bank with Grandad watching the trains go past.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Nickel Plate High Speed Freight
summary: Relive the halcyon years of steam hauled freight services in the US with this stunningly modeled Trainz Simulator addon. This stunning train has been upgraded to give you the best experience. The Nickel Plate has had its Train Motion settings tweaked to mimic realistic behaviour using the new Train Motion system in TANE.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Laadgs Transporter
summary: Package includes train cars and 2 x sessions. Carry small vans, containers or even a low-floor tram: it's entirely in your hands! Design the train just the way you want.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Niddertalbahn TRS19
summary: An idyllic, single-track branch line in Wetterau and Main-Kinzig-Kreis in the western German state of Hesse.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: CO17-4174 Russian Loco and Tender
summary: A series of freight locomotives CO (Sergo Ordzhonikidze, axle load 17 tonnes) designed for medium loads and working on lines with light rail. Built from 1934 to 1951 at the Kharkov, Bryansk, Voroshilovgrad, Krasnoyarsk and Ulan-Ude Locomotive Works. Total production of locomotives - 3049.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: ECML Kings Cross - Edinburgh 1976
summary: This route covers the full route from London Kings Cross Station all the way to Edinburgh in Scotland - a 393 mile drive! With significant updates to almost every feature along the track, the route will take you back in time to 1976 UK.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Canadian Rocky Mountains - Columbia River Basin
summary: The beautiful Canadian Rocky Mountain - Columbia River Basin covers a staggering 2000 sq km making it one of the largest routes ever created in Trainz. Includes 6 sessions!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Southern Pacific GE CW44-9
summary: This session lets you jump straight in and drive the Southern Pacific GE CW44-9 in 'easy' or 'realistic' mode.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: New York Central 10a 2-8-2
summary: New York Centrals H10a were built from the early 1900s to as late as the mid 1940s in Canada, although the vast majority came into service prior to 1930.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: The Shorts and Kerl Traction Railroad
summary: The Shortz & Kerl Railroad was an electrified short line that began freight services in the early part of the Twentieth Century, linking Port Shortz with the Kerl Iron Works.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: CP SD40-2 #5865-5879 Multimark
summary: Drive the CP GMD SD40-2 locomotive, numbers 5865-5879, built in 1984 for CP Rail. Featuring many exact details found on the real locomotives, including CP specific cooling pipe, Locotrol antenna array, open bearung EMD HTC trucks, and more!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Quinnimont Coal Drag
summary: This package includes the "C&O 2-6-6-6 H8" locomotive and a brand new detailed session. Quinnimont was a marshalling yard for coal loads from the surrounding mines. Trains were assembled here to be shipped to Clifton Forge and beyond. Empty cars were also made-up here for the mines in the area.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: GT GP9 2 Pack
summary: The 2 pack comes with the GT GP9 Black and Blue livery. The session lets you jump straight in and drive the GT GP9 using 'easy' or 'realistic' mode.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: ATSF GP38-2 Santa FE
summary: Climb on board your new GP38-2 ATSF engines and learn to operate the EMD GP38-2 ATSF locomotive. This detailed session will make you an expert Train driver and best of all, you get to experience it all driving the beautifully detailed GP38-2 ATSF

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Aerotrain
summary: Gone but certainly not forgotten. The GM Aerotrain addon pack takes you back to the streamline era when this stylish train toured the railroads of the USA as a proposed means to the future of passenger haulage.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Appen
summary: "Appen" is a fictitious route set in West Yorkshire (or should I say the West Riding) in the 1950 - 60's. Appen represents an industrial town located between Leeds and Bradford served by the London Midland with services from the North Eastern region of British Railways.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Indiana Railroad EMD SD9043MAC
summary: This session lets you jump straight in and drive the Indiana Railroad EMD SD9043MAC in 'easy' or 'realistic' mode.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Andrushivka - Vinnitsa UZ
summary: East European railway. The route runs along the vast expanses of the Ukraine among the picturesque fields, forests and villages.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: CP SD40-2 #5865-5879 Dual Flags
summary: Drive the CP GMD SD40-2 locomotive, numbers 5865-5879, built in 1984 for CP Rail. Featuring many exact details found on the real locomotives, including CP specific cooling pipe, Locotrol antenna array, open bearung EMD HTC trucks, and more!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Canadian Rocky Mountains Baker Crk to West of Calgary
summary: This instalment covers a stretch of the CP Laggan Subdivision in the region around Banff and Canmore.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Amtrak F40PH 2 pack
summary: Amtrak F40PH locomotive two pack, with Phase II and Phase III liveries. Feature full custom cab, automatic running numbers, animated wipers, gecko script, and more.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: PRR GP9 (2 Pack)
summary: This session allows you to jump in and drive the PRR GP9 locomotives (with Early and Late liveries) in easy or realistic mode.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: BNSF GE Dash-9 44CW Warbonnet
summary: Jump straight in and drive the BNSF GE Dash-9 44CW Warbonnet in 'easy' or 'realistic' mode.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: SNCF BB 75000
summary: The SNCF BB 75000 (also known as the SNCF BB 475000) are 4 axle diesel electric locomotives ordered in 2000 by SNCF for freight operations to renew its aging fleet.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: DRG Class 05 Steam
summary: 3DZUG takes you directly into the driver's cabin of one of the most elaborate engines ever created for Trainz.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: TE3-1072
summary: The legendary TE3 locomotive is made in compliance with the highest standards for quality and precision. This is a replica of a locomotive TE3 series.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: ITC GP7 Phase I & II (2 Pack)
summary: This session allows you to jump in and drive the ITC GP7 Phase I and II locomotives in easy or realistic mode.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Amtrak P42DC - Phase IV
summary: Amtrak P42DC locomotive in Phase IV livery. Feature full custom cab, automatic running numbers, animated wipers, gecko script, and more.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: RZD-UZ-RIC Wagons Praha
summary: The RIC and UZ passenger wagons are made in compliance with the highest quality standards and precision.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Victorian Railways V499 - Baldwin Built
summary: Victorian Railways V499 2-8-0 Baldwin Compound in Baldwin Green and Canadian Red.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: LMS Coronation Scot
summary: Take control of one of the iconic British Locomotives and travel the length of the country.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Chinese Electric SS4 Locomotive Pack
summary: The Shao Shan 4 (SS4 improved) electric locomotive is one of the most powerful DC electric locomotives in China.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: CFR Marfa Gbs/Gbgs Freight Car Pack
summary: A pack of 24 high detail Eastern-European freight wagons with custom loads, custom sounds, and a custom industry object.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: BNSF GP38-2 Pumpkins
summary: Climb on board your new GP38-2 BNSF engines and learn to operate the locomotives. This detailed session will make you an expert Train driver and best of all, you get to experience it all driving the beautifully detailed GP38-2 BNSF

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: PRR T1
summary: The PRR T1 'A Fleet of Modernism' DLC Pack recreates the striking image of these shark nosed behemoths in their days of speeding the 'Fleet of Modernism' cars to their destination on trains such as 'The Broadway Limited' and 'The General'.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Franklin Avenue Industrial
summary: Franklin Avenue Industrial is a small one baseboard Model Railroadz route inspired by the track plan, 59th Street Branch by Stan Sweatt.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Niddertalbahn - TANE Edition
summary: An idyllic, single-track branch line in Wetterau- and Main-Kinzig-Kreis - and best of all it's free!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: PRR X23 Boxcar
summary: Experience the trendsetting X23boxcar in firstclass quality from 3DZUG and let the past come alive again.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: The Flying Scotsman 1920s
summary: The passenger run takes you on a massive 125 mile drive down the ECML from Edinburgh through to Newcastle while driving the world famous Flying Scotsman from the 1920s.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Settle and Carlisle
summary: Updated for TANE - Settle & Carlisle takes you to one of the most famous and scenic British main lines at the time of the transition from steam to diesel power. 25 sessions across 5 routes with all with new speedtrees and procedural tracks this is one you'll want to pick up and drive!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Warwick to Wallangarra Route
summary: Follow the QR Southern railway line through the Darling Downs and into Granite country, right to the border with New South Wales.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Canadian Rocky Mountains - Golden, BC
summary: CP Rail facilities at Golden are used to manage coal trains coming off the Windermere Sub onto the main line westward and serve as an inspection point and maintenance depot for the enormous fleet of coal hoppers taking up the unrelenting strain.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Hccrrs Car Transporter
summary: The Hccrrs car transporter guarantees the highest quality cars and impresses with its realistic textures and accurate features. Two sessions for the free Niddertalbahn Route are already included.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Utah Belt AC4400CW 4400-4450
summary: Representation of the fictional and popular HO scale layout railroad Utah Belt AC4400s. As per the HO scale prototype models these units have functional gyra lights.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Cornish Mainline - TANE Edition
summary: The Cornish Main Line was originally built by two separate railway companies, the West Cornwall Railway between Truro and Penzance, opened in 1852, and the Cornwall Railway between Plymouth and a separate station in Truro, opened in 1859.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: TE7-083
summary: The legendary TE7 locomotive is made in compliance with the highest standards for quality and precision. This is a replica of a locomotive TE7 series.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: CP SD40-2 #5865-5879 Modern Block Letters
summary: Drive the CP GMD SD40-2 locomotive, numbers 5865-5879, built in 1984 for CP Rail. Featuring many exact details found on the real locomotives, including CP specific cooling pipe, Locotrol antenna array, open bearung EMD HTC trucks, and more!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Season Town Northern Rail Road Route
summary: A fictional route situated in the USA. The route reacts to season changes and lets you drive a freight train on the main line as well as a street car through the city.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Amtrak P42DC - Phase V
summary: This session lets you jump straight in and drive the Amtrak P42DC - Phase V in 'easy' or 'realistic' mode.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Laaers Car Transporter
summary: With our Laaers Car Transporter, we're setting new standards and introducing one of the most innovative carriers for Trainz A New Era!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Chiyoda Branch Line
summary: The Chiyoda Branch Line is the Tokyo Metro Line in Tokyo, Japan. This route will bring you the landscape of Japan's suburban city.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Avery - Drexel Route
summary: Discover the winding tracks through the iconic snowy hills of the famous North American freight and passenger route.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Orient Express Trainset
summary: The "King of the Trains" or the "Train of dreams" – the Orient Express consisted of several luxury trains and had its peak period in the 20s of the previous century.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: C&O Hinton Division
summary: Hinton Division, one of the major coal producing areas for the C&O, starting just west of Thurmond, WV through to Hinton, WV and also includes the Laurel Creek Sub Division, and parts of the Piney Creek Sub, Rend Sub and Loup Creek Sub.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Mojave Sub Division
summary: The Mojave Sub Division. Known for its rolling hills, drop off cliffs, and the famous Tehachapi Loop. This route is challenging with its constant grade changes, up to a ruling grade of 2.2%, but yet satisfying with its mixture of desert and mountainous scenery colors.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Shortline Railroad
summary: A fictional route in the USA where the Burlington Northern railroad uses GP38-2 locos to help serve the industries that rely on the railroad for their main source of transportation and for local runs on the main line. Welcome to the Shortline Railroad!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Shmmns Coil Transporter
summary: Get on board and extend your vehicle fleet with this highly detailed Shmmns-Coilwagon. Two sessions for the free Niddertalbahn route are included in this package.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Kickstarter County
summary: Based upon the famous Highland Valley route from the early days of Trainz, Kickstarter County has received a huge upgrade with new content, new track and new industries. This route is a tribute to all our Kickstarter Backers who helped make Trainz A New Era possible and includes a range of customized assets dedicated to our keenest...

name: Trick & Treat Remake
summary: This is the remake version of the free game Trick & Treat, with some visual updates such as redrawn maps and new UIs. It's a light-hearted Halloween adventure in a vampire's house, where you explore the mansion and solve puzzles in the spooky atmosphere.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: British Rail Class 70 - Freightliner
summary: Drive the highly detailed, modern British GE Class 70 in Freightliner livery in Trainz. Developed by 3DZUG for TRS19 using the latest PBR technologies, and many custom features!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Port Zyd & Fulazturn Railroad
summary: An industrial layout on an industrial scale! A busy and thriving railroad serving a large harbor and industrial area, moving freight cars around on behalf of a Class 1 railroad.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Inzer - South Ural Mountains
summary: A beautiful replica of the railways of central Eurasia, in the Ural mountain range.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Cornish Mainline and Branches TRS19
summary: This picturesque route runs between Truro and terminates in Penzance and includes Branch-lines to Falmouth (The Maritime Route), Helston, Hayle Wharves and St Ives.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: BNSF Railway EMD SD70MAC Executive Patch
summary: This Downloadable Content Pack includes the highly detailed BNSF Railway - SD70MAC Executive Patch model for use in the Trainz Simulator franchise

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: ECML Edinburgh - Dundee
summary: This well known route based in 1976 includes the Forth and Tay rail bridges and the stunning scenery along the Firth of Forth estuary.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Midwestern Branch
summary: Midwestern Branch is a fictional route based somewhere in the Midwestern section of the US. While the main line is owned and operated by BNSF, the branch line uses ex-Milwaukee Road units in both SD40-2 and GP38-2 styles to help serve the industries that are in the towns of Littleport, Levitt, Cylinder, and Mill Town.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: NS SD60E - Horsehead
summary: Norfolk Southern SD60E in the standard NS 'Horsehead' livery includes Brand new Custom Cab and in-cab Signals, Fan Animation, Ditch Lights, and more!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: NS SD60E - 6963 GoRail
summary: Norfolk Southern SD60E in the special NS GoRail livery includes Brand new Custom Cab and in-cab Signals, Fan Animation, Ditch Lights, and more!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: The BiDye Traction Railroad Route
summary: The BiDye Traction Railroad shows off the versatility of Trainz: A New Era by creating a virtual model railroad for you to explore and enjoy inside a large garage.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Balezino Mosti
summary: A route in the extent of 57 km between Balezino and Mosti, Russia. Beautifully detailed landscapes and an electrified railway connect these two cities.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Chicago & North Western GE C40-8
summary: Chicago and North Western Transportation Company (CNW) GE C40-8 locomotive.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Lone Pine Branch
summary: Drive the Lone Pine Branch, covering the 50 miles of UP track from Mojave yard to Searles, and the 30 miles of branchline operated by the Trona Railway Company from Searles to Trona.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Willamette & Pacific SD7 #1501
summary: This session lets you jump straight in and drive the Willamette & Pacific SD7 #1501 in 'easy' or 'realistic' mode. For the full experience, select 'Realistic Mode' and start driving this beautiful locomotive!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Brazemore Yard
summary: The Brazemore Yard has fantastic track work that hugs lush rolling hills as you drive through the picturesque countryside.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Coal Country
summary: Welcome to Coal Country! Take a trip through the heart of the Appalachian coal fields. This fictional route is complete with a brand new Railroad, locomotives, rolling stock, and scenery items.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Fall Harvest Nebraska
summary: It is harvest time again, long grain trains moving through typical Nebraska farming country to bring in this year's harvest. The Route centres on North Platte Nebraska, including the Bailey Yard.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: ZecRail V499 Blue & Gold and Christmas 2019
summary: ZecRail V499 Baldwin Compound - Blue and Gold and Christmas 2019

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: EMD GP50 - FRISCO
summary: Experience the power of the FRISCO GP50 with custom cab!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: EMD GP50 - Burlington Northern (Phase I)
summary: Experience the power of the Burlington Northern (Phase I) GP50 with custom cab!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Canadian Rocky Mountains Ottertail to Castle Jct
summary: Drive the picturesque Ottertail to Castle Junction section of the Canadian Rocky Mountains railway, travelling through the famouse U spiral tunnels!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Lafond Regional Railway
summary: Lafond regional railway is a 20 mile railway in the semi- prairie area in Canada. The route offers open farm fields, and a scenic line to Clearwater, and makes extensive use of TurfFX and other new features.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: CO17-3173 Russian Loco and Tender
summary: A series of freight locomotives CO (Sergo Ordzhonikidze, axle load 17 tonnes) designed for medium loads and working on lines with light rail. Built from 1934 to 1951 at the Kharkov, Bryansk, Voroshilovgrad, Krasnoyarsk and Ulan-Ude Locomotive Works. Total production of locomotives - 3049.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Sebino Lake, Italy
summary: The prototypical route represents the FerrovieNord line linking Brescia to Pisogne, at the mouth of the Camonica Valley, passing through the Franciacorta area, Iseo and the wonderful east coast of the Lake Iseo.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Blue Comet
summary: The Blue Comet add on pack recreates the excitement and splendour of a truly remarkable train.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: CO17-1471 Russian Loco and Tender
summary: A series of freight locomotives CO (Sergo Ordzhonikidze, axle load 17 tonnes) designed for medium loads and working on lines with light rail. Built from 1934 to 1951 at the Kharkov, Bryansk, Voroshilovgrad, Krasnoyarsk and Ulan-Ude Locomotive Works. Total production of locomotives - 3049.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: CSX EMD SD60
summary: This session lets you jump straight in and drive the CSX Transportation EMD SD60 in 'easy' or 'realistic' mode.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: DIC-Reefer (Mechanical Refrigerator)
summary: Mechanical Refrigerator (Reefer) have various products and textures, animation, running numbers, and sound.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Avmz Intercity 71
summary: Avmz Intercity 1st class passenger high quality car with 2 sessions for the "Niddertalbahn" track complete the package. Get on board and extend your vehicle fleet with these cars, which are rich in detail.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Victorian Railways Type 4 DD Class Pack - Canadian Red
summary: Victorian Railways DD class (Type 4- Wide Cab) 4-6-0 tender locomotives in Canadian Red and WW1 red.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: CN GP9 Phase I & II
summary: This session allows you to jump in and drive the CN GP9 Phase I and II locomotives in easy or realistic mode.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Southern Pacific AC4400CW 100-299
summary: Representation of SP AC4400s between the years 1998-2004. Cabs are exactly created to prototype specs including 2 cab radios and GE/Harris LOCOTROL IV equipment.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: JR Rolling Stock Pack TRS19
summary: This package is bursting with Jointed Rail rolling stock all ready for you to drive in TRS19!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: The Innter Kohn Necktion Railroad
summary: The Innter Kohn Necktion Railroad has both a standard gauge and narrow gauge for this superb TRS19 model railroad layout.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Victorian Railways V Class 2 Tone Green

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: EMD SD40-2 - Maersk
summary: Experience the power of the Maersk SD40-2 with custom cab!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: QJ Steam Locomotive
summary: Experience one of the most powerful Chinese locomotives ever made with the China Railway QJ class locomotive.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: NS SD60E - 6920 Veterans Unit
summary: Experience the power of the NS SD60E - 6920 Veterans Unit as you shunt the yard and make your freight run!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: The Broadway Limited
summary: 3DZUG is taking you back to the golden ages of the American railroads and brings you one of the most famous US trains, Pennsylvania Railroad's "Broadway Limited".

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Amtrak P42DC - Phase III
summary: Amtrak P42DC locomotive in Phase III livery. Feature full custom cab, automatic running numbers, animated wipers, gecko script, and more.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: CO17-4173 Russian Loco and Tender
summary: A series of freight locomotives CO (Sergo Ordzhonikidze, axle load 17 tonnes) designed for medium loads and working on lines with light rail. Built from 1934 to 1951 at the Kharkov, Bryansk, Voroshilovgrad, Krasnoyarsk and Ulan-Ude Locomotive Works. Total production of locomotives - 3049.

summary: A rural and largely single track connection between UP and BNSF owned main lines.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Newcastle Shunter
summary: Shunt several coal cars, car carriers and cement hoppers around TYNE the massive rail yard just outside Newcastle station. Full scripted shunting session with cut-scenes and audio task details and commentary.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Rheingold 1962
summary: It was the German equivalent to the famous Orient Express - the exquisite Rheingold.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Chicago North Western GE Dash 9 44CW
summary: This session lets you jump straight in and drive the Chicago North Western GE Dash 9 44CW in 'easy' or 'realistic' mode.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Japan - Model Trainz
summary: This layout is inspired by the Okayama Prefecture, Japan. It is designed for busy train traffic, and features a great range of challenging sessions. There are also some display cabinets where you can put trains on for stationary display.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Trainz Route - Rostovsky Uzel
summary: The route is based on a real section of the North Caucasian railway, located in the Rostov region of the Russian Federation.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: US ATC Class S 160 Steam
summary: This pack contains two versions of this unique steam locomotive, as well as one session for the "Kickstarter County" route. Treat yourself to something special, sniff the air of yesteryear and drive one of the locomotives built in great quantities in days gone past.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: CO17-1171 Russian Loco and Tender
summary: A series of freight locomotives CO (Sergo Ordzhonikidze, axle load 17 tonnes) designed for medium loads and working on lines with light rail. Built from 1934 to 1951 at the Kharkov, Bryansk, Voroshilovgrad, Krasnoyarsk and Ulan-Ude Locomotive Works. Total production of locomotives - 3049.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Canadian Rocky Mountains - Rogers Pass
summary: Rogers Pass is one of those subsections that will submerge you in sheer beauty and awe regarding landscape and railways - the Rocky Mountains at its majestic best! Route includes 4 Sessions.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: CO17-4171 Russian Loco and Tender
summary: A series of freight locomotives CO (Sergo Ordzhonikidze, axle load 17 tonnes) designed for medium loads and working on lines with light rail. Built from 1934 to 1951 at the Kharkov, Bryansk, Voroshilovgrad, Krasnoyarsk and Ulan-Ude Locomotive Works. Total production of locomotives - 3049.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Legacy of the Burlington Northern II
summary: Legacy of the BN II is a beautifully mastered proto-fictional route from Jointed Rail. Complete with custom content, locomotive and rolling stock packs this route will provide hours and hours of endless fun and entertainment.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Union Pacific GE C40-8
summary: The GE C40-8 is a 6-axle diesel-electric locomotive built by GE Transportation Systems between 1987 and 1992. It is part of the GE Dash 8 Series of freight locomotives, and its wheel arrangement is of a C-C type. his locomotive model is often referred to as a Dash 8-40S or simply "Dash 8".

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: CO17-4373 Russian Loco and Tender
summary: A series of freight locomotives CO (Sergo Ordzhonikidze, axle load 17 tonnes) designed for medium loads and working on lines with light rail. Built from 1934 to 1951 at the Kharkov, Bryansk, Voroshilovgrad, Krasnoyarsk and Ulan-Ude Locomotive Works. Total production of locomotives - 3049.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: SNCF - AGC Languedoc
summary: The AGC trains were designed by Bombardier. These railcars feature a modular interior and flexible power options (diesel, electric, or hybrid 'bi-mode' versions). The version included is a hybrid Diesel + 1500v DC version in 'Languedoc' livery and is now available to add to your Trainz collection.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: CO17-1374 Russian Loco and Tender
summary: A series of freight locomotives CO (Sergo Ordzhonikidze, axle load 17 tonnes) designed for medium loads and working on lines with light rail. Built from 1934 to 1951 at the Kharkov, Bryansk, Voroshilovgrad, Krasnoyarsk and Ulan-Ude Locomotive Works. Total production of locomotives - 3049.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: British Rail Class 70 - Colas Rail
summary: Drive the highly detailed, modern British GE Class 70 in Colas Rail livery in Trainz. Developed by 3DZUG for TRS19 using the latest PBR technologies, and many custom features!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Canadian Rocky Mountains Viktor Lake to Ross Peak and Glacier
summary: Drive through the Canadian Rocky Mountains between Viktor Lake, through the famous CPR McDonald and Connaught tunnels, to Ross Peak and Glacier.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: CSX Transportation GE B30-7
summary: This Downloadable Content Pack includes the highly detailed CSX GE B30-7 model for use in the Trainz Simulator franchise games.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: DBuz 747 Passenger Cars
summary: The cars are still to be found on Germany's railways today. They are the backbone of local traffic: the famous double-deck car, affectionately known as 'Dostos' for short.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Victorian Railways D1 Class (Type 4 - Newport) Black
summary: Victorian Railways D1 class (Type 4- Wide Cab) 4-6-0 tender locomotives in all over black.

name: Trainz: A New Era - Route: Canadian Rocky Mountains - Columbia River Basin
summary: The beautiful Canadian Rocky Mountain - Columbia River Basin covers a staggering 2000 sq km making it one of the largest routes ever created in Trainz. Includes 6 sessions!

name: Trainz: A New Era - Route: Beavermouth to Ottertail
summary: This route extends the beautiful landscapes of the Rocky Mountains by expanding the original Canadian Rocky Mountains - Columbia River Basin route.

name: Trainz: A New Era - Route: Cornish Mainline & Branches
summary: The Cornish Main Line was originally built by two separate railway companies, the West Cornwall Railway between Truro and Penzance, opened in 1852, and the Cornwall Railway between Plymouth and a separate station in Truro, opened in 1859.

name: Trainz: A New Era - Route: Brazemore Yard
summary: The Brazemore Yard has fantastic track work that hugs lush rolling hills to give the feeling of driving through the countryside.

name: Trainz: A New Era - Route: Japan - Model Trainz
summary: This layout is inspired by the Okayama Prefecture, Japan. It is designed for busy train traffic, and features a great range of challenging sessions. There are also some display cabinets where you can put trains on for stationary display.

name: Trainz: A New Era - Route: Franklin Avenue Industrial
summary: Franklin Avenue Industrial is a small one baseboard Model Railroadz route inspired by the track plan, 59th Street Branch by Stan Sweatt as featured in Model Railroader Workshop Tips. Franklin Ave is located in Anywhere USA but contains mostly North Eastern influence.

name: Trainz: A New Era - Route: Rostovsky Uzel
summary: The route is based on a real section of the North Caucasian railway, located in the Rostov region of the Russian Federation.

name: Trainz: A New Era - Route: The Shorts and Kerl Traction Railroad
summary: The Shortz & Kerl Railroad was an electrified short line that began freight services in the early part of the Twentieth Century, linking Port Shortz with the Kerl Iron Works.

name: Trainz: A New Era - Route: Mojave Sub Division
summary: The Mojave Sub Division. Known for its rolling hills, drop off cliffs, and the famous Tehachapi Loop. This route is challenging with its constant grade changes, up to a ruling grade of 2.2%, but yet satisfying with its mixture of desert and mountainous scenery colors.

name: Trainz: A New Era - Route: Bea-Dawe Model Railway
summary: This British Diesel-era layout includes several stations, goods yards and engine facilities and was inspired by memories of growing up in the Midlands spending many hours standing on the side of the Lickey Bank with Granddad watching the trains go past.

name: Trainz: A New Era - Route: Balezino Mosti
summary: A route in the extent of 57 km between Balezino and Mosti, Russia. Beautifully detailed landscapes and an electrified railway connect these two cities.

name: Trainz: A New Era - Route: Midwestern Branch
summary: Midwestern Branch is a fictional route based somewhere in the Midwestern section of the US. While the main line is owned and operated by BNSF, the branch line uses ex-Milwaukee Road units in both SD40-2 and GP38-2 styles to help serve the industries that are in the towns of Littleport, Levitt, Cylinder, and Mill Town.

name: Trainz: A New Era - Route: Fall Harvest Nebraska
summary: It is harvest time again, long grain trains moving through typical Nebraska farming country to bring in this year's harvest. The Route centres on North Platte Nebraska, including the Bailey Yard.

name: Trainz: A New Era - Route: Port Zyd & Fulazturn Railroad
summary: An industrial layout on an industrial scale! The Port Zyd & Fulazturn Railroad represents a busy and thriving railroad serving a large harbor and industrial area, moving freight cars around on behalf of a Class 1 railroad. The Class 1 railroad delivers and picks up freight cars at the Transfer Yard.

name: Trainz: A New Era - Route: Appen
summary: "Appen" is a fictitious route set in West Yorkshire (or should I say the West Riding) in the 1950 - 60's. Appen represents an industrial town located between Leeds and Bradford served by the London Midland with services from the North Eastern region of British Railways.

name: Trainz: A New Era - Route: Chiyoda Branch Line
summary: The Chiyoda Branch Line is the Tokyo Metro Line in Tokyo, Japan. This route will bring you the landscape of Japan's suburban city.

name: Trainz: A New Era - Route: Niddertalbahn
summary: An idyllic, single-track branch line in Wetterau- and Main-Kinzig-Kreis - and best of all it's free!

name: Trainz: A New Era - Route: Belarusian Woodland
summary: The Belarusian woodlands is a beautiful landscape featuring many forests, lakes and rivers. Includes 4 sessions plus a bonus steam locomotive - CO17-1171.

name: Trainz: A New Era - Route: Legacy of the Burlington Northern II
summary: Legacy of the BN II is a beautifully mastered proto-fictional route from Jointed Rail. Complete with custom content, locomotive and rolling stock packs this route will provide hours and hours of endless fun and entertainment.

name: Trainz: A New Era - Route: Coal Country
summary: Welcome to Coal Country! Take a trip through the heart of the Appalachian coal fields. This fictional route is complete with a brand new Railroad, locomotives, rolling stock, and scenery items.

name: Trainz: A New Era - Route: Settle and Carlisle
summary: Updated for TANE - Settle & Carlisle takes you to one of the most famous and scenic British main lines at the time of the transition from steam to diesel power. 25 sessions across 5 routes with all with new speedtrees and procedural tracks this is one you'll want to pick up and drive!

name: Treasure Tomb VR
summary: TreasureTombVR is a VR and First Person adventure game for solo or multiplayer. You must progress through large scale levels by solving puzzles and overcoming challenges to find the long-lost treasure. So, choose your character, gather your friends or go alone, and enter the Treasure Tomb.

name: Troublemaker
summary: Troublemaker tells the story of friendship, chaos, romance, and strife between school gangs. Defeat the enemy gangs, Seize their territory, And become the ruler of the School in the Strongest High School here.

name: Travel Solar
summary: This game is to drive the spacecraft to explore the 9 planets in the solar system, such as: Venus, earth, Mars, Jupiter, etc.

name: True Spring Love
summary: True Spring Love is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: TranscendPang
summary: TranscendPang is a freeware doujin shoot 'em up created by wosderge. The game's gameplay is mostly derived from the classic arcade game Buster Bros., also known as Pang, but with some key differences. Where Buster Bros. may be described as an action game, TranscendPang takes the basic "Pang" format and turns it into a frantic shoot 'em up experience. The soundtrack features several artists from the Japanese doujin and rhythm game scenes.

name: Trilogy Kuki Youka Shinden
summary: The fight of the Kuki and Yasha clans continues from the Meiji Restoration. Yasha clan member is weaving threads around the heroine Kuki Kyoha.

name: Traditional Tactics Ne+
summary: You are "Prince Natri", explore the dungeon "Royal Tomb" to be the king. In there, many spirits are waiting to make a trial of your courage. Let's fight and try the simulation battle with your units!

name: Treasure Hunter Simulator 2
summary: Once you've found all the artifacts in part one, it's time to test yourself in the new, revolutionary high-quality, Treasure Hunter Simulator 2.

name: Trash is Fun
summary: Trash is Fun is a coop moving lowpoly waste sorting and recycling simulator that is developed by teenagers from the studio Martian Teapots. The glaciers melted, because of this, a virus was released, which gave the mind to animals. After they decided to sort and recycle trash.

name: Tricks Magician
summary: Tricks Magician is a game about a magician who has been trapped in an alternate reality because of his assistant rabbit's revenge, and now must overcome several challenges with a defying gravity and return to your normal world.

name: Train Simulator: Southern Pacific U33C Loco Add-On
summary: Classic 1960s and 1970s-era General Electric "U-Boat" diesel locomotives come to Train Simulator with the Southern Pacific U33C/U30C pack from accomplished developer DTM.

name: Train Simulator: Tauernbahn: Schwarzach-Sankt Veit - Spittal an der Drau Route Add-On
summary: Welcome to the Austrian Alps, traverse challenging terrain and embark on unique journeys with RSSLO's Tauernbahn for Train Simulator.

name: Train Simulator: South Devon Main Line: Highbridge and Burnham - Plymouth Route Add-On
summary: Explore the iconic Devonian countryside, from rolling hills to famous sea walls, with Just Trains' sprawling South Devon Main Line for Train Simulator.

name: Travel the Countries
summary: Travel the Countries is a stand-alone card game based on the pre-Qin and Warring States era. Each profession has its own unique cards and skills, with unique neutral cards to form a variety of routines, go to defeat powerful enemies and attack every battle!

name: Train Valley: Germany
summary: All aboard! We are moving straight to Germany! Explore 6 new levels of railroad history with the German Season DLC for Train Valley, starting from the first German railroads and World War I to the fall of the Berlin Wall and modern Frankfurt Airport.

name: Tropico 6: Caribbean Skies
summary: The beloved leader El Presidente sets out to conquer the Caribbean Skies! The biggest DLC for Tropico 6 to date takes the fun to new altitudes with - drones.

name: Tropico 6: Lobbyistico
summary: Join the EU in their investigations into 'corruptionomics' and unlock new powerful perks in 'Lobbyistico' for Tropico 6.

name: Tropico 6: Spitter
summary: It's all about the fame and prestige. Nobody knows this better than a self-declared statesman, such as El Presidente. Tropico 6's second DLC skyrockets you into the world of stardom and illustriousness.

name: Tropico 6: The Llama of Wall Street
summary: It's time to play in the major leagues! El Presidente is descending on the world of international brands, big time. Power in politics is never enough for a man with ambitions as great as El Prez, so join forces with the trustworthy broker, and help Tropico to establish its status as a global megabrand.

name: Trainz: A New Era - Quinnimont Coal Drag
summary: This package includes the "C&O 2-6-6-6 H8" locomotive and a brand new detailed session. Quinnimont was a marshaling yard for coal loads from the surrounding mines. Trains were assembled here to be shipped to Clifton Forge and beyond. Empty cars were also made-up here for the mines in the area.

name: Train Simulator 2021: BR Class 07 Loco Add-On
summary: One of the smallest classes of diesel shunters built for workings around one of the UK's largest dockyards is now here for Train Simulator 2021. The diminutive 0-6-0 Class 07 shunter was designed specifically for use within Southampton Dockyard and to replace aging tank steam locomotives used previously.

name: Train Simulator 2021: Western Sichuan Pass: Dujiangyan - Maoxian & Mashancun Route Add-On
