summary: Experience a true London veteran that harkens back to the Art Deco era, a unit that defined Underground commuting for generations. Mind the gap, as Rivet Games' London Underground 1938 Stock has arrived in Train Sim World 2 for yesteryear Bakerloo Line operations!

name: Train Sim World 2: New Journeys Expansion
summary: Take on new challenges and explore more from London Underground, CSX and Deutsche Bahn with Train Sim World 2: New Journeys Expansion.

name: Tribal
summary: TRIBAL is a Persistent Online Multiplayer Real Time 2D Strategy game where you take the role of Tribe Chieftain and lead your medieval tribe to global domination… or not. The fight for survival goes on with or without you. Prepare your Tribe for greatness and try not to sleep too much.

name: Trailmakers: High Seas Expansion
summary: High Seas introduces the biggest map to date with huge expanses of land to discover, both above and underwater. Prepare for huge waves and rainstorms while you explore the world. Travel from the tropic southern islands to the freezing cold north. Dive into the deep sea to search for hidden treasures

name: Traffic Dispatcher
summary: Make sure the traffic flows smoothly and that the vehicles do not crash into each other.

name: Truco
summary: A fun card game where you must use your skills to win.

name: Travelers in Space Crack
summary: Travelers in Space Crack is a survive game in deep space. Explore in different galaxy through space cracks. To find and gather useful resource, to trade and make money are all important to develop your own fleets. And only through build massive fleets, you triumph over the unknown evil forces.

name: Trick Shot Ping Pong
summary: This game is a physics based trick shot game. Improve your trick shot skills. It's a really difficult game.

name: Trigger
summary: Trigger is a 3d side-scrolling, photorealistic, adventure game that lets you take control of a young ball named Neo. Since you were gifted with special abilities, you will be tested on whether you're good enough to be sent on real missions.

name: Train Simulator Classic: Salzburg - Rosenheim Route
summary: All aboard for Austria! Take charge of cross-border passenger & freight traffic with RSSLO’s Salzburg - Rosenheim route for Train Simulator.

name: Treasure Island
summary: A game for the GamePark 32.

name: Trippers: Kanojo to no Gakuen Seikatsu o Hakai Suru, Ittsuu no Tegami
Trivial Pursuit Live! 2
summary:
Challenge other players from all around the world or compete against your streaming viewers on Twitch.

With hundreds of new questions, adapted level of difficulties, and a diverse line-up of characters, everyone can join the party and enjoy the thrill of a fast-paced TV show experience. Take your place on stage to showcase your knowledge and face off against friends and family to collect as many wedges as you can to take home the win!

name: True Racing
summary: A game kart-like game which main goal is to beat the tournament for "the soberany of the world and take back the democracy credibility"... or so... at least to the one you choose to help within his/her own political race.

name: Train of the Century
summary: Train of the Century is a railroad simulator RPG built on the WAX blockchain. Players are known as "Railroaders" and can build trains, deliver commodities to player-owned stations, interact with the lore-rich "Centuryverse," and embark on an intricate sci-fi fantasy story.

name: Tradle
summary: A daily geography guessing game, where players are initially given data about a country's exports to assist in guessing the correct country.

name: Trust No Bunny
summary:
Everybunny has a secret. Who do you trust to keep the town safe?

Trust No Bunny is a 5-8 player social deduction mission game for fans of Avalon, Town of Salem, Among Us, or Werewolf, actively being developed by new studio Friendly Pixel. It's a game for thinkers, schemers, and downright liars, where guessing the traitor is only half the battle.

name: Tricking 0
summary: Welcome to Tricking 0, the first ever tricking video game ! Use the Flick-it gameplay to Flip, Twist and Kick and Combine 100+ Tricks to express your own creativity. Challenge your friends or bots in the multiplayer modes, practice bigger and harder combos in free mode and become the best tricker !

name: Train Station Renovation: Germany
summary: Continue your journey as a renovation company specialised in restoring railway stations in Train Station Renovation - Germany DLC! 9 new stations inspired by real life equivalents await your arrival - your steady and reliable hand is required once again!

name: Trivia Party
summary: A mix of trivia and a classic board game. What else can you ask from a game to enjoy with your friends and family? Trivia Party is a local multiplayer game that mixes a ludo game and a trivia competition. Obtain better results in the trivia, and get a better dice for the ludo. Check it out!

name: Tree Simulator 2023
summary: It's exactly what it sounds like! Have you ever wanted to be a tree? Do you like odd numbers? How about multiplayer, weather, seasons and more!? Well then this is the game for you! Come on down to a place where you will never want to leaf. Relax and be the best tree you can be. 1-250 players.

name: Train Simulator Classic: New Zealand Ja Class Steam Loco
summary: Get to work in this Greyhound of a locomotive, unrivalled authenticity and unparalleled detail come together in the form of the the NZ Ja Class, lovingly crafted by NZTS Workshops for historic Midland Line duty!

name: Train Simulator Classic: Tohoku High Speed & Main Line Route
summary: Take on the challenge of breath-taking high-speed Shinkansen services, famed for being on time to the second, as well as more local commuter traffic in Tōhoku High Speed & Main Line from Just Trains and Union Workshop!

name: Train Simulator: Union Pacific F3 Loco
summary: In the history of American locomotives few diesels are more famous nor left a greater legacy than the Electro-Motive F3. Successor to the landmark EMD FT & the first of the fabled “F-units” rated at 1,500 horsepower, the F3 went to work for over 50 U.S. railroads across the breadth of the continent.

name: Trollface Quest
summary: Are you bored with some standard quests? Try the one that will make you laugh and marvel every time you reach a new level! Even if you are an experienced player and solve all the quest puzzles like a pro, you will need to make your brain work hard to get through the levels of the original Trollface game. Don't look for a standard solution! Be ready to activate your creativity and logic!

name: Tricky Typing
summary: Compete against your friends in this Absolutely Ridiculous Typing game! Using every single button on your controller (and then some), your typing skills will be put to the TEST as you type out each letter to compete in this Extravaganza >:)

name: Trigger Spree
summary: Putting the Fun back in F.P.S., Trigger Spree is an unrealistic, fast-paced Multiplayer FPS with focus on variety, speed, and simplicity. Spanning across many themes and settings, the insane weapons and unique maps provide a Triggering experience!

name: Train Sim World 2: S-Bahn Zentralschweiz - Luzern: Sursee Route
summary: Experience the thrill of racing around tight bends, tackling steep gradients, and providing an intense passenger service in the heart of Switzerland. State-of-the-art traction and systems await with Rivet Games’ S-Bahn Zentralschweiz: Luzern - Sursee!

name: Train Sim World 2: Harlem Line - Grand Central Terminal: North White Plains Route
summary: Operate modern and classic equipment as you ferry commuters in and out of the iconic Grand Central Terminal; hurry them across the tightly packed Park Avenue, over the Harlem River, and out to the New York suburbs with Train Sim World 2: Harlem Line.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022
summary: Drive, Explore, Operate and Create the railroad of your dreams together with Multiplayer Surveyor! TRS22 Showcases a range of brand new routes, sessions and trains for you to experience as well as the most advanced Trainz Simulator features ever!

name: Train Sim World 2: Horseshoe Curve: Altoona - Johnstown & South Fork Route
summary: In American railroading, there are few places that evoke more history and drama than Horseshoe Curve, and now, as today operated by railroading giant Norfolk Southern, it comes to Train Sim World 2!

name: Try to Win 2
summary: 2d platformer with puzzle elements, where its up to the player to overcome difficult obstacles while gradually learning about the unfolding story. Can you make it to the end?

name: Treasure Girl 3D 2
summary: “Treasure Girl 2” is our new game with 2 beautiful naked girls in different poses. With awesome 3D animation!

name: Truck Simulator USA Car Games: Driving games & Car 2022
summary: Drive a real truck in Truck Simulator USA! Become an American truck driver and show your driver skills. Choose cargo and drive it. Transport cargo to city warehouses. Upgrade your truck for better driving and earning more money. Fix and refuel an American truck at service stations, fuel station. Avoid driving cargo above speed limit, follow driving rules for the transport. Spend money wisely and enjoy day and night driving.

name: Train Sim World: CSX Heavy Haul
summary: Train Sim World: CSX Heavy Haul is an all-new First Person Simulator that brings to life the experience of operating powerful and heavy freight trains on one of America's most stunning and famous railroads; Sand Patch Grade.

name: Traditional Braves
summary: Traditional Simulation RPG with Great Thinking Program "SESS-AI"!

name: Traumatarium
summary: A randomly generated Game Boy dungeon crawler

name: Trash Pit
summary: A frantic twin stick shooter where you and your enemies are only ever one hit from death. Mow down relentless waves of robots, collect upgrades and claw your way to the highest score you can.

name: Trick or Treat
summary: Trick or Treat - is an effective and hardcore 2D platformer with surviving elements where you will have to do various levels playing like a Jack-o-lantern.

name: Tremblay Island
summary: The French-venture has returned... now on Steam!

name: Truck Go
summary:
TruckGo - Deliver goods to the marketplace with your truck. Collect coins to get advanced trucks, wheels and vip cards.
You will need to get from one place to another without dropping too much from your truck. You will get a precise number of pieces you carry and a precise number of pieces that is required. The more you bring, the more score and coins you get.

name: Trenches II
summary: Lead the troops through over 100 locations in a non-linear campaign - engaging in many of the most decisive and game-changing battles of the entire conflict. Customize your army with more than 20 different units. Win battles to earn Perk points and upgrade your offensive, defensive and support forces.

name: Trulon
summary: Enter a world of steampunk and magic by experiencing the debut title of the Trulon series. Trulon - The Shadow Engine is an adventure RPG with a unique card combat system. Battle enemies mutated by magic as you explore the kingdoms of peaceful Tripudia and dangerous Maelon. Unravel the threads of an insidious plot and uncover dark secrets to help bring an end to the mysterious disease threatening Tripudia.

name: Trails of Illusion
summary: This is a JRPG free-to-play fan game with reference to the Falcom Trails series, and the battle mode is turn-based combat.

name: Train Simulator Classic
summary: Welcome to the ultimate railway hobby! Master complex operations on the DB BR 411 ICE T, BR Class 390 Pendolino, Union Pacific AC4400CW, and more as you explore authentic routes. Whatever you love about trains, Train Simulator Classic lets you take your hobby to the next level.

name: Travel to GolemPark
summary: A classic adventure quest, in the setting of an alternative future. Help the main character gather friends and go on a trip to the festival.

name: Treasure Grab
summary: Become a master thief and prove your skills on the path of misdeeds! Choose your targets, confuse guards, pick locks, annoy nobles, and steal everything that has not been nailed down! Jewels, paintings, tableware, paintings and cakes, it's all worth stuffing into your sack. And in a pinch, summon the Trickster Spirits to don on a disguise, slow down time or turn invisible to confuse the guards! The night is yours - it's up to you to decide how to rule it.

name: Traumada
summary: Welcome to the horrific altered memories of my childhood home.

name: Triga
summary: Slap triangular tiles down in this cause and effect, chain reactive, radically funky puzzle experience! Collect as many golden triangles as you can to unlock new levels, but don't sweat it if you aren't a triangle-brained genius: Each stage has 3 goals ranging from casual fun, to extreme puzzling!

name: Tratritle
summary: A little master lived happily with his maids. But what bothered him was that the maids were too naive and simple. One day, he received a letter from his father. He thought he could solve the current problem... But unexpectedly, another succubus maid came. Will he still be a good boy or...?

name: Train Simulator: Glasgow Subway Route
summary: Go round and round under the heart of Scotland’s most populous city with Thomson Interactive’s authentic rendition of the Glasgow Subway in Train Simulator!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Coalmint Mountains Railroad
summary: The Coalmint Mountains Railroad (CMR) is a 50mile route based in Pennsylvania in the Appalachian Mountains in the 1950s. There are many steep grades to climb, and even more tight corners to wind as you explore the majesty of the Appalachian Mountains in Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter all by rail.

name: Train Simulator: Bahnstrecke Leipzig - Riesa Route
summary: Hurry along Germany’s oldest long-distance railway in its entirety, from the densely packed city of Leipzig, and out far east via Wurzen and Riesa into historical Dresden with Train Simulator’s Bahnstrecke Leipzig - Riesa Route Extension!

name: Traffic Safety
summary: This game is used to educate everyone on the importance of traffic safety.

name: Trial Xtreme Freedom
summary:
Gear up for high-speed action in Trial Xtreme Freedom! Blaze through Career Mode, compete in Global Tournaments, craft unique bikes, and become a racing legend!

Get ready for the adrenaline-pumping motorcycle racing experience of a lifetime in Trial Xtreme Freedom! Take full control of your destiny as you rev up your engines and embark on a thrilling journey through a world of high-speed, death-defying tricks, and two-wheeled excitement.

Experience Multiplayer Social Racing and go head-to-head in global races against real players. Feel the rush as you challenge friends and rivals in real-time, PVP races, and prove who the real champion is. The competition is fierce, and victory has never been more satisfying!

name: Trash Patrol: Academic Version
summary: Trash Patrol is a local cooperative multiplayer game for 2-4 players. Break into a house, look for something to steal together with your raccoon friends. Don’t forget to wash and dry all items carefully! And watch out for the homeowner - They are not amused to see you within their home

name: Trade Sails
summary: Ever wanted to deliver cargos amongst the islands that waiting you to discover! In Trade Sails, you will sail for the delivery of cargos, while a shadow is waiting for you at the sea.

name: Transformers: The Game
summary:
The PSP port of Transformers: The Game.
It has one campaign mixing new Autobot and Decepticons segments, after splitting from the shared starting point with the original game, featuring new playable character missions and going to more locations than the original.
It also has a multiplayer mode using the systems local multiplayer with more Decepticons playable and additional unlockable characters.

The Game features more than 20 playable TRANSFORMERS characters with three combat modes and 19 story-based missions that have players playing both AUTOBOTS and DECEPTICONS as they progress through the game. In addition, gamers can battle in four-player Ad Hoc wireless competitions including Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch, Ascension Rites (king of the hill) and Secure the Energon (capture the flag), in more than 10 multiplayer arenas.

name: True Fortune
summary: True Fortune is an otome game, developed and published by Enterbrain, which was released in Japan in 2008.

name: Treasures of Captain Sam
summary:
Explore an old mansion filled with fun games, hidden traps, and challenging "I Spy" riddles. During your exploration you will help Captain Sam find his family's long lost treasure. Encounter challenges and wonderful surprises as you guide Sam through these fascinating adventures. Dive into the "Hidden Object: Treasures of Captain Sam" adventure game.
This Premium Edition does not contain any ads.

name: Train Valley 2: Myths and Rails
summary: Myths And Rails unleashes the most bizarre and silly episodes of your railroad transportation company’s everyday schedule. Intergalactic trade agreements, alternate timelines, forgotten treasures and flying cars - timely deliveries are the key to success.

name: Trogday Micro Game
summary: It's Trogdor's 19th Trogday and he's out to smote him a Kerrek. Squish all the peasants while avoiding the knights to achieve burnination. Then burninate all the cottages to face off against the Kerrek himself.

name: Transport INC: Seamanship
summary: Expand your Transport INC gameplay into the oceans of the world. New vehicles, events, custom routes, water themed maps, and more await beyond the water horizon.

name: Train Sim World 2: Spirit of Steam - Liverpool Lime Street: Crewe Route
summary: Step back in time and discover the soot and sounds of the romantic steam era; climb aboard iconic living locomotives hungry for coal and water, and work hard on busy passenger and freight services through historic Merseyside and Cheshire with Train Sim World 2: Spirit of Steam!

name: True Lies
summary: It's not like he's saving the world or anything. Oh, yes it is! As special agent Harry Tasker, it's up to you to prevent a nuclear holocaust and stop the Crimson Jihad! Experience all the explosive intensity of TRUE LIES - including never-before-seen secret missions! All the action of the movie mega hit - and none of the romance!

name: Treasure Seekers: Follow the Ghosts Collector's Edition
Trash Patrol
summary:
Trash Patrol is a cooperative multiplayer game for 2-4 players. You and one or more of your friends break into a house. Your goal: Steal every item within the given time!

But be aware of the homeowner! They do not condone raccoons running around their house and trashing it! If they spot you: Run!

name: Treats Please!
summary: This is a retro-styled puzzle game about keeping a hungry pet happy with tasty treats. Choosing treats the pet will enjoy will reduce their hunger strength level and choosing things they cannot eat will only make them hungrier!

name: Trinity Trigger
summary: Trinity Trigger is an action role-playing video game developed by Three Rings and published by FuRyu in Japan. Published in Europe and Australia by Marvelous Europe and in North America by XSEED Games, Trinity Trigger features a star-studded group of RPG developers including worldbuilding artist Yuki Nobuteru (Secret of Mana), character designer Raita Kazama (Xenoblade), scenario writer Yura Kubota (OCTOPATH TRAVELER), and composer Hiroki Kikuta (Secret of Mana).

name: Trainsmission
summary: There's been a murder on the train, capture the criminal but make sure not to accuse an innocent person!

name: Traveler
summary: Traveler is a short work of interactive fiction about identity, existence, purpose, and loss. It features four endings and infinite procedurally-generated planets.

name: Tricky Doors
summary: Tricky doors is a captivating game that offers a variety of puzzles. Find a creative way to get out of each room. Tricky doors is a point-and-click game in the "escape the room" genre with plenty of mini-games and complicated quests.

name: Triangle Strategy: Tacticians's Limited Edition
developers: Square Enix Creative Business Unit II

name: Trash Horror Collection
summary: Welcome to a true 80's trash horror experience. This collection has 8 short horror games that you can freely choose which one you want to play.

name: Trespasser 2
summary: A first-person action horror game about breaking into your enemy's house and seeking vengeance for the torment you have received in your past.

name: Trapdoors
summary: A game for Playdate - Make them fall into the right pit!

name: Try Me
summary: Try Me is a 3D Platform game where moving a ball to a floating square has never been more difficult. This game is completely torque based and all about momentum.

name: Treefender
summary: Relive your childhood in Treefender: a VR-exclusive 4 player online co-op game where you build your own treefort and defend it against an alien invasion!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Industrial Switching
summary: Somewhere in Canada, in the city of Longview, offers a challenging industrial park that will challenge the train crews critical thinking skills to navigate and properly spot the freight cars. Industrial Switching is an industrial themed route servicing 15 industries.

name: Traffic Safety: Air Scrambled Hard
summary: This game is used to educate everyone on the importance of traffic safety. Pilot the plane carefully to avoid the birds on the route. The DLC will adjust the game's difficulty to Hard mode from the 31st mission.

name: Trainz Plus
summary: Drive, Explore, Operate and Create the railroad of your dreams - and now collaborate in real time with Multiplayer Surveyor! And with Trainz Plus memberships, you get more content, more features and the latest Trainz has to offer!

name: Trainz Plus: Znamensk-Svir
summary: Znamensk-Svir: A fictional route, built on the motives of the North-West of Russia. The Znamensk-Svir section is a two-track electrified section of alternating current with a length of 70 kilometers.

name: Trainz Plus: ZecRail V499 Blue & Gold and Christmas 2019
summary: ZecRail V499 Baldwin Compound - Blue and Gold and Christmas 2019

name: Trainz Plus: Warwick to Wallangarra Route
summary: Follow the QR Southern railway line through the Darling Downs and into Granite country, right to the border with New South Wales.

name: Trainz Plus: ZecRail 2017 Christmas Train
summary: This year, ZecRail brings you the new type 4 D1 class locomotive decorated for Christmas 2017, with a string of goods wagons and passenger carriages to bring Christmas cheer to the people in your virtual world!

name: Trainz Plus: VR Healesville 1913-1920 TRS19
summary: Drive classic Victorian Railways steam locomotives through the famed Yarra Valley, north east of Melbourne, during the WW1 era. Comes with a selection of pre-made sessions, a pre-made multiplayer freeplay session, and a variety of Victorian Railways steam locomotives and rolling stock.

name: Trainz Plus: Victorian Railways V class FL Black
summary: Drive the Victorian Railways V class steam locomotive, painted in a freelance black livery with 3 levels of weathering.

name: Trainz Plus: Victorian Railways V499 - Baldwin Built
summary: Victorian Railways V499 2-8-0 Baldwin Compound in Baldwin Green and Canadian Red.

name: Trainz Plus: Victorian Railways Type 4 DD Class Pack - Canadian Red
summary: Victorian Railways DD class (Type 4- Wide Cab) 4-6-0 tender locomotives in Canadian Red and WW1 red.

name: Trainz Plus: Victorian Railways Type 2 DD Class Pack
summary: 5 locomotives, in 5 liveries, in broad gauge and standard gauge (10 locomotives total)

name: Trainz Plus: Utah Belt AC4400CW 4400-4450
summary: Representation of the fictional and popular HO scale layout railroad Utah Belt AC4400s. As per the HO scale prototype models these units have functional gyra lights.

name: Trainz Plus: US ATC Class S 160 Steam
summary: This pack contains two versions of this unique steam locomotive, as well as one session for the “Kicksarter County“ route. Treat yourself to something special, sniff the air of yesteryear and drive one of the locomotives built in great quantities in days gone past.

name: Trainz Plus: UP AC4400CW #5982-6081
summary: The 5982-6081 Series was delivered to the Union Pacific Railroad between the years of 2004/2005. This delivery was the very last AC4400CW order from GE for the UP. This model is a representation of this series between the years 2010 to current. Cabs are exactly created to prototype.

name: Trainz Plus: Victorian Railways D1 Class - Type 4: Newport - Black
summary: Victorian Railways D1 class (Type 4- Wide Cab) 4-6-0 tender locomotives in all over black.

name: Trainz Plus: Switch Model Railroad - TRS19
summary: Switch Model Railroad is a small two baseboard route that offers plenty of switching opportunities between the yard and the industries.

name: Trainz Plus: The BiDye Traction Railroad Route
summary: The BiDye Traction Railroad shows off the versatility of Trainz: A New Era by creating a virtual model railroad for you to explore and enjoy inside a large garage.

name: Trainz Plus: The Broadway Limited
summary: 3DZUG is taking you back to the golden ages of the American railroads and brings you one of the most famous US trains, Pennsylvania Railroad’s “Broadway Limited”.

name: Trials of Kokoro
summary: In this turn-based RPG, you will customize a group of heroes' equipment, skills, and strengths, before leading them into exciting battles. Strategic, turn-based combat, detailed party management, and an emotional story come together in this grand, epic adventure across the continent of Vitaria.

name: Trash Tycoon
summary: Get rich and build your own Empire! You’ll become the idle Savior of our planet, plus you’ll make a lot of money by selling garbage. Your idle success will make other people reflect on the environmental problems around them - save the environment and protect nature, forests, and fields.

name: Tray Racers!
summary:
The world ended…But the fun didn't!

From the creators of PHOGS!, Tray Racers! is a free-to-play racing game set in a vibrant post-apocalyptic world. Armed with nothing but your trusty tray, you play as a ragtag kid speedster - race solo or with up to 16 players through a wacky playground of randomly-generated sand dunes, cute critters, bouncy cactus forests and more!

Surf the sizzling sands. Dazzle your pals with tray tricks. Hitch a ride on a giant worm. And outspeed your friends to become…the ultimate Tray Racer!

name: Translunar Enterprises
summary: Compete in this realtime 4x game in full multiplayer. Explore, Expand, Exploite and Exterminate in this sandbox universe where the players are in full control. Build on planets, Fight in space, Design components to better develop your research.

name: TrackMania Sunrise Extreme
summary: TrackMania Sunrise Extreme is a re-release of TrackMania Sunrise bundled with the Extreme expansion, which owners of the original game can download for free. The updated version adds new building blocks and settings, much longer circuits, a stunt mode, new courses, 50 new challenges, support for dedicated servers and various refinements and enhancements.

name: Trainz Plus: CFR B 26-26 098
summary: Manufactured at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, this versatile doubledecker car was used on regional passenger transport by the Romanian operator CFR and then by CFR Calatori, being repainted into various paintschemes through the years, mainly different types of blue paint.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: CFR B 26-26 098
summary: Manufactured at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, this versatile doubledecker car was used on regional passenger transport by the Romanian operator CFR and then by CFR Calatori, being repainted into various paintschemes through the years, mainly different types of blue paint.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: CFR B 26-26 098
summary: Manufactured at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, this versatile doubledecker car was used on regional passenger transport by the Romanian operator CFR and then by CFR Calatori, being repainted into various paintschemes through the years, mainly different types of blue paint.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Potteries Loop Line
summary: A prototypical representation of the railway system serving the Staffordshire Potteries and surrounding towns and industries in the 1930s.

name: Trainz Plus: Potteries Loop Line
summary: A prototypical representation of the railway system serving the Staffordshire Potteries and surrounding towns and industries in the 1930s.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Potteries Loop Line
summary: A prototypical representation of the railway system serving the Staffordshire Potteries and surrounding towns and industries in the 1930s.

name: Trainz Plus: CFR Calatori B 26-26 064
summary: Manufactured at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, this versatile doubledecker car was used on regional passenger transport by the Romanian operator CFR and then by CFR Calatori, being repainted into various paintschemes through the years, mainly different types of blue paint.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: CFR Calatori B 26-26 064
summary: Manufactured at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, this versatile doubledecker car was used on regional passenger transport by the Romanian operator CFR and then by CFR Calatori, being repainted into various paintschemes through the years, mainly different types of blue paint.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: CFR Calatori B 26-26 186
summary: Manufactured at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, this versatile doubledecker car was used on regional passenger transport by the Romanian operator CFR and then by CFR Calatori, being repainted into various paintschemes through the years, mainly different types of blue paint.

name: Trainz Plus: CFR Calatori B 26-26 186
summary: Manufactured at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, this versatile doubledecker car was used on regional passenger transport by the Romanian operator CFR and then by CFR Calatori, being repainted into various paintschemes through the years, mainly different types of blue paint.

name: TrackMania Sunrise Extreme
summary: This expansion adds new building blocks and settings, much longer circuits, a stunt mode, new courses, 50 new challenges, support for dedicated servers and various refinements and enhancements.

name: Train Simulator Classic: Salzburg - Schwarzach-St. Veit Route Add-On
summary: Visit Austria and drive through stunning scenery with RSSLO’s next instalment for Train Simulator; the Salzburg - Schwarzach-St. Veit route!

name: Trainz Plus: New York Central 10a 2-8-2
summary: New York Centrals H10a were built from the early 1900s to as late as the mid 1940s in Canada, although the vast majority came into service prior to 1930.

name: Trainz Plus: Midwestern Branch
summary: Midwestern Branch is a fictional route based somewhere in the Midwestern section of the US. This branch line uses ex-Milwaukee Road units in both SD40-2 and GP38-2 styles to help serve the industries that are in the towns of Littleport, Levitt, Cylinder, and Mill Town.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Avmz Intercity 71
summary: Avmz Intercity 1st class passenger high quality car with 2 sessions for the "Niddertalbahn” track complete the package. Get on board and extend your vehicle fleet with these cars, which are rich in detail.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: JR Rolling Stock Pack TRS19
summary: This package is bursting with Jointed Rail rolling stock all ready for you to drive in TRS19!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: NS SD60E First Responders
summary: Experience the power of the NS SD60E First Responders as you shunt the yard and make your freight run!

name: Trainz Plus: C&O Hinton Division
summary: Hinton Division, one of the major coal producing areas for the C&O, starting just west of Thurmond, WV through to Hinton, WV and also includes the Laurel Creek Sub Division, and parts of the Piney Creek Sub, Rend Sub and Loup Creek Sub.

name: Trainz Plus: Coal Country
summary: Welcome to Coal Country! Take a trip through the heart of the Appalachian coal fields. This fictional route is complete with a brand new Railroad, locomotives, rolling stock, and scenery items.

name: Trainz Plus: Kickstarter County Tane
summary: Based upon the famous Highland Valley route from the early days of Trainz, Kickstarter County has received a huge upgrade with new content, new track and new industries. This route is a tribute to all our Kickstarter Backers who helped make Trainz A New Era possible.

name: Trainz Plus: CO17-4373
summary: A series of freight locomotives CO (Sergo Ordzhonikidze, axle load 17 tonnes) designed for medium loads and working on lines with light rail. Built from 1934 to 1951 at the Kharkov, Bryansk, Voroshilovgrad, Krasnoyarsk and Ulan-Ude Locomotive Works. Total production of locomotives - 3049.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Season Town Northern Rail Road Route
summary: A fictional route situated in the USA. The route reacts to season changes and lets you drive a freight train on the main line as well as a street car through the city.

name: Trainz Plus: EMD SD70M Demonstrator 2
summary: Drive the EMD SD70M Demonstrator unit 7013. With the introduction of the SD70M locomotive, the first three of the type were used by EMD as 'demonstrator' units, which they sent to various railroads for them to trial the new SD70M locomotives.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Model Trainz - Geneva Sub Division
summary: One of my favourite lines is the Geneva Sub. This route comes to Trainz using the track plan based on Daryl Kruse's layout featured in the Model Railroad Planning 2013 issue and the September 2016 issue of Model Railroader.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: ATSF GP38-2 Santa FE 2 Pack
summary: Climb on board your new GP38-2 ATSF engines and learn to operate the EMD GP38-2 ATSF locomotive. This detailed session will make you an expert Train driver and best of all, you get to experience it all driving the beautifully detailed GP38-2 ATSF

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: China D38 Schnabel Car - Full Pack
summary: The Chinese D38 Schnabel Car is a special type of freight car, used to transport super heavy or oversized goods. Generally speaking, it has two huge 'arms' to grab the goods, and make them become a part of itself. This pack includes the D38 Schnabel cars in both grey and red liveries.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: ETR 1000 - Frecciarossa
summary: The ETR 1000 “Frecciarossa” is a train, that lives superlatives: being one of the world's fastest trains, it reached a lunatic 400 km/h.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Brazemore Yard
summary: The Brazemore Yard has fantastic track work that hugs lush rolling hills as you drive through the picturesque countryside.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Legacy of the Burlington Northern II
summary: Legacy of the BN II is a beautifully mastered proto-fictional route from Jointed Rail. Complete with custom content, locomotive and rolling stock packs this route will provide hours and hours of endless fun and entertainment.

name: Trainz 2022: Leadville Subdivision
summary: A rural and largely single track connection between UP and BNSF owned main lines.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Healesville 1910's
summary: This layout covers the last 19 miles of the Healesville line from Mooroolbark to Healesville, set in approximately 1913-1920, prior to the line to Lilydale being electrified, and during the period when the locomotives were painted Canadian Red.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Halloween Night on Kickstarter County
summary: Its Halloween night on Kickstarter County and you are taking the last coal train from Daydream Mine to the yard located in St. Nicolaas before heading off for the night.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Chicago Museum of Science and Industry Model Railroad
summary: One of the most amazing model railroads in the world, this prototypical representation will spark your imagination, with plenty of action with lots of trains and industries.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Centrella Sub Division
summary: Located in the United States, the Centrella Sub Division runs through the mountains to the countryside, with 5 yards, 40 miles of mainline and 4 branchlines, many industries, and passenger stations. At least 50 trains uses this track as a shortcut to go east/west, with two amtrak trains per day.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: LMS Coronation Scot
summary: Take control of one of the iconic British Locomotives and travel the length of the country.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Laaers Car Transporter
summary: With our Laaers Car Transporter, we're setting new standards and introducing one of the most innovative carriers for Trainz A New Era!

name: Trainz 2022: Quinnimont Coal Drag
summary: This package includes the "C&O 2-6-6-6 H8" locomotive and a brand new detailed session. Quinnimont was a marshalling yard for coal loads from the surrounding mines. Trains were assembled here to be shipped to Clifton Forge and beyond. Empty cars were also made-up here for the mines in the area.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Florida Rail Road Museum Model Railroad
summary: Based upon the model railroad in UP coach 5642 at the Florida Railroad Museum, this layout is scaled to HO scale and offers multiple industries and a circus!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Blue Comet
summary: The Blue Comet add on pack recreates the excitement and splendour of a truly remarkable train.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: The BiDye Traction Railroad
summary: The BiDye Traction Railroad shows off the versatility of Trainz: A New Era by creating a virtual model railroad for you to explore and enjoy inside a large garage.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Mine & Field railway
summary: A small module showcasing a set of content designed for representing underground mining scenes and particularly the underground transport of coal and other ores plus mining equipment and personnel. Includes mining locomotives and rolling stock, and a range of infrastructure.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: PRR X23 Boxcar
summary: Experience the trendsetting X23boxcar in firstclass quality from 3DZUG and let the past come alive again.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: PKP Bdhpumn 004
summary: Used for regional passenger trains in Poland, Romania, Czech Republic, and Germany this passenger coach features photorealistic fully PBR textures, and many different options.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: L&N M1 2-8-4 Big Emma
summary: Drive the Louisville & Nashville Railroad's 'Big Emma' M-1 2-8-4 Berkshire steam locomotive. A total of 42 of these locomotives wer ebuilt from 1942 onward, and worked freight and passenger trains over many years.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: The Flying Scotsman 1920s
summary: The passenger run takes you on a massive 125 mile drive down the ECML from Edinburgh through to Newcastle while driving the world famous Flying Scotsman from the 1920s.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Warwick to Wallangarra Route
summary: Follow the QR Southern railway line through the Darling Downs and into Granite country, right to the border with New South Wales.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Chiyoda Branch Line
summary: The Chiyoda Branch Line is the Tokyo Metro Line in Tokyo, Japan. This route will bring you the landscape of Japan's suburban city.

name: Trainz 2022: Inzer - South Ural Mountains
summary: A beautiful replica of the railways of central Eurasia, in the Ural mountain range.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Rodnye Prostory Route
summary: A detailed 58km route set in the 'Commonwealth of Independent States' region of Eurasia, with 38km of single track and 9km of double track.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: The Shorts and Kerl Traction Railroad
summary: The Shortz & Kerl Railroad was an electrified short line that began freight services in the early part of the Twentieth Century, linking Port Shortz with the Kerl Iron Works.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Kickstarter County Tane
summary: Based upon the famous Highland Valley route from the early days of Trainz, Kickstarter County has received a huge upgrade with new content, new track and new industries. This route is a tribute to all our Kickstarter Backers who helped make Trainz A New Era possible.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Route: Japan - Model Trainz
summary: This layout is inspired by the Okayama Prefecture, Japan. It is designed for busy train traffic, and features a great range of challenging sessions. There are also some display cabinets where you can put trains on for stationary display.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Coal Country
summary: Welcome to Coal Country! Take a trip through the heart of the Appalachian coal fields. This fictional route is complete with a brand new Railroad, locomotives, rolling stock, and scenery items.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Canadian Rocky Mountains - Golden, BC
summary: CP Rail facilities at Golden are used to manage coal trains coming off the Windermere Sub onto the main line westward and serve as an inspection point and maintenance depot for the enormous fleet of coal hoppers taking up the unrelenting strain.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: NYC J3a-Dreyfuss streamlined Hudson
summary: New York Central J3a-Dreyfuss streamlined Hudson built by American Locomotive Company in 1938.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: BNSF GP38-2 Pumpkins
summary: Climb on board your new GP38-2 BNSF engines and learn to operate the locomotives. This detailed session will make you an expert Train driver and best of all, you get to experience it all driving the beautifully detailed GP38-2 BNSF

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: The Broadway Limited
summary: 3DZUG is taking you back to the golden ages of the American railroads and brings you one of the most famous US trains, Pennsylvania Railroad’s “Broadway Limited”.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Fall Harvest Nebraska
summary: It is harvest time again, long grain trains moving through typical Nebraska farming country to bring in this year's harvest. The Route centres on North Platte Nebraska, including the Bailey Yard.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Canadian Rocky Mountains Baker Crk to West of Calgary
summary: This instalment covers a stretch of the CP Laggan Subdivision in the region around Banff and Canmore.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Aerotrain
summary: Gone but certainly not forgotten. The GM Aerotrain addon pack takes you back to the streamline era when this stylish train toured the railroads of the USA as a proposed means to the future of passenger haulage.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Victorian Railways D1 Class - Type 4: Newport Black
summary: Victorian Railways D1 class (Type 4- Wide Cab) 4-6-0 tender locomotives in all over black.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: PolRegio B16mnopux 035
summary: Used for regional passenger trains in Poland, Romania, Czech Republic, and Germany this passenger coach features photorealistic textures, fully PBR textures, and many different options.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Niddertalbahn - TRS19
summary: An idyllic, single-track branch line in Wetterau and Main-Kinzig-Kreis in the western German state of Hesse.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: DBuz 747 Passenger Cars
summary: The cars are still to be found on Germany’s railways today. They are the backbone of local traffic: the famous double-deck car, affectionately known as ‘Dostos’ for short.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Route - Canadian Rocky Mountains: Columbia River Basin
summary: The beautiful Canadian Rocky Mountain - Columbia River Basin covers a staggering 2000 sq km making it one of the largest routes ever created in Trainz. Includes 6 sessions!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Victorian Railways Type 2 DD Class Pack
summary: 5 locomotives, in 5 liveries, in broad gauge and standard gauge (10 locomotives total)

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: British Rail Class 70 - Colas Rail
summary: Drive the highly detailed, modern British GE Class 70 in Colas Rail livery in Trainz. Developed by 3DZUG for TRS19 using the latest PBR technologies, and many custom features!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Trainz Route - Rostovsky Uzel
summary: The route is based on a real section of the North Caucasian railway, located in the Rostov region of the Russian Federation.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: DR DBmtrue 215
summary: Carry passengers around your routes with these highly detailed European passenger coaches!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Newcastle Shunter
summary: Shunt several coal cars, car carriers and cement hoppers around TYNE the massive rail yard just outside Newcastle station. Full scripted shunting session with cut-scenes and audio task details and commentary.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Nickel Plate High Speed Freight
summary: Relive the halcyon years of steam hauled freight services in the US with this stunningly modeled Trainz Simulator addon, featuring the Nickel Plate Road Berkshire locomotive, Pere Marquette Berkshire locomotive, a Nickel Plate Road 40ft boxcar, and a Nickel Plate Road caboose.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: RVSX Vegetation Control Train
summary: Complete vegetation control train. SW1500, Tool Car, Crew/Dorm, Chemical Cars, Scripted Weed Control Car with animated spraying arms that you can control. The sprayer car is scripted and animated, controlled via the 'view details' window.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: DB DBmu748 080
summary: Carry passengers around your routes with this highly detailed European passenger coach!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: GT GP9
summary: The 2 pack comes with the GT GP9 Black and Blue livery. The session lets you jump straight in and drive the GT GP9 using 'easy' or 'realistic' mode.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Balezino Mosti
summary: A route in the extent of 57 km between Balezino and Mosti, Russia. Beautifully detailed landscapes and an electrified railway connect these two cities.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Willamette & Pacific SD7 #1501
summary: This session lets you jump straight in and drive the Willamette & Pacific SD7 #1501 in 'easy' or 'realistic' mode. For the full experience, select 'Realistic Mode' and start driving this beautiful locomotive!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: CSX Transportation GE B30-7
summary: This Downloadable Content Pack includes the highly detailed CSX GE B30-7 model for use in the Trainz Simulator franchise games.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Cornish Mainline and Branches TRS19
summary: This picturesque route runs between Truro and terminates in Penzance and includes Branch-lines to Falmouth (The Maritime Route), Helston, Hayle Wharves and St Ives.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: ZecRail V499 Blue & Gold and Christmas 2019
summary: ZecRail V499 Baldwin Compound - Blue and Gold and Christmas 2019

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: VR Healesville 1913-1920 TRS19
summary: Drive classic Victorian Railways steam locomotives through the famed Yarra Valley, north east of Melbourne, during the WW1 era. Comes with a selection of pre-made sessions, a pre-made multiplayer freeplay session, and a variety of Victorian Railways steam locomotives and rolling stock.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: ECML Edinburgh - Dundee
summary: This well known route based in 1976 includes the Forth and Tay rail bridges and the stunning scenery along the Firth of Forth estuary.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Avery - Drexel Route
summary: Discover the winding tracks through the iconic snowy hills of the famous North American freight and passenger route.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Sebino Lake, Italy
summary: The prototypical route represents the FerrovieNord line linking Brescia to Pisogne, at the mouth of the Camonica Valley, passing through the Franciacorta area, Iseo and the wonderful east coast of the Lake Iseo.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: BNSF GE Dash-9 44CW Warbonnet
summary: Jump straight in and drive the BNSF GE Dash-9 44CW Warbonnet in 'easy' or 'realistic' mode.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: US ATC Class S 160 Steam
summary: This pack contains two versions of this unique steam locomotive, as well as one session for the “Kicksarter County“ route. Treat yourself to something special, sniff the air of yesteryear and drive one of the locomotives built in great quantities in days gone past.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Burlington Northern Railroad - EMD SD70MAC
summary: This Downloadable Content Pack includes the highly detailed EMD SD70MAC model for use in the Trainz Simulator franchise games. Features Include: Night Lighting Ditch Lights Auto Running Numbers Fan Animation Custom Cab Animated Wipers

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Appen
summary: "Appen" is a fictitious route set in West Yorkshire (or should I say the West Riding) in the 1950 - 60's. Appen represents an industrial town located between Leeds and Bradford served by the London Midland with services from the North Eastern region of British Railways.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: New York Central 10a 2-8-2
summary: New York Centrals H10a were built from the early 1900s to as late as the mid 1940s in Canada, although the vast majority came into service prior to 1930.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Cornish Mainline & Branches
summary: The Cornish Main Line was originally built by two separate railway companies, the West Cornwall Railway between Truro and Penzance, opened in 1852, and the Cornwall Railway between Plymouth and a separate station in Truro, opened in 1859.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Canadian Rocky Mountains Viktor Lake to Ross Peak and Glacier
summary: Drive through the Canadian Rocky Mountains between Viktor Lake, through the famous CPR McDonald and Connaught tunnels, to Ross Peak and Glacier.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Switch Model Railroad - TRS19
summary: Switch Model Railroad is a small two baseboard route that offers plenty of switching opportunities between the yard and the industries.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Franklin Avenue Industrial
summary: Franklin Avenue Industrial is a small one baseboard Model Railroadz route inspired by the track plan, 59th Street Branch by Stan Sweatt.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Canadian Rocky Mountains - Rogers Pass
summary: Rogers Pass is one of those subsections that will submerge you in sheer beauty and awe regarding landscape and railways - the Rocky Mountains at its majestic best! Route includes 4 Sessions.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Midwestern Branch
summary: Midwestern Branch is a fictional route based somewhere in the Midwestern section of the US. This branch line uses ex-Milwaukee Road units in both SD40-2 and GP38-2 styles to help serve the industries that are in the towns of Littleport, Levitt, Cylinder, and Mill Town.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Lafond Regional Railway
summary: Lafond regional railway is a 20 mile railway in the semi- prairie area in Canada. The route offers open farm fields, and a scenic line to Clearwater, and makes extensive use of TurfFX and other new features.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Settle and Carlisle
summary: Updated for TANE - Settle & Carlisle takes you to one of the most famous and scenic British main lines at the time of the transition from steam to diesel power. 25 sessions across 5 routes with all with new speedtrees and procedural tracks this is one you'll want to pick up and drive!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Lone Pine Branch
summary: A rural and largely single track connection between UP and BNSF owned main lines.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Laadgs Transporter
summary: Package includes train cars and 2 x sessions. Carry small vans, containers or even a low-floor tram: it's entirely in your hands! Design the train just the way you want.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Hccrrs Car Transporter
summary: The Hccrrs car transporter guarantees the highest quality cars and impresses with its realistic textures and accurate features. Two sessions for the free Niddertalbahn Route are already included.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Chesapeake & Ohio K2 2-8-2
summary: The Class K2 had 63 diameter drivers, 28 x 30 cylinders, had a 200 psi boiler pressure and exerted 63,467 pounds. The Class K-2 firebox was 287 square feet. The evaporative heating surface was 4,160 square feet and with the superheater the combined heating surface was 5,333 square feet.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Amtrak P42DC - Phase III
summary: Amtrak P42DC locomotive in Phase III livery. Feature full custom cab, automatic running numbers, animated wipers, gecko script, and more.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: NS SD60E - Horsehead Locomotive
summary: Norfolk Southern SD60E in the standard NS 'Horsehead' livery. Features include Brand new Custom Cab and in-cab Signals, Fan Animation, Ditch Lights, and more!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: VR M Class 4-4-0 - Early 2 Tone Green
summary: This pack represents the M class locomotives in the earlier more complex 2 tone green livery, with white lining, with highly polished brass and paintwork, and light soot staining as in regular service.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: TE3-2068
summary: The legendary TE3 locomotive is made in compliance with the highest standards for quality and precision. This is a replica of a locomotive TE3 series.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: PRR T1
summary: The PRR T1 'A Fleet of Modernism' DLC Pack recreates the striking image of these shark nosed behemoths in their days of speeding the 'Fleet of Modernism' cars to their destination on trains such as 'The Broadway Limited' and 'The General'.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Andrushivka - Vinnitsa UZ
summary: East European railway. The route runs along the vast expanses of the Ukraine among the picturesque fields, forests and villages.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: SNCF BB 75000
summary: The SNCF BB 75000 (also known as the SNCF BB 475000) are 4 axle diesel electric locomotives ordered in 2000 by SNCF for freight operations to renew its aging fleet.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Tnfrhs Refrigerator Wagon
summary: The Tnfrhs 32-Refrigerated wagon takes us once again "down memory lane". This "cool" fellow was built from 1936 and was in service for many decades.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Znamensk-Svir
summary: Znamensk-Svir: A fictional route, built on the motives of the North-West of Russia. The Znamensk-Svir section is a two-track electrified section of alternating current with a length of 70 kilometers.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Niddertalbahn
summary: An idyllic, single-track branch line in Wetterau- and Main-Kinzig-Kreis - and best of all it's free!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: DR DBmtrue 001
summary: Carry passengers around your routes with these highly detailed European passenger coaches!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Southern Pacific GE CW44-9
summary: This session lets you jump straight in and drive the Southern Pacific GE CW44-9 in 'easy' or 'realistic' mode.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: NS SD60E - 6963 GoRail
summary: Norfolk Southern SD60E in the special NS GORAIL livery. Features include Brand new Custom Cab and in-cab Signals, Fan Animation, Ditch Lights, and more!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Orient Express Trainset
summary: The "King of the Trains" or the "Train of dreams" – the Orient Express consisted of several luxury trains and had its peak period in the 20s of the previous century.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: DR/DB DBmtrue/DBmu748 Pack
summary: Built by the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these versatile doubledecker cars were used on regional passenger transport by Deutsche Reichsbahn and then by Deutsche Bahn. They feature custom bogeysounds, custom interior, and more!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: The Innter Kohn Necktion Railroad
summary: The Innter Kohn Necktion Railroad has both a standard gauge and narrow gauge for this superb TRS19 model railroad layout.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: RZD-UZ-RIC Wagons
summary: The RIC and UZ passenger wagons are made in compliance with the highest quality standards and precision. Photo realistic textures and geometry has been recreated as accurately as possible to deliver the characteristics and details of the original wagons.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Cilie Oldphartz Railroad
summary: The Cilie Oldphartz Railroad Company is a TRS19 model railroad style route that comes in three variants - a narrow gauge logging railroad, a narrow gauge mining railroad and a standard gauge railroad. Each has the same track layout, with variations to suit the gauge and theme.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: PREG B16mnopux 064
summary: Used for regional passenger trains in Poland, Romania, Czech Republic, and Germany this passenger coach features photorealistic textures, fully PBR textures, and many different options.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Port Zyd & Fulazturn Railroad
summary: An industrial layout on an industrial scale! A busy and thriving railroad serving a large harbor and industrial area, moving freight cars around on behalf of a Class 1 railroad.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: TE3-1072
summary: The legendary TE3 locomotive is made in compliance with the highest standards for quality and precision. This is a replica of a locomotive TE3 series.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Mojave Sub Division
summary: The Mojave Sub Division. Known for its rolling hills, drop off cliffs, and the famous Tehachapi Loop. This route is challenging with its constant grade changes,, but yet satisfying with its mixture of desert and mountainous scenery colors. If you're looking for a challenge the Mojave Sub is for you!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: TE7-083
summary: The legendary TE7 locomotive is made in compliance with the highest standards for quality and precision. This is a replica of a locomotive TE7 series.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: LMS Duchess
summary: The feature packed Duchess set is a must have for anyone with a taste for the romance of rail.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: DR DBmue 008
summary: Carry passengers around your routes with this highly detailed European passenger coach!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: British Rail Class 70 - Freightliner
summary: Drive the highly detailed, modern British GE Class 70 in Freightliner livery in Trainz. Developed by 3DZUG for TRS19 using the latest PBR technologies, and many custom features!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: China D38 Schnabel Car - Gray
summary: The Chinese D38 Schnabel Car is a special type of freight car, used to transport super heavy or oversized goods. Generally speaking, it has two huge 'arms' to grab the goods, and make them become a part of itself. This pack includes the D38 Schnabel cars in the grey livery.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Route - Tidewater Point Railroad 2.0
summary: Tidewater Railroad is a shortline railroad running from a crude oil terminal located south by the river to an intermodal terminal in the North.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Shmmns Coil Transporter
summary: Get on board and extend your vehicle fleet with this highly detailed Shmmns-Coilwagon. Two sessions for the free Niddertalbahn route are included in this package.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: CFCLA, RailFirst, Freightliner GE C44aci
summary: The C44aci is a model of Australian heavy duty diesel electric locomotive designed operated by a number of rail freight operators. This pack features CFCLA, RailFirst, and Freightliner livery units, with custom cab views, full PBR textures, and more.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Amtrak F40PH
summary: Amtrak F40PH locomotive two pack, with Phase II and Phase III liveries. Feature full custom cab, automatic running numbers, animated wipers, gecko script, and more.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: CFR Marfa Gbs/Gbgs Freight Car
summary: A pack of 24 high detail Eastern-European freight wagons with custom loads, custom sounds, and a custom industry object.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: CO17-4171
summary: A series of freight locomotives CO (Sergo Ordzhonikidze, axle load 17 tonnes) designed for medium loads and working on lines with light rail. Built from 1934 to 1951 at the Kharkov, Bryansk, Voroshilovgrad, Krasnoyarsk and Ulan-Ude Locomotive Works. Total production of locomotives - 3049.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: QJ Steam Locomotive

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Chicago & North Western GE C40-8

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: DIC-Reefer - Mechanical Refrigerator
summary: Mechanical Refrigerator (Reefer) have various products and textures, animation, running numbers, and sound.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Schwaeninger Land
summary: Enjoy the rush of speed at 250 km/h in the ICE 4; service the Auringen - Schwaning branch line with local trains;

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Pacific National 92 and 93 Class Locomotives
summary: Drive the modern Pacific National 92 and 93 class diesel locomotives!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: PREG Bdhpumn 088

summary: Built by the Phoenix Foundry in Ballarat, Victoria, between 1900 and 1901, the V class was the first 2-8-0 locomotive class on the Victorian Railways, designed for use on branch lines around Victoria, and was a predecessor to the K class and J class locomotives.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: China D38 Schnabel Car - Red
summary: The Chinese D38 Schnabel Car is a special type of freight car, used to transport super heavy or oversized goods. Generally speaking, it has two huge 'arms' to grab the goods, and make them become a part of itself. This pack includes the D38 Schnabel cars in the red livery.

summary: A series of freight locomotives CO (Sergo Ordzhonikidze, axle load 17 tonnes) designed for medium loads and working on lines with light rail. Built from 1934 to 1951 at the Kharkov, Bryansk, Voroshilovgrad, Krasnoyarsk and Ulan-Ude Locomotive Works. Total production of locomotives - 3049.

summary: This pack allows you to jump in and drive the ITC GP7 Phase I and II locomotives in your own sessions. Find them under the Trains Tab by searching for 'ITC' in Surveyor.

summary: Victorian Railways V499 2-8-0 Baldwin Compound in Baldwin Green and Canadian Red.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Chicago North Western GE Dash 9 44CW
summary: This session lets you jump straight in and drive the Chicago North Western GE Dash 9 44CW in 'easy' or 'realistic' mode.

summary: This Downloadable Content Pack includes the highly detailed BNSF Railway - SD70MAC Executive Patch model for use in the Trainz Simulator franchise

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Pro Train - Class 68 Chiltern Railways
summary: Drive the modern TransPenning Express livery Class 68 diesel-electric locomotive!

summary: A series of freight locomotives CO (Sergo Ordzhonikidze, axle load 17 tonnes) designed for medium loads and working on lines with light rail. Built from 1934 to 1951 at the Kharkov, Bryansk, Voroshilovgrad, Krasnoyarsk and Ulan-Ude Locomotive Works. Total production of locomotives - 3049.

summary: Victorian Railways DD class (Type 4- Wide Cab) 4-6-0 tender locomotives in Canadian Red and WW1 red.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Chesapeake & Ohio K3-K3a 2-8-2
summary: Drive the Chesapeake & Ohio's K-3 and K-3a Mikado locomotives. With 63inch drivers, 28in by 32in cylinders, and a 200PSI boiler, the K-3 and K-3a locomotives exerted 67,698pounds of tractive effort, providing plenty of power to haul goods trains.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: CONTZ Pack - Standard Edition
summary: The Contz Standard Edition pack features a set of 20ft and 40ft dry van containers, three X2K double stack container well wagons, and a 500m long container yard with crane.

summary: The Chinese D38 Schnabel Car is a special type of freight car, used to transport super heavy or oversized goods. Generally speaking, it has two huge 'arms' to grab the goods, and make them become a part of itself. This pack includes the D38 Schnabel cars in the red livery.

summary: Used for regional passenger trains in Poland, Romania, Czech Republic, and Germany this passenger coach features photorealistic fully PBR textures, and many different options.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: CSX EMD SD60
summary: This session lets you jump straight in and drive the CSX Transportation EMD SD60 in 'easy' or 'realistic' mode.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Victorian Railways V class FL Black
summary: Drive the Victorian Railways V class steam locomotive, painted in a freelance black livery with 3 levels of weathering.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: PRR GP9
summary: This pack allows you to jump in and drive the PRR GP9 locomotives (with Early and Late liveries) in your own sessions. Find them under the Trains Tab by searching for 'PRR' in Surveyor.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Pro Train - Class 68 TPN TRS
summary: Drive the modern TransPenning Express livery Class 68 diesel-electric locomotive!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: CO17-4173
summary: A series of freight locomotives CO (Sergo Ordzhonikidze, axle load 17 tonnes) designed for medium loads and working on lines with light rail. Built from 1934 to 1951 at the Kharkov, Bryansk, Voroshilovgrad, Krasnoyarsk and Ulan-Ude Locomotive Works. Total production of locomotives - 3049.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: SNCF - AGC Languedoc
summary: The AGC trains were designed by Bombardier. These railcars feature a modular interior and flexible power options (diesel, electric, or hybrid 'bi-mode' versions). The version included is a hybrid Diesel + 1500v DC version in 'Languedoc' livery and is now available to add to your Trainz collection.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: PREG B16mnopux 087
summary: Used for regional passenger trains in Poland, Romania, Czech Republic, and Germany this passenger coach features photorealistic fully PBR textures, and many different options.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: C&O 2-6-6-6 H8 - New River Mining Coal Run
summary: In this session you will experience the power of the C&O 2-6-6-6 H8 Allegheny. They are giving you control over this big boy and you will be making a large coal run. The journey is not a short one so get ready to take the challenge, haul your freight from New River Mining all the way up to Hinton!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: CO17-3373
summary: A series of freight locomotives CO (Sergo Ordzhonikidze, axle load 17 tonnes) designed for medium loads and working on lines with light rail. Built from 1934 to 1951 at the Kharkov, Bryansk, Voroshilovgrad, Krasnoyarsk and Ulan-Ude Locomotive Works. Total production of locomotives - 3049.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Rheingold 1962
summary: It was the German equivalent to the famous Orient Express - the exquisite Rheingold.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: NS SD60E - 6920 Veterans Unit
summary: Experience the power of the NS SD60E - 6920 Veterans Unit as you shunt the yard and make your freight run!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Amtrak P42DC - Phase IV
summary: Amtrak P42DC locomotive in Phase IV livery. Feature full custom cab, automatic running numbers, animated wipers, gecko script, and more.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: PREG B16mnopux 066
summary: Carry passengers around your routes with these highly detailed European passenger coaches!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: PREG B16mnopux 039
summary: Carry passengers around your routes with these highly detailed European passenger coaches!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: PREG Bmnopux 003
summary: Used for regional passenger trains in Poland, Romania, Czech Republic, and Germany this passenger coach features photorealistic fully PBR textures, and many different options.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: DRG Class 05 Steam
summary: 3DZUG takes you directly into the driver's cabin of one of the most elaborate engines ever created for Trainz.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: C&O Hinton Division
summary: Hinton Division, one of the major coal producing areas for the C&O, starting just west of Thurmond, WV through to Hinton, WV and also includes the Laurel Creek Sub Division, and parts of the Piney Creek Sub, Rend Sub and Loup Creek Sub.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: ZecRail 2017 Christmas Train
summary: This year, ZecRail brings you the new type 4 D1 class locomotive decorated for Christmas 2017, with a string of goods wagons and passenger carriages to bring Christmas cheer to the people in your virtual world!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: PKP/PREG Bdhpumn/B16mnopux Pack
summary: Carry passengers around your routes with these highly detailed European passenger coaches!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: ECML Kings Cross - Edinburgh 1976
summary: This route covers the full route from London Kings Cross Station all the way to Edinburgh in Scotland - a 393 mile drive! With significant updates to almost every feature along the track, the route will take you back in time to 1976 UK.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Route - Belarusian Woodland
summary: The Belarusian woodlands is a beautiful landscape featuring many forests, lakes and rivers. Includes 4 sessions plus a bonus steam locomotive - CO17-1171.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Balezino Mosti Sessions - Lichachove to Mosti
summary: This pack includes two sessions for the separate Balezino - Mosti, Russia, operating a passenger train from Lichachove to Mosti during the day, and during the night. Note, this pack requires the separate Balezino - Mosti, Russia route.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: CO17-1471
summary: A series of freight locomotives CO (Sergo Ordzhonikidze, axle load 17 tonnes) designed for medium loads and working on lines with light rail. Built from 1934 to 1951 at the Kharkov, Bryansk, Voroshilovgrad, Krasnoyarsk and Ulan-Ude Locomotive Works. Total production of locomotives - 3049.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: CO17-4174
summary: A series of freight locomotives CO (Sergo Ordzhonikidze, axle load 17 tonnes) designed for medium loads and working on lines with light rail. Built from 1934 to 1951 at the Kharkov, Bryansk, Voroshilovgrad, Krasnoyarsk and Ulan-Ude Locomotive Works. Total production of locomotives - 3049.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Shortline Railroad
summary: A fictional route in the USA where the Burlington Northern railroad uses GP38-2 locos to help serve the industries that rely on the railroad for their main source of transportation and for local runs on the main line. Welcome to the Shortline Railroad!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Coalmint Mountains Railroad
summary: The Coalmint Mountains Railroad (CMR) is a 50mile route based in Pennsylvania in the Appalachian Mountains in the 1950s. There are many steep grades to climb, and even more tight corners to wind as you explore the majesty of the Appalachian Mountains in Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter all by rail.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Union Pacific GE C40-8
summary: The GE C40-8 is a 6-axle diesel-electric locomotive built by GE Transportation Systems between 1987 and 1992. It is part of the GE Dash 8 Series of freight locomotives, and its wheel arrangement is of a C-C type. his locomotive model is often referred to as a Dash 8-40S or simply "Dash 8".

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Canadian Rocky Mountains Ottertail to Castle Jct
summary: Drive the picturesque Ottertail to Castle Junction section of the Canadian Rocky Mountains railway, travelling through the famouse U spiral tunnels!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Pro Trainz TEE Rheingold
summary: The introduction of the Trans Europe Express (TEE) set completely new benchmarks for travels within the European Economic Area. This new train type was distinguished by numerous exclusive special features, such as First Class, a galley, customs areas and more.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Route - Beavermouth to Ottertail
summary: This route extends the beautiful landscapes of the Rocky Mountains by expanding the original Canadian Rocky Mountains - Columbia River Basin route.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Bea-Dawe Model Railway
summary: This British Diesel-era layout includes several stations, goods yards and engine facilities and was inspired by memories of growing up in the Midlands spending many hours standing on the side of the Lickey Bank with Grandad watching the trains go past.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Model Trainz - New South Wales Region
summary: Model Trainz: NSW Rails is an N scale model train layout set in the late 90’s early 2000’s of the New South Wales (NSW) region of Australia. Grab your favourite NSW (or VR / V/ Line) locomotive and rolling stock and drive down the tracks through the Australian countryside and towns.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Chinese Electric SS4 Locomotive Pack
summary: The Shao Shan 4 (SS4 improved) electric locomotive is one of the most powerful DC electric locomotives in China.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: PREG B16mnopux 106
summary: Used for regional passenger trains in Poland, Romania, Czech Republic, and Germany this passenger coach features photorealistic textures, fully PBR textures, and many different options.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Amtrak P42DC - Phase V
summary: This session lets you jump straight in and drive the Amtrak P42DC - Phase V in 'easy' or 'realistic' mode.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: RZD-UZ-RIC Wagons Praha
summary: The RIC and UZ passenger wagons are made in compliance with the highest quality standards and precision.

name: Trainz Plus: Route - Belarusian Woodland
summary: The Belarusian woodlands is a beautiful landscape featuring many forests, lakes and rivers. Includes 4 sessions plus a bonus steam locomotive - CO17-1171.

name: Trainz Plus: DRG Class 05 Steam
summary: 3DZUG takes you directly into the driver's cabin of one of the most elaborate engines ever created for Trainz.

name: Trainz Plus: China D38 Schnabel Car
summary: The Chinese D38 Schnabel Car is a special type of freight car, used to transport super heavy or oversized goods. Generally speaking, it has two huge 'arms' to grab the goods, and make them become a part of itself. This pack includes the D38 Schnabel cars in both grey and red liveries.

name: Trainz Plus: NYC J3a-Dreyfuss streamlined Hudson
summary: New York Central J3a-Dreyfuss streamlined Hudson built by American Locomotive Company in 1938.

name: Trainz Plus: Port Zyd & Fulazturn Railroad
summary: An industrial layout on an industrial scale! A busy and thriving railroad serving a large harbor and industrial area, moving freight cars around on behalf of a Class 1 railroad.

name: Trainz Plus: Avmz Intercity 71
summary: Avmz Intercity 1st class passenger high quality car with 2 sessions for the "Niddertalbahn” track complete the package. Get on board and extend your vehicle fleet with these cars, which are rich in detail.

name: Trainz Plus: Bea-Dawe Model Railway
summary: This British Diesel-era layout includes several stations, goods yards and engine facilities and was inspired by memories of growing up in the Midlands spending many hours standing on the side of the Lickey Bank with Grandad watching the trains go past.

name: Trainz Plus: CFR Marfa Gbs/Gbgs freight car pack
summary: A pack of 24 high detail Eastern-European freight wagons with custom loads, custom sounds, and a custom industry object.

name: Trainz Plus: Fall Harvest Nebraska
summary: It is harvest time again, long grain trains moving through typical Nebraska farming country to bring in this year's harvest. The Route centres on North Platte Nebraska, including the Bailey Yard.

name: Trainz Plus: Settle and Carlisle
summary: Updated for TANE - Settle & Carlisle takes you to one of the most famous and scenic British main lines at the time of the transition from steam to diesel power. 25 sessions across 5 routes with all with new speedtrees and procedural tracks this is one you'll want to pick up and drive!

name: Trainz Plus: Rodnye Prostory Route
summary: A detailed 58km route set in the 'Commonwealth of Independent States' region of Eurasia, with 38km of single track and 9km of double track.

name: Trainz Plus: Route - Beavermouth to Ottertail
summary: This route extends the beautiful landscapes of the Rocky Mountains by expanding the original Canadian Rocky Mountains - Columbia River Basin route.

name: Trainz Plus: Coalmint Mountains Railroad
summary: The Coalmint Mountains Railroad (CMR) is a 50mile route based in Pennsylvania in the Appalachian Mountains in the 1950s. There are many steep grades to climb, and even more tight corners to wind as you explore the majesty of the Appalachian Mountains in Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter all by rail.

name: Trainz Plus: Brazemore Yard
summary: The Brazemore Yard has fantastic track work that hugs lush rolling hills as you drive through the picturesque countryside.

name: Trainz Plus: Canadian Rocky Mountains Viktor Lake to Ross Peak and Glacier
summary: Drive through the Canadian Rocky Mountains between Viktor Lake, through the famous CPR McDonald and Connaught tunnels, to Ross Peak and Glacier.

name: Trainz Plus: Cornish Mainline & Branches
summary: The Cornish Main Line was originally built by two separate railway companies, the West Cornwall Railway between Truro and Penzance, opened in 1852, and the Cornwall Railway between Plymouth and a separate station in Truro, opened in 1859.

name: Trainz Plus: Lafond Regional Railway
summary: Lafond regional railway is a 20 mile railway in the semi- prairie area in Canada. The route offers open farm fields, and a scenic line to Clearwater, and makes extensive use of TurfFX and other new features.

name: Trainz Plus: Canadian Rocky Mountains - Golden, BC
summary: CP Rail facilities at Golden are used to manage coal trains coming off the Windermere Sub onto the main line westward and serve as an inspection point and maintenance depot for the enormous fleet of coal hoppers taking up the unrelenting strain.

name: Trainz Plus: Canadian Rocky Mountains Baker Crk to West of Calgary
summary: This instalment covers a stretch of the CP Laggan Subdivision in the region around Banff and Canmore.

name: Trainz Plus: Niddertalbahn
summary: An idyllic, single-track branch line in Wetterau- and Main-Kinzig-Kreis - and best of all it's free!

name: Trainz Plus: The Innter Kohn Necktion Railroad
summary: The Innter Kohn Necktion Railroad has both a standard gauge and narrow gauge for this superb TRS19 model railroad layout.

name: Trainz Plus: PREG B16mnopux 106
summary: Used for regional passenger trains in Poland, Romania, Czech Republic, and Germany this passenger coach features photorealistic textures, fully PBR textures, and many different options.

name: Trainz Plus: Rheingold 1962
