summary: Troubadours is a management simulation game where you lead a troop of artists in a fantastic medieval world. Provide food and shelter, manage all sorts of musical acts, and play their performances. You also deal with the countless situations generated by their colorful personalities.

name: TriviaQuest: Mythic Conquest
summary: TriviaQuest: Mythic Conquest is a game where you battle mythical monsters by answering true/false to questions. Utilize unique abilities and progress through challenging levels.

name: Trinity Survivors
summary: Choose three characters with different styles to team up and combine their skills. Experience the amazing synergy of three characters. Play two-player co-op online with a friend. Defeat hordes of orcs and achieve high scores!

name: Tricky Madness
summary: Tricky Madness is an upcoming arcade snowboarding game with a focus on speed and big air inspired by classics like SSX and 1080. Race down the mountain, explore secret areas, catch big air and perform Uber tricks.

name: Tribe Nation
summary: Tribe Nation is a roguelike strategy with real-time battles set in the Gallic Wars era. Lead your Celtic tribe across Europe to a new homeland. Strategize on a randomly generated hex battlefield, adapt to unexpected events, craft, improve, and equip. Make your tribe a nation.

name: Train Simulator Classic: Shimmns-ttu Wagon Pack
summary: Bring your railroads to life with this Shimmns-ttu Wagon Pack from virtualRailroads.

name: Transfigured
summary: Transfigured is a 2D side-scroller psychological horror game. Humanoid monstrosities stalk you from the dark. Armed with nothing other than a dying flashlight, survival depends on hiding, finding tools, and carefully navigating your surroundings.

name: Trash Top Down Racing
summary: Top down 2d racing game. Race against AI opponents in different racing tracks

name: True Lies
summary: It's not like he's saving the world or anything. Oh, yes it is! As special agent Harry Tasker, it's up to you to prevent a nuclear holocaust and stop the Crimson Jihad! Experience all the explosive intensity of TRUE LIES - including never-before-seen secret missions! All the action of the movie mega hit - and none of the romance!

name: Treasure Below
summary: There's fabulous golden treasure down there, just waiting to be taken. There's also much danger with jelly fish, octopus, sharks and other undersea creatures patrolling the deep. You've got your trusty knife and speargun for protection. Be careful, sometimes these sea monsters will surround you and you have to fight your way to the top to keep your golden treasure along with your quest. The action gets faster and faster. You test every video skill you know, plus invent a few new ones, but get that treasure you will.

name: Treasure Island
summary: Explore the Island, treasures are hidden there in unbelievable abundance. Your boat trip there is full of dangers: whales and sharks will attack you. The natives are tirelessly bombarding you. And of course rivals have also started looking for the treasures for themselves. You have an unlimited supply of bumps to use against them but only 6 lives to wager!

name: TrailBouncer
summary:
TrailBouncer is a fast-paced VR racing game where breathtaking locomotion meets ultra-fast ball handling in a stunning and surreal environment. A steep learning curve pushes players to master the challenging environments with rapid interactions that constantly challenge their skills and reflexes.

Race at lightning speed through different zones in a mythical environment. Race and spin up and down the mountains while going over boost pads to be even faster.

Strive to unlock all levels and stay at the top of the game by using power-ups to your advantage and achieve the highest rank among your fellow players.

name: Transportando o Brasil
summary:
In Transportando o Brasil, players can experience what it's like to be a truck driver. He doesn't just drive a truck, he also has many objectives to fulfill while carrying out his hard daily routine.

Making a living and a better life for his family is one of them, which is why Transportando o Brasil is a different kind of game that gives a glimpse into the life of a truck driver.

name: Try if you can 100
summary: Defence enemies with a variety of charactersEnemies are coming.Defend your enemies with your own strategic placement

name: Trigonometry Dash
summary: Play fun levels, or create your own!

name: Tropico 6: Nintendo Switch Starter Bundle
summary:
Tropico 6 - Nintendo Switch Starter Bundle includes:
• Tropico 6 - Nintendo Switch Edition
• The Llama of Wall Street
• Spitter

The Tropico 6 - Nintendo Switch Edition includes an exclusive palace design, the captivating flamingo pond, something every dictator craves to impress his neighbouring states and a tourist costume for El Prez to enjoy those warm caribbean nights adequately.

name: Traffic Master Collection
summary: Multitude of obstacles, intense road traffic, exciting races, ramps, beautiful city environments and other surprises – that’s what awaits you in this new, original driving games!

name: Truck Simulator 2024: USA Driver Zone
summary: Rev up your virtual journey, conquer the open roads, and build your trucking empire in the heart of America – where every mile is a new adventure!

name: Triopticon
summary: The story of this visual novel begins with a winter night crime. Detective Yu-chi Fang discovered that the anomaly at the crime scene was related to his own hidden secret. What is abnormal and what is normal? In the end, Yu-chi Fang must face his true feelings and make a choice.

name: Trace of Time
summary: Control the protagonist to explore the remote island, the unknown ruins of the sky, to find the source of magic, save his most treasured person.

name: Travel Mosaics 11: Christmas Sleigh Ride
summary: Travel Mosaics 11 - Christmas Sleigh Ride invites you on a whirlwind sleigh ride around the world! Learn fun facts while solving challenging mosaic puzzles set to a festive holiday theme.

name: Travel Mosaics 12: Majestic London
summary: Travel Mosaics 12 - Majestic London invites you on a whirlwind holiday to the capital of England. Tour London with the Walker family and discover its illustrious history! Over 150 new mosaic puzzles are waiting to be discovered.

name: Travel Mosaics 13: Spectacular Amsterdam
summary: Travel Mosaics 13 - Spectacular Amsterdam takes you to beautiful Holland for a relaxing Puzzle vacation! Stroll through the picturesque city and take in the gorgeous sights. There's plenty of see and discover, including fun trivia as you play!

name: Travel Mosaics 14: Perfect Stockholm
summary: The Walkers invite you to take a walk along the narrow-paved streets of Stockholm and enjoy the views of its picturesque canals and restrained architecture. Learn interesting facts about the most fascinating landmarks of the capital of Sweden while completing challenging puzzles!

Are you Nostalgic for Internet horror? cool, i am too
This mod is basically... a mod abt Internet horror!!!!

summary: The NationalRail NR class locomotive was introduced in 1996, and became the most numerous locomotive on the Australian railway network, used on both freight and long distance passenger trains. This pack covers the various Indian Pacific liveries seen from 2005 till the present day.

name: Trainz Plus: NR Class Locomotive - JBR Indian Pacific Pack
summary: The NationalRail NR class locomotive was introduced in 1996, and became the most numerous locomotive on the Australian railway network, used on both freight and long distance passenger trains. This pack covers the various Indian Pacific liveries seen from 2005 till the present day.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: NR Class Locomotive - JBR Indian Pacific Pack
summary: The NationalRail NR class locomotive was introduced in 1996, and became the most numerous locomotive on the Australian railway network, used on both freight and long distance passenger trains. This pack covers the various Indian Pacific liveries seen from 2005 till the present day.

name: Treasure Knight
summary: Want to open a blind box? Want to DIY match equipment? Do you want to hatch phantom beast elves? Are you bored and even want to catch a big lobster? Become the Phantom Beast Knight, and you will personally compose the adventure and thrilling fantasy of the other world continent!

summary: The Harvard Subdivision: Commuter Edition route covers the Metra commuter train services from Ogilvie Transportation Center in Chicago, IL to Harvard, IL, a distance of about 85 miles. This route features detailed suburban scenes and open countryside, with 6 different passenger train sessions!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Harvard Subdivision - Commuter Edition
summary: The Harvard Subdivision: Commuter Edition route covers the Metra commuter train services from Ogilvie Transportation Center in Chicago, IL to Harvard, IL, a distance of about 85 miles. This route features detailed suburban scenes and open countryside, with 6 different passenger train sessions!

summary: This pack contains a selection of different types of wagons in both LMS liveries and North Staffordshire liveries. Wagons included are 1 plank, 2 plank, 3 plank, loco coal 3 plank, loco coal 5 plank, 6 plank, 7 plank, 15t wood/rail wagon and 20t brake van; each with custom features and options.

summary: This pack contains a selection of different types of wagons in both LMS liveries and North Staffordshire liveries. Wagons included are 1 plank, 2 plank, 3 plank, loco coal 3 plank, loco coal 5 plank, 6 plank, 7 plank, 15t wood/rail wagon and 20t brake van; each with custom features and options.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: LMS/NSR Wagon Pack 1
summary: This pack contains a selection of different types of wagons in both LMS liveries and North Staffordshire liveries. Wagons included are 1 plank, 2 plank, 3 plank, loco coal 3 plank, loco coal 5 plank, 6 plank, 7 plank, 15t wood/rail wagon and 20t brake van; each with custom features and options.

name: Trainz Plus: ProTrain The Eastern Range
summary: Farming and ranching have always been practiced on the high pastures of the Eastern Range. Covering 21 miles of track, based around the Northern US area, this route includes a four pre-made sessions, and new BN and NS Maersk SD40-2 locomotives.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: ProTrain The Eastern Range
summary: Farming and ranching have always been practiced on the high pastures of the Eastern Range. Covering 21 miles of track, based around the Northern US area, this route includes a four pre-made sessions, and new BN and NS Maersk SD40-2 locomotives.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: ProTrain The Eastern Range
summary: Farming and ranching have always been practiced on the high pastures of the Eastern Range. Covering 21 miles of track, based around the Northern US area, this route includes a four pre-made sessions, and new BN and NS Maersk SD40-2 locomotives.

name: Treasure Hunter for Pico
summary: Treasure Hunter for Pico is a game exclusively for Pico VR headset users.

name: Train Depart
summary: This is a short, atmospheric psychological horror prototype where you play as a 16-year-old boy experiencing his first long train ride. You can interact with strangers on the train, play games, and do routine things that people do during train trips.

name: Trophies
summary: Trophies is a kinetic visual novel of a young girl trying to escape to normality. Experience an endless tomorrow in this psychological thriller.

name: Train Simulator Classic: Brockenbahn - Wernigerode: Brocken Route
summary: Journey to the highest peak of the Harz Mountains passing breathtaking scenery with the historic narrow-gauge Brockenbahn Railway from WaggonWerkstatt.

name: Treasure Defence
summary: Treasure Defence is an award winning VR game that innovates on the classic tower defence genre. Play arcades, win towers and fight The Royal British Navy. Plunder gold from destroyed ships and fortify your pirate cove.

name: Traces of the Unknown
summary: "Traces of the Unknown" is a classic 2D action-adventure with RPG elements. Explore forests, deserts, caves, frozen environments, ancient dungeons, battle evil creatures, fierce and hungry animals, and unravel the ancient mysteries to discover the forgotten truth of the world.

name: Train Sim World 4: Berninalinie - Tirano: Ospizio Bernina Route
summary: Adventure to the Alps and drive famed RhB services as you climb, descend and weave your way through the cross-border peaks of Switzerland and Italy. You are invited into the stunning landscape of Europe, with Berninalinie for Train Sim World 4!

name: Train Simulator Classic: Amtrak AEM-7
summary: The reign of the remarkable Amtrak AEM-7 electric was long and successful on Amtrak's Northeast Corridor, and you can relive and enjoy the experience with the all-new AEM-7 for Train Simulator Classic!

name: Tricky Cow
summary: Help this crazy cow going through 100 fun and challenging levels by jumping on tiles!

name: Truck Sim 2024
summary: In Truck Sim 2024, players are thrust into the driver's seat of their own destiny. With a plethora of missions awaiting completion, from delivering crucial cargo to overcoming treacherous obstacles, every journey presents new opportunities and challenges. Whether it's hauling precious goods across long distances or tackling time-sensitive deliveries, the road ahead is yours to conquer.

name: Trio
summary: A collection of three educational mini-games from Macmillan aimed at pre-school kids. Sam Goes Shopping tasks the player with finding the right shop that sells a particular item and the department within it. Computer Snap is a colourful card matching game where youngsters have to match two pictures before the computer or their opponent. Tables Test is an opportunity for kids to test themselves on their knowledge of the times tables.

name: Trojan
summary: The NES port of Trojan. The game's controls consist of an eight-way joystick and two action buttons. Similarly to Kung-Fu Master or Rush'n Attack, the player jumps by holding the joystick upwards instead of having a dedicated jump button like other side-scrolling action games. Instead, one button is used to swing the sword at enemies and the other button is used to hold the shield to block enemy attacks, including projectiles such as throwing knives and arrows. The shield can be held towards the player while standing or crouching, as well as upwards vertically and diagonally. Some enemies will throw magic balls which will cause the player to lose their sword and shield if they block. During these instances, the player will fight barehanded, with the sword and shield buttons used to punch and kick respectively. The sword and shield will appear on-screen after some point, allowing the player to recover their weapon. Other power-ups includes floating hearts that will restore the player's health and jumping spots where the player can jump higher than usual.

name: Truxton Extreme
summary: Truxton Extreme, which inherits the DNA from legendary arcade masterpiece Truxton, is a collaboration with manga artist and Toaplan alumni Junya Inoue.

name: Trepang2: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
Become the ultimate badass in Trepang2. Unleash hell on your enemies in this gory action-packed FPS set in the future and stop at nothing to get your revenge.

The Deluxe Edition includes:

- Trepang2 Full Game
- Season Pass including Survival Mode DLC (Available Now) and Story DLC coming soon.

name: Trap for the Heir
summary: Gwen is an experienced werewolf mercenary. One day, she comes across a simple and very monetary order. But who is her mysterious customer? And will it be so easy to get to destination alive? New friends, old enemies and maybe a meeting with love...

name: Traveler's Refrain
summary: Wield your magical instrument and defy the mecha-goddesses of fate in this Song-Casting Story Driven Action-RPG. Explore a forbidden forest as Traveler, and help him reunite with his long lost love as you fight through abominations and solve mysterious puzzles, all while an ancient conflict unfolds.

name: Trucker Joe 2
summary: As a trucker, you take control of your own freight company, buying trucks, expanding your fleet and transporting goods across fantastic landscapes. Overcome challenges, upgrade your vehicles and experience the thrill of the trucking business.

name: Trooper
summary: VT03 (16-bit graphics) port of Trooper.

name: Travellers Road
summary: An otome visual romance novel about being stuck on a cart for three weeks with your two squabbling party members.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Port Saturn
summary: Port Saturn is in a fictional city somewhere in the USA with the Union Pacific servicing the port and the industries within the area. Go through the neighbourhoods as you head to either the northern part or the southern part of the harbour.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Port Saturn
summary: Port Saturn is in a fictional city somewhere in the USA with the Union Pacific servicing the port and the industries within the area. Go through the neighbourhoods as you head to either the northern part or the southern part of the harbour.

name: Trainz Plus: Port Saturn
summary: Port Saturn is in a fictional city somewhere in the USA with the Union Pacific servicing the port and the industries within the area. Go through the neighbourhoods as you head to either the northern part or the southern part of the harbour.

name: Trom
summary: Will you be able to guide these 2 robots through intricate puzzles full of traps? It will not be easy to overcome the 42 levels that separate them from freedom.

name: Trollin el Corredor
summary: A parody of a typical infinite runner, certain Wii U games and memes from the past decade! (Its a Meme Run fan remake)

name: Truck and Forklift Logistic Simulator
summary: Dive into Truck and Forklift Logistic Simulator, mastering logistics with your vehicles. Deliver cargo, conquer challenges, and redefine transportation in this dynamic simulator!

name: Trans-Siberian Legends
summary: A first-person adventure game with a storyline. You are about to travel on a passenger train along the Trans-Siberian Railway. You can look out the window and observe the change in nature, weather and architecture. You can see forests, fields, mountains, cities and villages.

name: Trendpoker 3D: Free Online Poker
summary: Play Online Poker without restriction or cost! Compete with community, your friends or family play this truly free Texas Hold'em Poker.

name: Trivia Deal
summary: Trivia Deal is the world’s first trivia roguelike. Answer fast. Play smart. Use lifelines, swap cards, and relics to survive the Rainbow Reaper. Each run is unforgiving, one wrong answer can end it all. High-stakes strategy with random questions, categories, and rewards that keep every run fresh.

name: Trust The Backrooms
summary: Explore The Backrooms and try to escape them in procedurally generated levels with different protagonists, each character having their own story, levels and endings.

name: Troleu
summary: TROLEU is a wacky and chaotic first-person action game that puts you in the shoes of a trolleybus conductor. Keep things rolling smoothly by ensuring passengers' travel validity, but watch out for rule-breakers! From issuing tickets to enforcing rules with your fists, it's all part of the wild ride.

name: Trolley Path to Gold
summary: Puzzle game, build your way to the gold mine by collecting all the tools that come along the way.

name: True Backrooms
summary: The most accurate depiction of the backrooms.

name: TransmuTowers
summary: The Kingdom is under attack! Collect resources, build towers, buy upgrades and work alone (or with up to 3 friends) to defend it! Select your favorite Alchemist from a magical coven, and fend off innumerable hordes of beasts in this post-apocalyptic fantasy world.

name: Transmogrified!
summary: Escape the elemental world of TRANSMOGRIFIED! Journey through bizarre realms of Wind, Water, Earth and Fire while seeking to solve the mystery of those who have been TRANSMOGRIFIED. Save those you meet along the way, and return yourself back to human form. BEWARE THE MUDMEN!

name: Tranquil Builds
summary: Construct an oasis of relaxing places, beautiful architecture and naturescapes. No time pressure. No scoring. No way to fail. Just relax and unwind.

name: Trappist
summary: Welcome to Trappist-1, 40.7 light-years from Earth. Fly your Ark, a colossal spaceship and mobile base. Explore the solar system and establish thriving colonies. Uncover the mysteries of Trappist in this story-driven colony builder.

name: Trash Horror Collection 4
summary: This collection includes 5 games and a story mode that will bring you the vibes of 80s trash films.

name: Trauma: Pro Wrestling
summary: I'ts TRAUMA Pro Wrestling! Fight in all sorts of match types, such as cage match, last man standing, electric barbed-wire, ironman and MORE! Customize your experience down to the most minute details in order to create your very own dream match and experience our 5 stars Career Mode!

name: Traveler Eternal Night
summary: In the game "Traveler: Eternal Night" you will embody a brave fighter who goes on a dangerous journey to destroy the evil that threatens the world. You have to explore different locations, fight monsters and complete quests to become stronger.

name: Travels of a Merchant's
summary: Travels of a Merchant's - a 2D adventure platformer game in a fantasy world where you take on the role of a merchant's assistant, completing a variety of tasks and adventures. Go on a tour through mysterious and dangerous lands, where exciting adventures await him, completing tasks from the merchant

name: TreamLand
summary: "TreamLand" brings a great adventure to life. Play as a hero on a mission to save the village and escape from the island.

name: Traverse the Backrooms
summary: Traverse the Backrooms" is an indie horror game that immerses players into a mysterious labyrinth. Explore corridors, solve puzzles, and uncover the secrets of this realm while avoiding lurking dangers. Will you escape or become lost in the depths of the Backrooms?

name: Treasure Hunters
summary: Treasure Hunters is an intense CO-OP treasure-hunting game set in mysterious dungeons filled with puzzles, platforms, and deadly creatures where your goal is to find and steal the most valuable treasures.

name: Treasures of the Sunken Ship
summary: A single-player game in which you have to search for treasures and uncover the sinister secrets of the depths of the sea. Explore the mysterious island and discover all the long-buried secrets.

name: Train Planet
summary: Welcome to Train Planet, the ultimate locomotion simulation game that allows you to immerse yourself in the captivating world of trains! Get ready to experience the thrill of being a train operator as you embark on a journey across a vast and diverse virtual landscape.

name: TractionSim
summary: In TractionSim you will find:Accurate simulation of all aspects of train control: from the work of traffic lights to traction with the railsA variety of routes: from simple to complex, with different types of trains and weather conditions.Multiplayer for joint play with friends

name: Traffic Master
summary: In the bustling city of Metroville, traffic congestion has reached unprecedented levels, causing frustration and delays for its residents. To address this issue, the city council introduces the traffic control initiative. you are responsible for managing traffic flow and resolving gridlock.

name: Trail of Singularity
summary: In 2207, Earth vanished. As a Hyper Station engineer, explore abandoned spaceships, face android guardians, craft tools, and mend your ship to find the last station in a 3000-light-year radius. Survival is key in this post-cataclysmic space odyssey.

name: Trivia Beta64 Party
summary: A Modification of Jackbox Games' Trivia Murder Party 2 - Inspired by the lore and community of Beta64, featuring overhauled voiceovers, music, trivia, and graphics.

name: Training Elves
summary: You are an adventurer of some renown that has grown tired of adventuring. After losing almost all of your money gambling, you meet two elves that seek you out and put you to task of training them into adventurers. In exchange, they give you amorous nights.

name: Train Sim World 4: Edinburgh - Glasgow: Engineering Express Pack
summary: Explore more gameplay on the ScotRail Express route, with newly liveried Class 66s joining ranks alongside the Class 385. From engineering movements to daring drags, expand your Edinburgh - Glasgow experience in Train Sim World 4.

name: Trepidation
summary: A co-op horror about searching the depths of the ocean for treasure.

name: Transpile Girl Rescue Operation!
summary: You can fix her! Transform Hina from a cold, emotionless robot to your strict & ideal wife!

name: Trianga's Project: Battle Splash 2.0 - Earth's Legacy M.A.I.A
summary: Enter a new way to experience Battle Splash 2.0: M.A.I.A - Multi-purposes Artificial Intelligent Agent!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Pro Train - SD40-2 Loco Bundle 1
summary: The EMD SD40-2 is a 3,000-horsepower (2,200 kW) C-C diesel-electric locomotive built by EMD from 1972 to 1989. Featuring multiple custom scripted features, PBR textures, and more, this pack includes Union Pacific, Norfolk Southern, Burlington Northern, Rock Island and Cheesie System (B&O) locos.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Pro Train - SD40-2 Loco Bundle 1
summary: The EMD SD40-2 is a 3,000-horsepower (2,200 kW) C-C diesel-electric locomotive built by EMD from 1972 to 1989. Featuring multiple custom scripted features, PBR textures, and more, this pack includes Union Pacific, Norfolk Southern, Burlington Northern, Rock Island and Cheesie System (B&O) locos.

name: Trainz Plus: Pro Train - SD40-2 Loco Bundle 1
summary: The EMD SD40-2 is a 3,000-horsepower (2,200 kW) C-C diesel-electric locomotive built by EMD from 1972 to 1989. Featuring multiple custom scripted features, PBR textures, and more, this pack includes Union Pacific, Norfolk Southern, Burlington Northern, Rock Island and Cheesie System (B&O) locos.

name: Train Simulator Classic: China Railways DF11G
summary: Arriving from Just Trains, the China Railways Dongfeng DF11G is a prominent locomotive developed for passenger services across China's national railway system.

name: Trajectory of summer flower Ⅱ
summary: "Wherever I am, as long as you're there, that place is my home." This is a romantic adventure game that revolves around the themes of family and rural customs. Set in the Eden touched by the summer breeze, the village journey of lavender and the colorful summer begins once again!

name: Trap Yuri Garden
summary: Traps in motion at long last! Trap series creators Aogiri Penta and Nishida Hajime bring us another exciting title, a cross-dressing yuri love story that will shatter its readers sense of values into a thousand pieces!

name: Troy: The Soldier
summary: Troy, a turn based RPG with Rougelite aspects, is a game based around your use of cash and how much you waste. With an emphasis on music and it's Gameboy-like art style, Troy acts as a playable mixtape for whoever wants to listen to some tunes as well as play a game.

name: Trust Me
summary: Guide the twin cats to their childhood friend Mii-chan. A two-player cooperative game created in PICO-8.

name: Trading Simulator
summary: Trading Simulator is an exciting and educational game that immerses you in the world of financial markets, where you become a virtual trader.

name: Train Simulator Classic: DB Fas 126
summary: A new wagon with unique remote shunting feature comes to Train Simulator Classic with the DB Fas 126 from MRW.

name: Trope Tales
summary: A somewhat comical take on classic JRPGs. Take on the role of Hero, a Silent Protagonist, as you venture across the world to defeat the Main Villains with the help of your friends: The Chick, The Smart Guy, and The Childhood Friend.

name: Train Sim World 4: Fife Circle Line - Edinburgh: Markinch via Dunfermline & Kirkcaldy Route
summary: From the Scottish Capital to the Firth of Forth Lowlands, embark on passenger services over iconic cantilevers and along picturesque coastline. A modern ScotRail Turbo stars in the spotlight of Rivet Games’ Fife Circle Line in Train Sim World 4!

name: Trickle Greenweed
summary: Help Trickle Greenweed, newly qualified mermaid attorney, save Christmas! Seanta has been accused of murdering CHRISTMAS ITSELF, and only Trickle, and her new friend Sparky the mer-elf, can prove Seanta's innocence and save the most magical time of the year!

name: Train Valley 2: Patent Pending
summary: Ride 20 valleys trains alongside the Flazm Interactive's Delivery Puzzle Ideas Requisition Division, where no expense is spared and jury-rigging new plot devices while accidentally inventing another chewing gum flavor or propulsion system is all just another day at the office.

name: Train Simulator Classic: Saluda Grade Scenario Pack 02
summary: Experience the challenges of Blue Ridge Mountain railroading and legendary Saluda Grade across two captivating eras - those of the Southern Railway and successor Norfolk Southern - with Saluda Grade Scenario Pack 02!

name: Trainz Plus: Pro Train - SD40-2 Loco Bundle 3
summary: The EMD SD40-2 is a 3,000-horsepower (2,200 kW) C-C diesel-electric locomotive built by EMD from 1972 to 1989. Featuring multiple custom scripted features, PBR textures, and more, this pack includes BNSF H3, Canadian Pacific, CSX, Milwaukee Road and SLSF (Frisco) locos.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019 Pro Train - SD40-2 Loco Bundle 3
summary: The EMD SD40-2 is a 3,000-horsepower (2,200 kW) C-C diesel-electric locomotive built by EMD from 1972 to 1989. Featuring multiple custom scripted features, PBR textures, and more, this pack includes BNSF H3, Canadian Pacific, CSX, Milwaukee Road and SLSF (Frisco) locos.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Pro Train - SD40-2 Loco Bundle 3
summary: The EMD SD40-2 is a 3,000-horsepower (2,200 kW) C-C diesel-electric locomotive built by EMD from 1972 to 1989. Featuring multiple custom scripted features, PBR textures, and more, this pack includes BNSF H3, Canadian Pacific, CSX, Milwaukee Road and SLSF (Frisco) locos.

name: Trans-Siberian Legends: Novosibirsk
summary: This DLC adds the city of Novosibirsk and its railway station to the game. On your way along the Trans-Siberian Railway you stop in Novosibirsk to stroll around the city.

name: Trion
summary: Shooter game

name: Truck Job
summary: A casual truck driving game. Deliver the cargo safely through different obstacles, challenges and enemies.

name: Trans-Siberian Legends: Posters in a Train Compartment
summary: The DLC adds beautiful posters with the theme of the Trans-Siberian Railway to the compartment car of the train. There will be a total of 3 posters in the carriage.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: CFR Modernised Doubledecker Pack No. 1
summary: Manufactured in 1988/89 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Romania, and many have been modernised. This pack features 6 versions of these cars with interior views, PBR textures, and more!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: CFR Calatori BDmee 84-16 002
summary: Manufactured in 1988/89 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Romania, and many have been modernised. This pack features 1 version of these modernised cars, PBR textures, and more!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: CFR Calatori ABmee 36-16 038
summary: Manufactured in 1988/89 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Romania, and many have been modernised. This pack features 1 version of these modernised cars, PBR textures, and more!

summary: Manufactured in 1988/89 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Romania, and many have been modernised. This pack features 6 versions of these cars with interior views, PBR textures, and more!

summary: Manufactured in 1988/89 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Romania, and many have been modernised. This pack features 1 version of these modernised cars, PBR textures, and more!

summary: Manufactured in 1988/89 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Romania, and many have been modernised. This pack features 6 versions of these cars with interior views, PBR textures, and more!

name: Trainz Plus: Pro Train - SD40-2 Loco Bundle 2
summary: The EMD SD40-2 is a 3,000-horsepower (2,200 kW) C-C diesel-electric locomotive built by EMD from 1972 to 1989. Featuring multiple custom scripted features, PBR textures, and more, this pack includes ATSF Santa Fe, BC Rail, Conrail, Canadian National, and NS Maersk Sealand locos.

name: Trainz Plus: Ffestiniog Railway Alco 1265 Mountaineer
summary: Built in 1916, Mountaineer served the front line trenches of WW1, and then various tramways in France after the war. In 1964, the loco was saved by the Ffestiniog Railway, and is currently under restoration. This DLC features several preserved versions of Mountaineer.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: CFR Calatori Bmee 26-16 096
summary: Manufactured in 1988/89 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Romania, and many have been modernised. This pack features 1 version of these modernised cars, PBR textures, and more!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: CFR Modernised Doubledecker Pack No. 2
summary: Manufactured in 1988/89 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Romania, and many have been modernised. This pack features 6 versions of these cars with interior views, PBR textures, and more!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Pro Train - SD40-2 Loco Bundle 2
summary: The EMD SD40-2 is a 3,000-horsepower (2,200 kW) C-C diesel-electric locomotive built by EMD from 1972 to 1989. Featuring multiple custom scripted features, PBR textures, and more, this pack includes ATSF Santa Fe, BC Rail, Conrail, Canadian National, and NS Maersk Sealand locos.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Pro Train - SD40-2 Loco Bundle 2
summary: The EMD SD40-2 is a 3,000-horsepower (2,200 kW) C-C diesel-electric locomotive built by EMD from 1972 to 1989. Featuring multiple custom scripted features, PBR textures, and more, this pack includes ATSF Santa Fe, BC Rail, Conrail, Canadian National, and NS Maersk Sealand locos.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Ffestiniog Railway Alco 1265 Mountaineer
summary: Built in 1916, Mountaineer served the front line trenches of WW1, and then various tramways in France after the war. In 1964, the loco was saved by the Ffestiniog Railway, and is currently under restoration. This DLC features several preserved versions of Mountaineer.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: CFR Modernised Doubledecker Pack No. 2
summary: Manufactured in 1988/89 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Romania, and many have been modernised. This pack features 6 versions of these cars with interior views, PBR textures, and more!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: CFR Calatori Bmee 26-16 096
summary: Manufactured in 1988/89 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Romania, and many have been modernised. This pack features 1 version of these modernised cars, PBR textures, and more!

name: Träumerei no Haka
summary:
Tsutsuji and Sumire meet on a deserted subway.
On the train, which never reaches the next station, the two search for a clue to escape.

name: Trio the Punch
summary:
The action game "Trio the Punch" that appeared in the arcade in 1989 appeared as a mobile app. Tough Guy Santos, Ninja Kamakura-kun, Swordsman Rosesub ... Three main characters will save the world??

Easy-to-understand game content! Defeat a specific enemy on the stage and get a heart! When you collect all the hearts, the stage boss appears. It is an action game that clears the stage if you defeat the boss.

Strong ~ player! You can choose from three main characters: "Santos" the tough guy, "Kamakura-kun" the ninja, and "Rosesub" the swordsman.
All three of them are strong characters.

And a suspicious world view... Both the enemy and the boss are full of suspicious characters!!

If you defeat the boss's "sheep", there are a lot of strange and bizarre stage events such as "sheep curse" where you will be cursed and become a sheep in the next stage.

Also, for some reason, something called "Mr. Chin's Roulette Corner" appeared between the stages. If you get a hit and do well, your HP will increase and your attack will be powered up!

name: Trucking Simulator
summary: Experience the thrill and challenges of life on the open road in Trucking Simulator! Strap in, hit the gas, and embark on an immersive journey through the bustling highways and scenic landscapes. Navigate your massive rig through ever-changing road conditions to deliver your cargo safely and on time

name: Travel to Australia
summary: Travel to Australia invites you on a whirlwind vacation through the Australian Outback. Explore beautiful beaches, unique wildlife, and more!

name: Travel to Thailand
summary: Travel to Thailand sends you on another amazing adventure with the Hudsons. Pack your bags for a trip to a tropical paradise!

name: Travel to Spain
summary: Travel to Spain invites you on a new adventure with the Hudsons! No need to pack your suitcases for this trip. A European excursion awaits you!

name: Travel to Mexico
summary: Travel to Mexico has an exciting adventure prepared just for you! Buckle up and join the Hudson family on their latest trip to Mexico.

name: Trizna
summary: “Trizna” is a classic plot-driven 2.5D metroidvania filled with intense battles utilizing the unique features of weapons, evasions, parries, and counterattacks. Explore the mysterious and eerie realm deeply intertwined with pagan beliefs, with blade, magic and a keen mind.

name: Tropico
summary:
Tropico is rich in resources, ripe with potential, and crying out for a leader with extraordinary vision! As El Presidente, transform this untapped pocket of paradise into an industrial powerhouse, a tourist playground and a budding superpower — all under your firm, but fair hand.

Take hold of the levers of power with the Meta Quest’s motion controllers, and lead your people by the hand to a brighter future using custom-built VR interfaces and intuitive gestures.

name: Tribute
summary: In "Tribute," a fast-paced roguelike, escape prison and save your son by harvesting souls for power, unlocking abilities, and facing numerous foes. Discover 15 endings shaped by your choices, with extensive upgrades and classes enhancing your journey.

name: Train Simulator Classic: Eamnos VTG Wagon Pack
summary: Bring more variety to your railroads and scenarios in Train Simulator with the Eamnos VTG Wagon Pack from virtualRailroads.

name: Train Simulator Classic: Tamns VTG Wagon Pack
summary: Expand your railways with additional freight rolling stock, the Tamns VTG Wagon Pack arrives from virtualRailroads.

name: Train Simulator Classic: Zacens Wagon Pack
summary: Add freight industry to your collection with the Zacens Wagon Pack from virtualRailroads.

name: Train Simulator Classic: Zcs VTG Wagon Pack
summary: Add some new freight rolling stock to your routes and scenarios with the Zcs VTG Wagon Pack from virtualRailroads.

name: Trailmakers: Rescue Pack
summary: You’ve built cars, airplanes, spaceships, boats, and everything in between. Now get ready to be a hero with the new Trailmakers Rescue Pack. Dress the part of one of modern society’s everyday heroes.

name: Trap Trek: Ultimate Other Me
summary: 『Trap Trek: Ultimate Other Me』is a third-person shooter action game. Players must navigate through challenging stages filled with unique traps, embarking on thrilling adventures. In addition to dashing and jumping, players can create avatars to overcome the traps.

name: Truxton II
summary:
Port of "Truxton II" for PC with many quality-of-life improvements.

The sequel to Toaplan’s shoot ‘em up masterpiece Truxton is a thrilling insane space action with an unforgiving difficulty level. Enjoy the visually stunning pixel graphics and vibrant music as you dodge the high-speed bullet rain and take on tough bosses.

name: Train Simulator: China Railways HXD1
summary: Discover ‘Harmony' with the China Railways HXD1, a new Chinese electric locomotive from Just Trains.

name: Train Simulator: Feather River Canyon Enhanced: Oroville - Portola
summary: The fabulous Western Pacific Feather River Canyon Route now comes to Train Simulator Classic in an expanded and enhanced edition, re-creating the railroad’s magnificent 118-mile Third Subdivision from Oroville to Portola, California!

name: Train Sim World 4: London Overground Suffragette line: Gospel Oak - Barking Riverside Route Add-On
summary: An Aventra Adventure awaits in Train Sim World 4! Discover North & East London boroughs aboard modern traction, traversing a newly electrified and extended line fit for future service. Become something of a driver yourself on Gospel Oak - Barking Riverside!

name: Train Simulator: Rudolfsbahn: Bruck an der Mur - Selzthal & Knittelfeld
summary: Head to scenic central Austria with Rudolfsbahn from RSSLO.

name: Train Simulator: Ringbahn Berlin Circle
summary: Travel around the capital of Germany in style with this detailed recreation of Ringbahn Berlin Circle for Train Simulator Classic from developer VirtualTracks.

name: Train Sim World 4: Bahnstrecke Salzburg - Rosenheim Route Add-On
summary: Go cross-border and shuttle along the rural backdrops of Europe in Train Sim World 4. Take a trip back to the early 2010s and climb aboard the classic BR 111 - tap into Deutsche Bahn regional services between Germany and Austria with Salzburg - Rosenheim!

name: Traulian: O Ultimo General
summary: Traulian: O Ultimo General is a medieval adventure game where you take the role of Traulian, the only survivor of the Dolbian army, in the great battle against the evil forces of Cerem. Your objective is to eliminate the monsters to avenge the death of your friends.

name: Treasure Hunt
summary: The Bee has found a treasure map! Come along with Saymour and his friends and join the Bee on a treasure hunt. But what's an exciting treasure hunt without a sneaky pirate around to foil the plans! You actually get involved in the hunt and a string of wacky adventures before you finally discover what the real "treasure" is! And, you'll even get personal phone calls from Saymour and the gang!

name: Trouble in Mother Goose Land
summary: Get ready for the grand opening of the wonderful Mother Goose Land amusement park. Mother Goose, Saymour, and their friends need your help with the preparations for the big event! You'll be meeting your favorite nursery rhyme characters and learning the rhymes that made them famous. But, while everyone's busy with the preparing, someone is out to spoil the fun! And, he has to be found out so the work can get done! So come along and actually get involved in making the arrangements - and solve the mystery of who's making the mischief - and why! And, you'll even get personal phone calls from Saymour and the gang!

name: Trench Defender
summary: An action-packed FPS where you defend your trench against waves of attacking enemies by utilizing a large selection of modern (and not so modern) military weapons, features both single-player and two player online multiplayer (peer-to-peer).

name: True Story Time
summary: "True Story Time" - the ultimate party game that guarantees endless laughter and unforgettable moments with friends!

name: Transformers Rescue Bots: Dash
summary: Assemble all the Rescue Bots and go on an action-packed adventure to save the world from the evil Dr. Morocco! Rescue citizens, outrun disasters and chase down Morbots. Avoid obstacles, collect Energon and morph from bot to vehicle to epic DinoBot! Roll to the rescue!

name: Transformers Rescue Bots: Hero Adventures
summary: Budge Studios presents Transformers Rescue Bots: Hero! Volcanoes, earthquakes, avalanches, or wildfires — wherever there are disasters, wherever there are people in need of help, you can always count on the Rescue Bots. Work together as a team to rescue the civilians of Griffin Rock from hazardous disasters and Doctor Morocco’s evil Morbots. Complete each mission successfully to earn badges. Transformers Rescue Bots, roll to the rescue!

name: Travel On, Pigeon!
summary: This is a puzzle-rhythm game about a tourist pigeon having a good time, with engaging challenges you can take at your own pace. Stroll through cute and nostalgic places and get with the flow in this chill and charming experience.

name: Trillenium
summary: In the year 2999, art is on the brink of extinction by AI. Within 3 Days, unite the few remaining artists together to end AI's monopoly on society once and for all. Trillenium is a bite-sized 2D RPG created by artists, for artists, and reminds us that to lose art is to lose humanity itself.

name: Traitor's Gambit
summary: "Traitor's Gambit" is a gripping multiplayer shooter filled with deception and suspense. Players take on roles like Innocents, Detectives, or Traitors, navigating diverse maps. With unique roles, expansive maps, and thrilling rounds, each game promises an unpredictable and dynamic experience.

name: Trouble Comes Twice: Bonus Stories
summary: An optional DLC that adds additional post-story moments to Trouble Comes Twice! Enjoy various short stories starring the twins and their love interests.

name: True Idle Simulator 2
summary: How long can You do nothing?

name: TR-12
summary: Defeat all monsters and survive for twenty minutes using your keyboard (or gamepad) to simultaneously move and shoot, running into powerups, like Haste and Nuke, in this newly hand-crafted shooter inspired by 16-bit classics like Smash T.V. and Contra.

name: Traffix 3D
summary: Traffic can create stressful situations, but with this traffic simulator, the effect is the exact opposite: you will feel pleasure simply by tapping and holding your finger on the screen and letting the cars pass through the traffic lights.

name: Trog Smash Island
summary: The little dinosaur and his friends are trying to escape from an island full of troglodytes. Help them to smash as many trogs as possible, and unleash their hidden power by collecting all the pineapples you find along the way.

name: Travel to France
summary: Travel to France invites you to visit the country of love! Explore the country, see world-famous sights and enjoy the world-class cuisine.

name: Tripper
summary: The game is one long difficult level. Get to the end of the level in the best time you can.

name: Trompers
summary: You have to catch aliens falling from their spaceships.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: SA CL Class - SSR Pack 01
summary: The CLF and CLP Classes were rebuilt as 3,300hp locomotives, with an EMD V16-645E3C engine in the 1990s. This pack features four CLF and CLP locomotives operated by Southern Shorthaul Railroad; these being CLF1 (SSR Yellow/Black), CLF3 (Primer white), CLP9 (Auscision) and CLP12 (Primer white).

name: Try to Wake Up : The Legend of Trevis
summary: Legend has it that if you fall into a deep sleep while your body struggles to survive, Trevis will welcome your soul into his labyrinth. If you want to wake up, take a good look around and don't overlook any anomalies...

name: Trivia Trials
summary: It's about Trial and Error. Show your resilience by passing all 20 random Questions and Riddles before your Time runs out, or admit to your weakness and surrender. It's your choice. Do you have what it takes?

name: Truth Universally Acknowledged
summary: It is a truth universally acknowledged that a teenage boy in possession of a fine life must be in want of a boyfriend.

name: Tribal Towers: Siege of the Shifting Fortress
summary: Fight through the shifting tower, loot powerful gear and gain new skills. Free your village from the curse that has beset it in this action-rpg. The tower changes every time but the fountains' magic will save your progress until you challenge the bosses and the wizard himself.

name: True Love For Her
summary: True Love For Her (TLFH) is a Yandere game inspired by Yandere Simulator and Life Is Strange that doesn’t compete with the original games. This game involves murder and other methods of killing, so it is not suitable for kids. We are not responsible for any actions taken by kids replicating activities from TLFH in real life.

name: Triad
summary: Space shooter

name: Triple Laser RPG
summary: Based on the titular chamber from Portal 2, Triple Laser RPG explores the testing elements of Aperture Science as lighthearted characters in a short story about solving this seemingly impossible test chamber.

name: Transistors Revenge
summary: The computer's CPU is under attack and you have to defend it.

name: Trans-Siberian Legends: Ekaterinburg
summary: This DLC adds the city of Yekaterinburg and its railway station to the game. On your way along the Trans-Siberian Railway you stop in Yekaterinburg to stroll around the city.

name: Train Simulator Classic: Tennessee Pass
summary: The Rio Grande Railroad’s Tennessee Pass route across the Colorado Rockies: It was legendary, tough, scenic, and steep, and, in reaching an elevation of 10,221 feet above sea level, was the highest standard-gauge main line in the United States.

name: Trace
summary: Third-person RPG with messenger tracking exploration

name: Trading Towns
summary: Trading Towns Idle is a simple and relaxing economic game in which you have to find ways to make money.

name: Trouble of Tabu
summary: Take up the challenge and aim your sword to the ground in this true precision platformer. Struggle through the various challenges and try to finish the game in one go.

name: Trans-Siberian Legends: Beautiful Girls
summary: This DLC adds beautiful girls to passenger cars.

name: Trap Tower Trials
summary: Trap Tower Trials is a 3D single-player platformer that will test your dexterity with various traps and obstacles. This game is designed to be a challenge; therefore, we are not responsible for any peripherals broken in anger. Do you think you'll be able to climb the tower?

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Swayfield Branch
summary: Hiawathamr Trainz Add-ons presents the Swayfield Branch for Trainz! The Swayfield Branch is a UK themed route set in the Midlands of the United Kingdon. On the southern end of the route is the main line that connects the branch line to the rest of the BR system for both goods and passenger traffic.

name: Trainz Plus: Swayfield Branch
summary: Hiawathamr Trainz Add-ons presents the Swayfield Branch for Trainz! The Swayfield Branch is a UK themed route set in the Midlands of the United Kingdon. On the southern end of the route is the main line that connects the branch line to the rest of the BR system for both goods and passenger traffic.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Swayfield Branch
summary: Hiawathamr Trainz Add-ons presents the Swayfield Branch for Trainz! The Swayfield Branch is a UK themed route set in the Midlands of the United Kingdon. On the southern end of the route is the main line that connects the branch line to the rest of the BR system for both goods and passenger traffic.

name: Tresmir Sight
summary: Can you find what you're looking for? Or are you at the mercy of Tisik and her followers? Your words matter in this short game of dialogue.

name: Train Simulator Classic: Empire State Express No. 999
summary: Climb aboard and take the throttle of one of North America's most historic - and fastest - steam locomotives and “highball” the fabulous Empire State Express with New York Central & Hudson River 4-4-0 No. 999, masterfully created for Train Simulator Classic by Machine Rail!

name: Train Sim World 4: Semmeringbahn - Wiener Neustadt - Mürzzuschlag Route
summary: Explore the World's first true mountain railway in Train Sim World 4! Work winding trains at altitude through the rocky, forested peaks of the Austrian Alps. Climb the Semmering Pass before hastening downgrade towards historic Wiener Neustadt.

name: Truck
summary: Survive endless hordes of zombies by driving over them and upgrading your truck with weapons. The only way out is to keep driving. Survive 30 minutes in each of the five maps, collect coins and unlock new trucks!

name: Trojan
summary: "Trojan" is the first innovative fantasy war chess game to utilize a synchronous turn-based strategy. The victory depends on whose strategy surpasses the other, determined by who can look further into the unpredictable future.

name: Truth Seekers
summary: Truth Seekers is a horror multiplayer cooperative shooter game centered around hunting urban legends and folklore monsters. Find and craft items to aid in your attack, all while strategizing with others to learn the monsters' behaviors before they learn yours...

name: Trianga's Project: Battle Splash 2.0 - Pentaga Maid Outfit #1
summary: Pentaga Maid Outfit #1 - Beautiful maid outfit for Pentaga

name: Trianga's Project: Battle Splash 2.0 - Quadra Maid Outfit #1
summary: Quadra Maid Outfit #1 - Beautiful maid outfit for Quadra

name: Trianga's Project: Battle Splash 2.0 - Temiko Maid Outfit #1
summary: Temiko Maid Outfit #1 - Beautiful maid outfit for Temiko

name: Trianga's Project: Battle Splash 2.0 - Trianga Maid Outfit #1
summary: Trianga Maid Outfit #1 - Beautiful maid outfit for Trianga

name: Traintracks Combat
summary: Traintracks Combat is a fighting game set on the Chicago CTA. Choose your commuter and duke it out at the California blue line stop.

name: Trap Dungeons 2
summary: Trap Dungeons 2 is a crazy 2D action-adventure game where you have to go from one point to another. Just be careful of the traps.

name: Trapped Inside a Train (And There's Nothing You Can Do About It)
summary:
You're stuck inside a train. There's got to be something you can do to get out, right?

(A short, nonsensical experimental game. Featuring several endings, including a 'true' one unlocked by seeing all the others, snark, and a train.)

name: Trump Quest
summary: The 2016 American election has escalated to biblical proportions and World War III has begun. Donald Trump has taken his stance against the most important issues plaguing the world straight to the front lines. Brought to you by the same team that built the masterpiece known as Mystery Combat Man 3, TRUMP QUEST delivers an experience unrivaled among all source mods, video games, and perhaps entertainment as a whole.

name: Trapped Terrors
summary:
Trapped Terrors: A Story for Two is a horror story for two players.
Both players will need to install the app on their smartphone or tablet of choice to play.

name: Tribble Trubble
summary: Loosely based on the cult episode "The Trouble With Tribbles" from the original Star Trek series you are a tribbles farmer and have to guide a batch of your newly bred critters to safety.

name: Trenchpunk
summary: A dieselpunk Wolfenstein 3d inspired first person shooter.

name: TriMatch
summary: TriMatch, the addicting puzzle challenge where you must match colorful triangles to score big and conquer each level! Strategize and align triangles based on their colored sides to rack up points and unlock the next level. Dive into the world of TriMatch for an addictive and brain-teasing experience that will keep you coming back for more!

name: TRIB3
summary: TRIB3 is a cutting-edge, multiplayer combat game by Flux Point Studios, blending intense action with strategic gameplay. Set in a dystopian future, players engage in fierce battles, employing a variety of weapons and skills to dominate opponents and rise through the ranks.

name: Train Your Brain! Spot the Difference with Dog Photos
summary:
Spot the Difference in Puppy Photos!
Enjoy brain training while being soothed by adorable dog images.

name: Tractor Farming Simulator 3D
summary: Are you ready to till the soil, sow the seeds, and reap the rewards?

name: Trench Tales
summary: A story-driven third-person action game set in a dark, alternative world between WWI and WWII. Harness unique powers, customize your arsenal, and navigate haunting Gothic landscapes. Battle fallen soldiers as you uncover the mysteries of this realm.

name: Treasure Guardian: Collector Shift Defender's Saga
summary: Defend, Collect, Prevail: Safeguard the Fortune, Secure Your Honor!

name: Trauma
summary: "Trauma" is a walking simulator action-adventure game sprinkled with horror elements. The only action you can perform besides walking is stabbing with a knife. Enjoy your journey into the strange world of dreams.

name: Trailmakers: Rescue Bundle
summary: Get Trailmakers alongside our latest expansion: The Rescue Pack! Jump right into the game with full access to 9x new Rescue-themed blocks, 4x new outfits and 16x new decals.

name: Trailmakers: Rescue Deluxe Bundle
summary: This pack contains all you need for the ultimate Rescue experience. The full arsenal of Trailmakers combined with all the live-saving blocks of the Rescue Pack - tried and tested against the ruthless, intense waves of the High Seas DLC. The latter of which can now be applied to all maps in Trailmakers.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: BR Diesel Brake Tenders
summary: This pack contains 3 types of British Railways (BR) brake tenders, 2 prototypes and 1 main production variant, which includes 3 different types of bogies, with 3 different period liveries in clean and weathered versions.

name: Truck Simulator City Delivery
summary: Experience the thrill of the road—play Truck Simulator City Delivery today!

name: Truck Simulator City Delivery: American Electric Semi-Truck Car
Truck Simulator City Delivery: European Box Van Car
Trash Pandamonium
summary: Get ready for Trash Pandamonium: the ultimate couch co-op party game! Control colorful raccoons, beat the trash out of opponents, and dominate dynamic maps full of hazards. Customize your raccoon, gather your crew, and prepare for pandamonium!

name: Trash Can Tactics
summary: Ever since the Nature's Legacy Institute has opened their doors to all, there have been an odd string of thefts - not of rare artifacts, but rather of the food from the cafeteria. Play as either a museum staff member, or an intelligent raccoon, in this asymmetrical PvP heist game.

name: Truth of Blood
summary:
Passing a graduation exam with your life?
Graduation, death... or love?
A dizzying romance with 4 charming men of 4 colors, a time of blood and death (Truth of Blood).

name: Traffic Race 3D 2
summary: Traffic Race 3D 2 is a tribute to retro racing, race solo or split screen with a friend. Prove that you are an awesome driver by reaching the 1st place on the online leaderboards

name: Trench Warfare WW1: RTS Battle
summary: As a WWI general, command your army across trenches in the Eastern Front and Western Front, experiencing real-life historical battles as both the Allies and Central powers. Engage in real time strategy (RTS) where your objective is to select the right combination of soldiers and tanks to conquer the enemy trenches. Survive wave upon wave of enemy soldiers as they try to gain supremacy and use tactical artillery strikes to support your army. Choose your side from a variety of WWI nations including the British, Germans, French, and Ottoman military. Simulate battles such as Somme, Verdun, and Gallipoli, experiencing total war. In Trench Warfare WWI your goal is to gain supremacy by capturing the enemy trenches and seeing your nations flag wave in the wind. Use RTS strategy and battle alongside your allies army in the trenches of total war!

name: Treepury
summary: TREEPURY is a game where you hire adventurers, deploy them to production buildings, and defeat monsters to make your guild bigger and better.

name: Truncheon Titties
summary: A Dark Medieval Porn game centered around exhibitionism, big ole titties, abuse of authority, blowjobs, spanking, bullying and revenge. Join the Royal Guard and fight against the criminal scum. Make your choice to show your tits or swing that truncheon!

name: Trilingual
summary: Welcome to the planet, Triangulus. Can you solve the hidden mysteries of each island and escape with your brain intact? Scan these ancient runes to decode a new alien language. Use this alien language to grow plants, move trains, and even save the Trilings of the planet.

name: Triad
summary: Embark on an epic journey across the realm of Lyria in this real time fantasy RPG paying homage to classic games. Assemble your Triad from 15 unique classes, engage in strategic tab-targeting combat, and uncover ancient secrets in a world of danger and mystery.

name: TranceWave Neo
summary: tranceWave NEO is a classic arcade twin-stick shmup, inspired by others in the "trance shooter" genre. Move, shoot, survive, and aim for a high score!

name: Tragala
summary: Tragala is a graphic adventure game in which you will play Kurt, a restless young man who tries to escape from the system house ruled by the junjuma, a control and blame machine that is part of a systematic and terrible monster known as Tragala.

name: Trailblazers: Into the March
summary: Embark on a thrilling adventure in this roguelite colony-sim strategy game. Command your Landship in tactical battles, care for a crew composed of all sorts of characters, shape your home, manage resources, and lead expeditions into the March. Discover what lies at its heart... and in yours.

name: Trial Traction
summary: Jump onto your cross bike and drive along a trail filled with many obstacles and humps to overcome!

name: Trams, Trains & Monorails
summary: Trams, Trains & Monorails is a strategic Hex tile puzzle game. Guide the development of your own city, connecting stations and districts and completing the mini goals. Watch your city come alive as it develops industries, tourism and lost motorists.

name: Trials Bike Basic
summary: Amazing real-life trials game. Negotiate obstacles in the quickest time!

name: Trabi Racer
summary: On streets in Poland and all of Europe we can still see these cars. With Trabi Racer you can expierience racing with this cultic machine. Characteristic sound of engine, box-shaped view, 5 car versions and tuned supermachines from the beggining of 1980!.

name: Trapped
summary: When you wake up in a prison cell, you have no memory of who you are or how you even got there. If you don't want to rot to death, it's up to you to find a way out and explore the island you've been trapped on with a girl you'll meet outside named Mila. Like you, she has no idea how she got to the island or what's going on. If you want to get out of there, both of you are going to have to work to together to escape! If you're not careful, your choices could lead to your death or you'll just have to die of old age alone. Whichever comes first.

name: Tropico 6: Tropican Shores
summary: A new age is dawning upon Tropico as El Presidente turns toward the great Blue Gold that surrounds its shores: Tropico 6 - Tropican Shores brings you tons of new opportunities to build and expand your island - on the ocean.

name: Train Your Brain! Spot the Difference with Cat Photos
summary:
Spot the Difference in Kitten Photos!
Enjoy brain training while being soothed by adorable cat images.

name: Trasmoz Legends
summary: Introducing a brand new retro arcade game designed exclusively for modern computers and consoles, drawing inspiration from the classic Trasmoz Saga for ZX Spectrum and the Amstrad CPC.

name: Trio Tactics TD
summary: Dive into our exciting Tower Defense game! Choose from three unique towers and utilize specialized skill trees and powerful abilities. Develop your strategy, defeat various enemies, and become the ultimate defense strategist!

name: Transit Loop
summary: Escape from an Anomalous Looping Subway through the Appropriate Exit.

name: Travel Trivia
summary: This is a challenging and fun quiz game of less-known facts and notorious quirks of all countries of the world. Most of the topics are about oddities of culture, natural wonders, eccentric world records, strange jurisdiction, crazy things in politics and a good number of surprising twists in history. It's much more entertaining than an ordinary geography questionnaire app!

name: Truck Parking Simulator VR
summary: Truck Parking Simulator VR is a fully interactive, realistic and immersive parking experience. But also an open world where you can deliver goods by truck. The game has one of the best truck physics simulations in VR.

name: Troma Presents Poultrygeist
summary: Crack the case of a chicken massacre and prevent a town of lawn mower lovers and suburban chicken farmers from destroying each other while managing a looming magical threat.

name: Train Simulator: EA-692
summary: A Romanian rail icon arrives from developer Train Motion.

name: Train Simulator: Stevens Pass Scenario Pack 02
summary: Experience challenging Stevens Pass railroading during the remarkable and memorable era of the Burlington Northern - with Stevens Pass Scenario Pack 02 from High Iron Simulations!

name: Train Simulator: Payerbach - Wien Hbf Route Add-On
summary: Explore the east side of Austria from Wien (Vienna) to Payerbach with this Train Simulator route from RSSLO.

name: Train Simulator: ÖBB 4748
summary: Take control of this modern electric multiple unit from RSSLO, as you drive across the Austrian / Italian border.

name: Trainz 2022: SA CL Class - RailPower Pack
summary: The CLF and CLP Classes were rebuilt as 3,300hp locomotives, with an EMD V16-645E3C engine in the 1990s. This pack features four CLF and CLP locomotives owned by RailPower; these being CLF2 20+ (ex GWA Orange & Black), CLF4 20+ (ex GWA Orange & Black), and CLP11/13 22+ (ex QRN Yellow/Black/Maroon).

name: Trainz Plus: BR Diesel Brake Tenders
summary: This pack contains 3 types of British Railways (BR) brake tenders, 2 prototypes and 1 main production variant, which includes 3 different types of bogies, with 3 different period liveries in clean and weathered versions.

name: Trainz Plus: C44aci Locomotive - ARG/Mineral Resources Pack
summary: The C44aci is a model of Australian heavy duty diesel electric locomotive designed by UGL Rail and built at the Broadmeadow factory. It is operated by a number of rail freight operators, including ARG and Mineral Resources on a variety of freight services across Australia.

name: Trainz Plus: Model Trainz - Freemont Mills
summary: Model Trainz: Freemont Mills is inspired from the Jan. 2024 issue of Model Railroader by Steven Otte. While small, there are plenty of operations that can be performed which can turn into a challenge.

name: Trainz Plus: ProTrain - AC4400CW Loco Bundle 1
summary: Get five detailed AC4400 Locomotives in Union Pacific, Canadian Pacific, Southern Pacific and Kansas City Southern liveries.

name: Trainz Plus: Pro Train - SD40-2 Loco Bundle 4
summary: The SD40-2 was introduced in January 1972 as part of EMD's Dash 2 series, competing against the GE U30C and the ALCO Century 630. Get four new liveries of this locomotive.

name: Trainz Plus: Pro Train - Sequoia Valley
summary: Climbing through the steep Sequoia Valley, this route set in the Badgers Pass county connects Fox City and Elk River to Wilmington and finally Sequoia Falls. This route includes 4 new sessions, and CP AC4400CW and SD40-2 locomotives, and UP SD40-2 locomotives.

name: Trainz Plus: Milton Valley Railroad
summary: The Milton Valley Railroad (MVR) is a fictional railroad based in North Carolina, its reach extending at the height of its power all the way north to Canada and south to Georgia. The MVR as represented in this route is currently in the 1960s transitional era, featuring both diesel and steam locos.

name: Trainz Plus: SA CL Class - QR National Pack
summary: TheCLP Class were rebuilt as 3,300hp locomotives, with an EMD V16-645E3C engine in the 1990s. This pack features the CLP locomotive owned by Queensland Rail National, CLP 11 and CLP 13, in their iconic yellow, black and maroon 'Eagle' livery.

name: Trainz Plus: SA CL Class - RailPower Pack
summary: The CLF and CLP Classes were rebuilt as 3,300hp locomotives, with an EMD V16-645E3C engine in the 1990s. This pack features four CLF and CLP locomotives owned by RailPower; these being CLF2 20+ (ex GWA Orange & Black), CLF4 20+ (ex GWA Orange & Black), and CLP11/13 22+ (ex QRN Yellow/Black/Maroon).

summary: The C44aci is a model of Australian heavy duty diesel electric locomotive designed by UGL Rail and built at the Broadmeadow factory. It is operated by a number of rail freight operators, including ARG and Mineral Resources on a variety of freight services across Australia.

summary: Get five detailed AC4400 Locomotives in Union Pacific, Canadian Pacific, Southern Pacific and Kansas City Southern liveries.

name: Trainz 2022: Pro Train - Sequoia Valley
summary: Climbing through the steep Sequoia Valley, this route set in the Badgers Pass county connects Fox City and Elk River to Wilmington and finally Sequoia Falls. This route includes 4 new sessions, and CP AC4400CW and SD40-2 locomotives, and UP SD40-2 locomotives.

summary: The Milton Valley Railroad (MVR) is a fictional railroad based in North Carolina, its reach extending at the height of its power all the way north to Canada and south to Georgia. The MVR as represented in this route is currently in the 1960s transitional era, featuring both diesel and steam locos.

summary: The SD40-2 was introduced in January 1972 as part of EMD's Dash 2 series, competing against the GE U30C and the ALCO Century 630. Get four new liveries of this locomotive.

name: Trainz 2022: SA CL Class - QR National Pack
summary: TheCLP Class were rebuilt as 3,300hp locomotives, with an EMD V16-645E3C engine in the 1990s. This pack features the CLP locomotive owned by Queensland Rail National, CLP 11 and CLP 13, in their iconic yellow, black and maroon 'Eagle' livery.

name: Truck Manager
summary: Create and manage your own truck company. Create routes and transport cargo all over the world while you expand your fleet of trucks and logistics centers. Truck Manager is among the most realistic of the simulator genre - so prove yourself and beat your friends and other real life managers.

name: Trade And Fight
summary: Explore, trade with towns and villages, and fight enemies.

name: TRex Hero
summary: TRex Hero is a hilarious action game where you must literally run from one side of the screen to the other to save your life, while rescuing future generations of dinosaurs from an asteroid rain. Avoid the funny effects caused by the asteroids, while taking advantage of powerful power-ups.

name: Trial of Sacrifice
summary: A cult, devoted to the dark god, Chernobog, has opened a rift between the mortal world and Chernobog's realm, where he has been imprisoned for centuries. From within the rift, darkness spreads out and threatens to envelope the entire world.

name: Truck Simulator USA & ATV Monster Rally Bundle
summary: Double the Wheels, Double the Thrills. Two Epic Journeys but just One Bundle: Truck Simulator USA & ATV Monster Rally Bundle!

name: Troll Face Quest: Game of Trolls
summary: Troll Face Quest - a popular series of adventure quests distinguishing feature of which is a huge amount of humor, a hilarious cast of characters and dozens of funny situations. Troll Face Quest: Game of Trolls - a new part of the franchise, this time the developers have borrowed a number of popular themes from movies, comics and fairy tales, thus building a logical story of passing which you have to go through about a dozen different worlds. The developers kept the General atmosphere, graphics and characters.

name: Trichromat
summary: This game was made in 2 weeks for the Acerola Jam 0. It's a puzzle game wher you have to make the withe with the rgb color in boxes and other forms.

name: Trepang2: Bladekisser DLC
summary: Shoot and slice your way through enemies with the Trepang2 Bladekisser DLC. Embark on new missions in new areas, and engage in close, brutal combat with your sword. Are you worthy enough to wield the blade?

name: Transformers: Galactic Trials
summary: Choose your loyalty by playing as iconic AUTOBOTS or DECEPTICONS including Bumblebee, Megatron and Optimus Prime, and collect the stolen Prime Relics across the tracks to unlock new skills. Make it to the finish line by racing around 10 battle-race circuits in both vehicle and bot form, beating enemies along the way in exciting rogue-lite combat!

name: Triple Bubble
summary:
This is a bubble shooting game in the style of Puzzle Bobble. You can choose to play in 2 modes:

* Triple Mode: Levels are wider, and you get 3 bubble launchers to cover more area. You can change your position to other launchers with buttons L & R.
* Classic Mode: The classic, single-launcher experience.

name: Traumatarium: Penitent
summary:
A dungeon crawler inspired by the Fighting Fantasy books and Warhammer Quest 1995.

The followup to Traumatarium, Penitent aims to improve on the success of the original, while improving and expanding on almost all aspects. You have three distinct dungeons to overcome, all while managing scarce resources and making hard decisions on when to push on, or use a map to return to the safety of one of the few outposts found in those dark halls.

Traumatarium Penitent takes place well after the events of the original game. The kingdom's knights have broken into two factions: the Penitents, who swore to pay off their sins in defense of the kingdom, and the Ebon Legion, who aim to bring forth again the evil spirits that once haunted the land.

name: Train Sim World 4: Nahverkehr Dresden - Riesa Route Add-On
summary: Experience complex operations out of the iconic Dresden Hbf, with passengers and freight converging to make a hustle and bustle mix of traffic. Be in control of modern traction and explore the countryside of Train Sim World 4: Nahverkehr Dresden - Riesa.

name: Tropical Alien Massacre
summary: Small city map located on a tropical island.

name: Transport 2
summary: This map is a sequel to jade base. It's a large, sometimes difficult level which should provide a challenge to even the most seasoned of players

name: Trailmakers Hat Pack
summary:
Have you ever thought to yourself: “This awesome Viking ship that I just built in Trailmakers is missing something… like a Viking?” If so, you're in luck! With the Hat Pack, YOU can be that Viking.

The Hat Pack contains 13 pieces of headwear for the characters in Trailmakers. If you purchase this pack, you will have all headwear options available in the game.

name: Trailmakers: Space Voyager Pack
summary: Expand your space-experience with the Space Voyager Pack containing one functional block and a bunch of Sci-Fi looking cosmetic items for that genuine outer-space feel.

name: Trailmakers: Skin Pack
summary: Make your creations look amazing with cool skins

name: Trailmakers: Skin Pack 2
summary: The master builder's choice!

name: Train Sim World 4: LIRR Commuter - New York: Long Beach, Hempstead & Hicksville
summary: Time to truly experience America's busiest commuter railroad in Train Sim World 4! Return to Long Island and delve deep into an enhanced New York - Hicksville, now including the Long Beach branch, new lighting and skies, overhauled signalling, an all-new bustling timetable, and the LIRR M9!

name: Train Your Brain! Spot the Difference With Fish Photos
summary:
Find the Differences in the Photos of Sea Creatures!
Not just cute fish, but also dolphins, seals, and jellyfish!

name: Truth in Turbulent
summary: Truth in Turbulent "Truth in Turbulent" is an AVG mystery set in a chaotic era. As Meng Xubai, uncover truths behind your uncle's disappearance and find the truth with wit and courage.

name: Transmission From Start to End
summary: Players resist enemy invasion by building production bases, constructing conveyor belts, upgrading carriers, and strengthening weapons.

name: Trip's Voyage: Gem Rush
summary: A fast-paced, arcade-style minigame about chasing a high-score while being chased by some ghastly foes! Originally a minigame called "Well Raider" from the game Trip's Voyage made inside Dreams for the PS4/PS5.

name: Tremors: Rebirth
summary: A video game movie that allows you to experience Tremors

name: Treasure Protector
summary: In this game, you play as a dragon defending your treasure by burning, freezing, poisoning, and shocking knights, archers, and thieves. Combine elemental powers for powerful effects, raise dragons and set traps in this turn-based strategy.

name: Treasure Hunter
summary: Treasure Hunter is a multigame collector and crafting game in which you can obtain items on different ways and craft or exchange them for others.

name: Trifecta
summary: An arcade match-3 game about combining triangles! Play the default mode to hone your skills, compete for the highest score in dailies, and create custom game modes to share with friends!

name: Train to Nowhere
summary: How could an ordinary trip turn into a nightmare? Discover the secret of the creepy train and help the main hero get out of this pool of horror.

name: Treasure Royale
summary: Fight against greedy pirates to steal precious gems or uncover the hidden treasures to become the king of the cursed islands! Play online with random players or with your friends now for free!

name: Trouble Makers
summary: Let's Make Trouble!!! Survive as long as you can, but more importantly cause trouble. Take control of the trouble makers. Collect up to 4 weapons at a time and power up your trouble bar to send waves of pain to other players.

name: Truckful
summary: Drive your pickup truck through seemingly peaceful countryside valleys, deliver much-needed goods to local townsfolk and unravel the small town mystery. Beware, the old forest is watching.

name: Try to Survive Today
summary: A three-dimensional shooter with an isometric camera or a first- or third-person view. You in a fur suit shoot all sorts of devils and robots spawning from everywhere. By gaining experience for destroying enemies, collecting their souls, you upgrade your tree of characteristics

name: Trucy's Magical Catastrophe
summary: Welcome one, welcome all to a fast-paced rapid tale about the aftermath of one of Trucy Wright's many illustrious Christmas Shows! With presents galore and a sparkle of magic in the air, there's always fun to be had, cheer to be spread... and horror, when gifts go wrong! Join Trucy and her handy no-name sidekick Apollo whose a legal aide or something boring on their adventure to prevent a magical catastrophe!

name: Trainer Eyes VR
summary: Let's workout with a girl! Are you ready for the first-ever workout/rhythm/simulation game?

name: Train Sim World 4: Cargo Line Vol. 2 - Aggregates
