summary: Set in a reimagined Netherlands in 2027, discover a new era of trucking where AI dispatchers work alongside human drivers and the industry is thriving. Join Lucas and Felix as they face new challenges, forge alliances, and adapt to an evolving industry in this next chapter of the Truck Driver series.

name: TriPeaks Solitaire
summary:
TriPeaks Solitaire is a variation of Golf and Black Hole, and is also known as Tri Towers, Three Peaks, and Triple Peaks.

Our TriPeaks Solitaire game gives you unlimited and unrestricted gameplay, so you can play to your heart’s content…no more waiting for the next TriPeaks level to unlock! We bring you the best TriPeaks Solitaire game in the App Store with unique animations, clean design, and simple gameplay. Download today!

It’s quick and easy to learn: tap a card that is one value higher or lower than your active card to move it off the table. Solve deals by clearing all the cards off your table!

name: Truck Simulator 25: Euro Driver VR
summary: Hit the road in Truck Simulator 25: Euro Driver VR and experience the thrill of driving massive trucks across Europe in full virtual reality! Navigate busy streets, scenic highways, and challenging delivery routes as you transport trailers and vehicles to their destinations. Every level tests your driving skills, patience, and precision—one wrong turn can lead to a fine! Step into the driver’s seat and experience the freedom, excitement, and challenges of life behind the wheel like never before.

name: Trivia Fantasy
summary: Trivia Fantasy is a trivia-based adventure with RPG progression. Crawl your way through a decayed tower filled with forgotten knowledge and defeat the dying deity that that awaits at the summit!

name: Trails in the Sky 1st Chapter: Banner Set C
Trails in the Sky 1st Chapter: Character Stand Set
Trails in the Sky 1st Chapter: Demon King Dress-up Set
summary: A DLC exclusive attachment item set that lets characters dress up as demon kings.

name: Trails in the Sky 1st Chapter: Fine Red Diner Costume Set Vol. 3
summary: Allows the player to change certain characters into their Fine Red Diner costumes.

name: Trails in the Sky 1st Chapter: Launch Celebration Pack
Trails in the Sky 1st Chapter: Original Diner Costume Set Vol. 3
summary: Allows the player to change certain characters into their Original Diner costumes.

name: Trails in the Sky 1st Chapter: Resort Style Swimsuits (Estelle & Joshua)
Trails in the Sky 1st Chapter: Trendy Headgear Set
summary: A DLC exclusive attachment item set that lets characters equip headgear.

name: Triste
summary: Not all nightmares are scary. Some just repeat themselves, silent and slow, like a punishment that never ends... You are trapped in Triste’s world, where every turn decides your fate. Only your cards and your instinct can carve a path through the chaos in a cycle that never seems to end.

name: Troll Chess Sekai
summary: One day, you gain the power to cast a troll spell in a chess game. Eager to try it out, you head to the chess club—where rivals range from novice Mirai to the mysterious owner who surpasses human skill. The rules of chess are no longer safe. Will you seize victory, or be swallowed by chaos?

name: Trasmoz Legends: Revenge of Trasmoz
summary: The curse is broken… but evil never sleeps. Return to Trasmoz in this spectacular Amstrad CPC sequel, now with co-op mode, vibrant colors, and new challenges. Get ready for Mutamin’s revenge!

name: Trasmoz Legends: The Curse of Trasmoz
summary: Travel to the cursed heart of Trasmoz in this 8-bit gem. Play the original arcade platformer for ZX Spectrum instantly, with no setup required, thanks to the integrated emulator. Discover the beginning of the cursed trilogy and break the ancient spell before sunrise!

name: Tricula
summary: Solve intricate puzzles to help Tricula the vampire find his way to his coffin in this grid-based pixel-art puzzle platforming game.

name: Trickshotterz
summary: SCORE IN THE TOP OF THE CUP. Pick abilities, grab wild powerups, and pull off absurd trickshots in chaotic physics arenas. Play with up to 4 players locally, online, or hop into public matchmaking.

name: Train Hero
summary: Train Hero is a retro-themed action-puzzle game where you conduct trains, switch tracks and use your brain to avoid collisions and make sure that all trains arrive at their stations on time.

name: Trophy Phishing
summary:
Cruise around the cyber sea and fish for over 200,000 models from the Discmaster archive!

Preserve the ones you like on a pedestal on the deck of your boat, release the ones you don't care for.

Marvel at all this stuff - people made it! Where are they now? Who were they? Did they have a good time making all these models, or was it a miserable endeavor?

name: Triangle Defense
summary: An atmospheric tower defense game with intentionally imbalanced mechanics. Deploy defenses and skills to stop enemies. Through multi-tiered levels, learn from failures to adapt strategies and secure victory.

name: Traitor's Kitchen
summary: Work together to cook and manage the kitchen—unless you’re the traitor, whose mission is to ruin everything! Fast-paced, hilarious, and full of sabotage.

name: Traitor
summary: Traitor is a multiplayer social thriller based on suspicion and strategy. Players assume roles, gain trust, cooperate... until someone betrays them. In each round, one is the secret killer and the others try to survive. Observe, interrogate, gather evidence and uncover the real killer.

name: Trial of Ariah
summary: A tactical roguelike deckbuilder. Strategically use runes on a mystical grid to cast spells and battle enemies. Escape through three distinct realms - fiery, terrestrial, and celestial - as you navigate branching paths that change with every playthrough in your quest to reach Ariah.

name: Transport Legion
summary: A unique roguelike card-based tower defense game. Strategically place cards, manage resource transport, balance production with combat, and craft distinctive decks to claim victory.

name: Try to Catch Me!
summary: Try To Catch Me is a multiplayer game where you and friends play as kids trying to escape from school. Hide, run, and complete diverse tasks to escape while causing mayhem and destruction. The teacher’s job is to stop the chaos, but this won't be so easy!

name: Trash Takeout
summary: You're a truck who needs to push falling trash into trash collectors to earn the highest score possible.

name: Traveler Arena
summary: A lightly action-oriented Roguelike adventure game, set in a fictional gladiator world. Players will扮演 gladiators, battling through a three-layer arena, experiencing rich randomness and replayability.

name: Trimjob
summary: Trim weeds in a golfly manner! Aim, click and trim across 4 different gardens each with 18 levels inside. Can you get a TRIM-IN-ONE in all 72 levels? Chill out and enjoy the fully handcrafted original soundtrack and retro sound effects.

name: TryAngle: Shapes Warfare
summary: TryAngle: Shapes Warfare is a fast-paced, addictive shoot 'em up with a twist...You can't shoot! Easy to pick up, hard to put down, dodge, survive, and chase high scores in this addictive, old-school action game!

name: Treasure Drop
summary: Don’t let your treasure leave the dome. Merge it together, and create the biggest fortune!

name: Train Reaction
summary: Train Reaction is a satisfying puzzle game about automating efficient train networks. Create the logic that powers signals and junctions in order to deliver cargo and avoid crashes. Optimize your solutions for efficiency and climb the global leader boards!

name: Trash Card Adventure
summary: TCA is a punk deck bulding game with a twisted story, hand drawn with a ball pen. Collect cards and fight against demonic forces, childhood bullies and capitalism! It's an adventure with trash cards and social commentary.

name: Trust Me
summary: In a post-apocalyptic quarantine zone, repair your vehicle, scavenge loot, and fight to survive. With the help of your independent-minded third arm, battle mutants, upgrade your ride, and seek the path to freedom.

name: Trinity Building Editor
summary: Building simulator game. Play with landscape, build the foundation, change the size of all building parts, combine pieces for a unique design, stack, rotate and scale. Choose and change materials and textures. Finish it by putting down plants. Complete tasks and increase your architect level!

name: Trombone Champ: Unflattened! - Halloween Pack
summary: Haunt your headset with this new Halloween Pack for Trombone Champ: Unflattened! With terrifying toots and scary songs, this pack has everything you need to celebrate Spooky Season.

name: Trials Survivors
summary: Fight through endless hordes in trials bestowed by constellation patrons. Upgrade skills, collect relics, and craft broken builds in true roguelite fashion! Rediscover the fantasy behind the words hack and slash and bullet heaven. Will you survive the densest monster Survivor-like ever created?

name: Triple Swap Tower
summary: Triple Swap Tower is a frantic roguelite which puts you in control of three different heroes. Swap fast between them as you fell waves of enemies, then power them up! How will you build your party?

name: True Abstraction: Forbidden
summary: Awakening was only the beginning. RDS is real… consuming anyone who ventures too close.

name: Treasure Drop: Algae Valley DLC
summary: Merge coins and fill the Algae Valley with treasure!

name: Treasure Drop: Coral Reef DLC
summary: Merge coins and fill the Coral Reef with treasure!

name: Treasure Drop: Deep Trench DLC
summary: Merge coins and fill the Deep Trench with treasure!

name: Treasure Drop: Open Sea DLC
summary: Merge coins and fill the Open Sea with treasure!

name: Train Cargo: Nightshift
summary: Unload trains, sort and package shipments, and keep the yard efficient. In Train Cargo Simulator, your performance keeps the company running and that's exactly how it should be.

name: Train Station Simulator: Together in Japan
summary: Reopen and restore a Japanese rural Train Station. Repair, upgrade, and bring it back to life. Uncover the station's hidden stories and team up with friends or solo.

name: Treasure Guessr
summary: A daily guessing game where players attempt to locate a "buried treasure" when presented with a highly zoomed-in portion of a world map. As time progresses, players can unlock wider zoom options to reveal more of the surrounding location.

name: Train Delux 2026 Kurakyu
summary: The ultimate freedom in railway driving — now more real than ever! Stop wherever you like, skip where you want — your schedule, your rules.Build your own timetable!

name: Truck Simulator: Delivery in City
summary: Truck Simulator: Delivery in City is your invitation to the open road — where freedom, rhythm, and the sound of your engine blend into the ultimate driving adventure.

name: Trick or Treat
summary:
On Halloween, everyone wants candy, and everyone dresses up to look scary—but can you tell the difference when something truly terrifying actually happens?

Step into the role of Michael, who returns to sort out the aftermath after his parents passed away. On a bizarre Halloween night, you’ll tidy up the house and encounter all kinds of strange people—can you tell apart what’s truly terrifying?

The game takes 10-20 minutes to complete, depending on how much you explore the scenes.

name: Troll
summary:
Become a brave troll warrior and save little humans from orcish tyranny in a fast paced brick wall destructing action game!

The quest will take you through six lands from green plains, across the mysterious swamps and desert, through snowy mountains and dark horror forest to the terrible wasteland, the home of orcs.

You will have to defeat many foes and face hideous and powerful creatures to finally fight the freedom for peaceful people from the Plains.

name: Train Simulator Bangladesh
summary: Train Simulator Bangladesh brings the realistic railway experience of Bangladesh to your mobile device!

name: Train Your Focus and Observation Skills: The Spot-the-Difference Challenge
summary: Sharpen Your Mind as You Play! A Slightly Challenging Spot-the-Difference

name: Trucking School: Truck Simulator Driving 2025
summary: Improve your skills and become the ultimate truck driver.

name: Trapaze
summary: As the character ventures through the intricate maze, fueled by curiosity and determination, each level presents a new mystery. With each challenge conquered, the character's understanding of the maze deepens, offering glimpses into its purpose and the minds of its creators.

name: Traditional Tactics With Sess-AI 2.0
summary: Simulation RPG for Beginners.

name: Truck Simulator US Driver
summary:
Step into the shoes of a true TRUCK SIMULATOR US DRIVER, a captivating game that takes you across the endless highways of the United States. Whether you're passionate about trucks or simply looking for a realistic driving experience, this simulator offers the chance to explore major cities, deliver various cargo, and live the life on the open road.

TRUCK SIMULATOR US DRIVER is more than just a game – it’s a virtual journey through the heart of America, filled with challenges, strategic decisions, and relaxing moments on the road. Whether you're a simulation fan or just seeking a unique adventure, this title offers an authentic and engaging experience. Start your engine and conquer the roads of the United States!

name: Trial By Magic
summary: There comes a time for every spell caster when they must face the TRIAL BY MAGIC. Those who overcome the challenge are forever known as Wizards, a title carried with pride. Those who fail are branded Wimps, forever shamed. So the question to you, spell caster, is: ARE YOU A WIZARD OR A WIMP?

name: Transmission: Shortwave
summary: Transmission: Shortwave is a 3D casual driving delivery simulator set in a retro-futuristic 1990s Great Britain.

name: Trails in the Sky 2nd Chapter
summary: A remake of the second installment in the main Trails series, serving as a direct sequel of Trails in the Sky 1st Chapter. The game follows Estelle as she sets out on a new adventure following the events of the previous game, where she will be joined by comrades both old and new.

name: Tri-Ger
summary: TRI-GER is a top-down rouge-like SHMUP with technicolor vector based graphics. Fight endless waves of enemies, and be sure to match your color to get a high score!

name: Triarchy
summary: Sail your ship, explore islands, fight monsters, choose your abilities, and craft legendary gear to hunt for deadly bosses. Play Triarchy your way! Activate Boss Challenge Modes or enable Assists to suit your playstyle. Open-world, Co-op, Action Adventure (1-3 Players)

name: Trium
summary: Simple yet authentic 3-button action. Take control of the humanoid antivirus 'TRIUM', in this on-rails virus-killing action game. Eliminate viruses, speed up, and catch up to the 'Intruder' virus that started this mess!

name: Trailmakers: Frozen Tracks
summary: You're arriving at Hoff, a frozen and mountainous planet with a peculiar population. A species known as Waddles take residence in the desolate tundra and are inviting you, the Trailmaker, into their cold but hospitable settlements. They need something from you. But what?

name: Trust
summary: Explore a small open world in first-person, solving environmental puzzles across five distinct biomes. Observe, experiment, and uncover secrets at your own pace in this calm, discovery-focused indie experience.

name: TR-49
summary: Narrative deduction meets audio drama, from the creators of Heaven’s Vault, Overboard! and A Highland Song.

name: Train Sim World 6: Transport for Wales BR Class 142 Pacer DMU Add-On
summary: Bounce back to the Trafnidiaeth Cymru days of yesteryear with Just Trains' detailed BR Class 142. Shuttle around the Cardiff City Network in teal-toned Pacers, as they were in the last years of passenger operation in Wales.

name: Treated
summary:
On this night, you will be visited by 5 trick or treaters. Heed their warnings, remember what is almost lost or be lost yourself forever...

Originally an entry for PlayJam 6 with the theme of "Trick or Treat", this game explores the effect of how we hold on to the feedback we receive in our younger years, be those positive/treats or negative/tricks.

For the Catalog release, the game adds crank functionality and additional memory elements.

The game is very short and doesn't have a save function but please enjoy!

name: Trustfall
summary: TRUSTFALL into the mysterious and quirky inner world of Cherry to 'battle' her inner parts. Master Emotional Alchemy in unique turn-based encounters: choose LOVE to integrate, FEAR to resist, or AWARENESS to transmute. Every choice will uncover a different path back home.

name: Trigwa
summary: Statue pushing game with a narrative. Each puzzle tells part of a larger story.

name: Trap Golf
summary: Minigolf game with 2 levels. Avoid different obstacles and traps

name: Trials of Enkidu
summary: Enkidu needs your help on his retro-inspired, fast-paced action RPG. This era-spanning adventure will test your reflexes, strategic thinking, build crafting, and resolve as you battle waves of increasingly difficult armies. Defy fate and protect the Eternal Lotus, or watch the world wilt and wither!

name: Tribal Feeding
summary: Tribal feeding is an experimental visual novel set in a harsh desert village. Choose a bride, face sacred trials, and care for her daily, all brought to life with integrated AI-generated video sequences.

name: Trigger of Silence
summary: "Trigger of Silence" is a first-person survival defense game that combines intense melee combat with firearms. In this invaded world, you play as a super soldier tasked with holding your ground and fending off waves of dragon-like creatures.

name: Trip The Light
summary:
Step into TRIP THE LIGHT! Move hand-in-hand with virtual dance partners in this AWARD WINNING mixed reality game! Winner of the inaugural category "Best in Show: Gaming Hub" at AWE 2025. Level-up your partner and solo dance moves in your living room!

Dance with a partner anywhere, anytime. Lead your partner in dance routines, complete challenges, score points, and rack up combos. Move through stunning environments or dance in your own home via passthrough to have a blast anywhere.

Skills you can use on the dance floor. Learn Salsa, the most popular social dance in the world, from virtual instructors based on real-life professionals. More dance styles coming soon!

Master new moves. Play ‘Match Me’ mode and challenge yourself to follow solo dance styles like hip-hop, line-dancing, club moves, and more.

name: Truth or Dare
summary: What starts as a simple dare quickly turns into a fight for survival as Claire and Jamie explore the dark, abandoned rooms, solve eerie puzzles, and uncover the terrifying truth behind the family’s death. Can they escape, or will they become the house’s next victims?

name: Treasure Hunter
summary: While searching for treasure in an ancient castle, an explorer is chased by shadow knights and skeletons and tries to survive.

name: Trench Run
summary: 16 trench-runners. 1 winner. How many will survive ? How many will turn to stardust ? Feel adrenaline surge while you fly through the trench at more than 1000 km/h, dodging treacherous obstacles and countless hot plasma shots which try to turn you shining racing spaceship into molten scrap.

name: Tricky Castle
summary: Tricky Castle is a 2d puzzle-platformer with mind-bending, out-of-the-box puzzles. Use creative thinking to solve unconventional challenges and escape a castle full of devious traps.

name: Trapped
summary: Trapped is a 2.5D sci-fi side scrolling platformer that takes inspiration from old school games. You the player, have ended up inside a computer, where you need to find out how to escape the computer that you have been trapped inside of. Why are you here and what caused you to be in this position?

name: Train Manager
summary: Create and manage your own train company. Build routes and transport cargo and passengers all over the world while you expand your fleet of trains. Train Manager is among the most realistic of the simulator genre - so prove yourself and beat your friends and other real life managers.

name: Transfer
summary: Transfer supplies with a Train in a post apocalyptic world filled with creatures that you need to fend off to survive and do your goal

name: Trap
summary: A chaotic co-op horror-comedy where you and your team work as interdimensional pest control, explore bizarre worlds, pacify unpredictable creatures, and capture them alive before the dimension collapses.

name: Treetopians
summary: Treetopians is a cozy colony simulator where players build vertical villages in the treetops and care for a growing community of villagers with unique needs and personalities.

name: Tri-bo
summary:
One-button action with SPACE to jump!

Defeat the boss by ricocheting bullets fired from the boss!

name: Tri6: Infinite 2
summary: Tri6: Infinite 2 is futuristic arcade racing without brakes: race across procedurally generated cyber tracks, dodge traps, use power-ups, and experience thrilling high-speed action. Every run is unique — how long can you last?

name: Trixology
summary: Trixology is a game that is playable as a part of Singapore Airlines' KrisWorld Digital service. The game is a clone of Tetris.

name: Tracebound
summary: Tracebound is an atmospheric, fast paced, ice skating game. Slide and leap across the giant’s colossal body, shattering its shackles to restore nature’s movement.

name: True Galactic Mission
summary: There are 5 pilots in training, each with unique characteristics. It is the day of the final level and everyone wil l face a test to see who will be able to accept the next challenge, a true galactic mission. Be you one of the selecteds!

name: Tribunal 45
summary: Follow historical figure Aline Chalufour as she partakes in the french delegation to the Nuremburg Trial, the birthplace of international law. Serious Game by the Memorium Nuremberg Trials in honor of the 80th anniversary of this historic event.

name: Truckin' It!
summary: Truckin’ It is a fast-paced online co-op delivery game where two players struggle to deliver cargo quickly without losing it. Choose risky shortcuts or safer long routes, trust your partner, and enjoy the chaotic, silly world as you work together for the best score.

name: Treasure Flea Market
summary:
Treasure Flea Market is a heartwarming, cozy simulation game about listening to the voices of objects and gradually rebuilding a small town.
Players take on the role of a boy who can hear the wishes and memories held within forgotten objects, alongside his robot companion.

By collecting objects from a place called Junk Mountain, transforming junk into new creations, and offering them at a flea market, players help objects find new homes and roles.
As these connections are made, the town slowly regains activity, with its people, shops, and scenery changing over time.

The game features crafting and management elements, a story-driven world centered on objects and people, and a relaxed, non-competitive structure without time limits.
With a wide variety of craftable items and over 120 achievements, players can enjoy the game and its story-driven world at their own pace.

name: Trees Hate You
summary: Hike through the worst forest full of the most horrible trees. Do not trust them. The trees will trick you. They will bully you. They will hurt you. If only you could find an axe...

name: Treasure Rush Cave Climb
summary:
Once upon a time, the quiet town of Chairwood, Florida was greeted by the arrival of Phantom Corporation. For 7 years they dug a massive hole in the town square… until one night they vanished without a trace.

Thirteen years later, Joey receives a strange letter: “DIAMOND SPOTTED IN THE CAVE IN THE CENTER SQUARE OF CHAIRWOOD!!! CLAIM IT IF YOU CAN.”

When Joey’s friends Peter, Michael, and Victoria enter the cave without him, they vanish just like the stories. Now Joey must climb the Tower Cave, rescue his friends, and uncover the truth behind Phantom Corp — before he disappears too.

name: Trinket Bag Maker
summary: Trinket Bag Maker is a retro sandbox game inspired by the 2000's girl games, where you can create your own trinket bag! Choose between many adorable charms and bags to create the trinket bag of your dreams!

name: True World: Shinjitsu no Sekai
summary:
Based on a fictional visual novel in NHK ni Youkoso!.

Came bundled with NHK ni Youkoso! manga, volume 6, limited edition.

In the manga, the main character, Tatsuhiro, develops a game.
The game that Tatsuhiro develops is this bundled mini-game.

name: Trash Truck Simulator
summary:
Driving a garbage truck in city environment is the ultimate test of driving skill.
Take a seat and start your job in a fully modeled and animated trucks that are based on real truck models. Load up the truck and deliver the trash to your garbage processing plant, where it will be burned.
Burning the trash generates you money, which you can use to upgrade furnaces in the plant, or buy different trucks. There are many trucks to choose from.

name: Trombone Champ: Celeste Song Pack
summary: This DLC song pack brings 10 songs from the Celeste Original Soundtrack to Trombone Champ.

name: Trombone Champ: Undertale + Deltarune
summary: This DLC song pack brings 14 songs from the UNDERTALE and DELTARUNE Soundtracks to Trombone Champ!

name: Trombone Champ: Unflattened - Celeste Song Pack
summary: Toot to new heights with the Celeste soundtrack, now officially available in the world's most accurate, 100% serious rhythm game! That's right - Lena Raine's award-winning tunes are yours to mangle.

name: Tricolo
summary: The puzzle size is limited to 9 squares. Tricolo is a 2D grid puzzle where you move pieces on the board to the goal. Its defining feature is that every puzzle is only 3×3 in size. The sophisticated puzzle rules and various gimmicks demand deep thought within a limited space.

name: Trickshot Tactics
summary: Billiards will never be the same again! Trickshot Tactics is where sharp minds meet sharper shots, a wild mix of deck building, strategy, and pure skill. Play your cards, bend the rules, and show who really knows how to handle a cue!

name: Tresspasser
summary:
117/400 Garcia Street(1) completed construction in 2017, it began accepting tenants the following year. This makes it one of the oldest buildings in the city still operating to its original intent.
The metal had been in it from the start, though for the longest time it was inert.

name: Trine Classic Collection
summary: Experience the magic of the puzzle-platforming Trine series with Trine Classic Collection. Includes four titles: Trine Enchanted Edition, Trine 2: Complete Story, Trine 3: Artifacts of Power and Trine 4: Definitive Edition.

name: Truck Rally Hyper Hardcore
summary: The challenging races that you only know are just the beginning level of this game. Absolutely realistic behavior of the machine. No arcade controls. Using the laws of the real physical world. Only for hardcore players.

name: Traction Point
summary: Traction Point is a vehicular, physics-driven, puzzle/exploration game. Embark on a sci-fi road trip together with your crew in the campaign, or experiment and play around in the sandbox mode.

name: Truck Simulator Drive USA: EVO
summary: Get ready to redefine your TRUCK SIMULATOR experience! From the creators of "Truck Simulator USA : Classic", we proudly present the next evolution in AMERICAN trucking. We listened to your feedback and pushed the boundaries of mobile SIMULATOR design to deliver a deeper, more immersive, and expansive world for every TRUCK enthusiast. If you thought driving an 18-wheeler felt real before, get ready for a true revolution in TRUCK SIMULATOR gameplay.

name: Trials of Luna
summary: A 2D 16-bit styled action MMORPG.

name: Trapped on the FlipSide
summary: In this Puzzle Platformer, follow the narrative of three explorers, kidnapped by a mechanical megastructure. Play as their assistant spherical robot in an effort to save them from this brutal place. By powering up the system, area by area, the secretive past and dark truth may make itself known.

name: Trust Me Bro, I Trade
summary: A minimalist incremental clicker about trading stocks and coins in rapid-fire rounds. Watch prices move, square off for profit or loss, and unlock upgrades & sectors

name: Trainz Plus DLC - Pro Train: AC44C6M Loco Bundle
summary: Get 6 new Norfolk Southern AC44C6M locomotives with many details and dynamic weathering.

name: Trainz 2019 DLC - Pro Train: AC44C6M Loco Bundle
summary: Get 6 new Norfolk Southern AC44C6M locomotives with many details and dynamic weathering.

name: Tralalero Tralala Elephant Runner
summary: Run wild, break free—help the elephant escape the circus in a nonstop city dash!

name: Train Your Brain! Spot the Difference With Space Photos
summary:
Find the hidden mistakes among the sparkling stars!
From galaxies and planets to meteor showers and astronauts — it’s Spot the Difference: Space Photos!

name: Treasure Rush: Phantom Infiltration
summary:
After you save your friends from the Tower Cave, things in Chairwood don’t calm down at all. People start going missing, whole houses turning quiet overnight, and nobody knows what’s going on. Every clue you follow keeps pointing back to Phantom Corp. They’re acting like nothing’s happening, but everyone knows they’re involved.

So now it’s up to you and your friends to go inside their facility, figure out what they’re doing, and stop it before the whole town ends up gone.

name: Train Plus 2
summary: Catch up to the ultra-fast Rapid Express!Freely drive 10-car trains in the latest, enhanced Train Plus title!No scores, no game over—just pure free driving fun!

name: Tropical Treasure Hunt
summary: A casual treasure hunt on a tropical island. Follow your metal detector, dig some treasures, and upgrade your tools! All on a nice sunny day at the beach.

name: Train Goes Right
summary: A cozy physics based railroad simulator where you chop trees, drive trains, transport materials, and build track one rail at a time in the early steam age. The goal is simple: go right.

name: Triple Triad
summary: A mobile free-to-play game with hundreds of cards from across the entire Final Fantasy series. It featured rotating rule events and ranked matches against other players’ decks. Based on the Final Fantasy VIII trading card minigame. This was available to play in the Final Fantasy Portal App until it was removed in November 2024.

name: Trigodpats RPG
summary: Join the gods Zeus, Poseidon and Hades on an epic journey to defeat Typhon, his wife Echidna, and their monstrous offspring.

name: Traditional Braves with Sess-AI 2.0
summary: Simulation RPG for Intelligent Players.

name: Trust Me, I Nailed It
summary: is a turn-based strategy game where you edit video clips to make a screwed up warrior into a monster-slaying legend. Edit, stitch, and fake your way to epic battle videos. Make every fight look like a glorious win.
